F2: `Wɔbɔɔ Gosling ne Stone din sɛ agofomma a wɔbɔ wɔn ho mmɔden yiye.`
---------------------- (22) ----------------------
F1: `Abasobɔdeɛ nkaeɛ no bi ne Mfonitwani a ɔdi mu, Ɔtenetenefoɔ, Sinitwani, Deɛ ɔhwɛ Ahosiesie so, Deɛ ɔsiesie Sini no, Abodin a wɔde ma Aberatewaa ne Nwom di mu, Yɛreyɛ Beaeɛ a wɔyɛ Sini, Sini mu Nwom Nsiesie, Deɛ ɔka Nwom Ahodoɔ Bom ne Deɛ ɔhwɛ Sini no Ankasa so.`
F2: `Nkae a wɔbɔɔ wɔn din no bi yɛ Mfonin a ɛyɛ pa ara, Kwankyerɛfo, Sinimatografi, Afade yɛ, Sini-asiesie, Ɔregyenaa Sokɔɔ, Proahyen Design, Nnyegyeeɛ Asiesie, Sɛnea ɔde Nnyegyeeɛ no Frafra ne ɔregyinaa Sikireeplee.`
---------------------- (23) ----------------------
F1: `Nwom mmienu bi a wobɛnya no sini no mu, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ne City of Stars, nyaa abasobɔdeɛ sɛ nwom a ɛdi mu. Lionsgate sini adwumayɛkuo no nyaa abasobɔdeɛ 26 – kyɛn sini adwumayɛkuo foforɔ biara.`
F2: `Nnwom abien a ɛwɔ sini no mu, Ɔdihyen ( Agyimifoɔ no a wɔso Daeɛ) ne Kuropɔn a Nsromma, na wɔbɔɔ wɔn din sɛ nnwom a ɛyɛ ɔregyinaa a ɛyɛ paa. Wɔbɔɔ Lionsgate studio no mprɛ 26— a ɛkyɛn studio nkae biara.`
---------------------- (24) ----------------------
F1: `Kwasiada anwummerɛ, United States Manpanin Donald Trump, nam ne dawurubɔ twerɛtwerɛfoɔ so daa no adi sɛ US asraafoɔ a ɛwɔ Syria no refri hɔ.`
F2: `Bere a na bere kɔ wɔ Kwasiada , United States manpanin Donal Trump, denam ɔtwerɛfo a ɔde nsɛm to dwa so no de too gua sɛ US asraafo rebɛfiri Syria.`
---------------------- (25) ----------------------

F2: `Saa nkaebɔ yi kɔɔ so bere a Trump ne Turkey manpanin Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ka saa wɔ foon so.`
---------------------- (26) ----------------------
F1: `Turkeyfoɔ nso bɛgye ISIS akofoɔ a wɔakyere wɔn na wɔabɔ wɔ ho ban ketee no, nkaebɔ no daa no adi sɛ, Europe amanaman nso mpene so sɛ wɔsane kɔ wɔn nkyiri.`
F2: `Turkey nso bɛhwɛ ISIS akofo a wɔakyere wɔn no so, nkaebɔ no de too gua, Europe aman ampene so sɛ wɔmmera wɔn nkyi.`
---------------------- (27) ----------------------
F1: `Wei nko ara nna no adi adi sɛ “dinosaurs” binom wɔ ntakra, ɛyɛ adesuadeɛ a dodoɔ ara nim, nanso wei da nkrapan adi de kyerɛ mu fann a dodoɔ nso nnim, tesɛ ahosuo ne n’afaafa mmiɛnsa a yɛahyehyɛ.`
F2: `Wei nsi no pi nko ara sɛ anyɛ hwee koraa dinosaurs wɔ ntakra, biribi a atene, nanso ne nankɛse a ɛwɔ hɔ mma, te sɛ ahosuo ne afaafa-abiɛsa nhyehyɛe.`
---------------------- (28) ----------------------

F2: `Abɔdemunyansapɛfo ka sɛ na saa mmoa yi ntakra ɛyɛ chestnut-brown wɔ soro a ɛyɛ hoyaa anaasɛ carotenoid-colored a ɛwɔ ase.`
---------------------- (29) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nhunumu yi nso asane ama yɛahunu ɔkwan a nnomaa nam so nyaa ntakra.`
F2: `Adida wei nso ma yɛhunu kwan a nnomaa ntakra bae.`
---------------------- (30) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛfiri sɛ “dinosaur” ntakra no nni nhini kɛse a wɔfrɛ no “rachis” no bi, nanso ɛwɔ ahosuo bi a ntakra ahodoɔ wɔ - “barbs ne barbules” – wɔn a wɔyɛ nhwehwɛmu no de “rachi” yɛɛ mfatoho sɛ ɛyɛ suahunu bi a akyire yi na ɛdaa adie.`
F2: `Esiane sɛ dinosaur ntakra nni shaft a anyini awie, a yɛfrɛ no rachis, nanso enni ntakra nnoɔma nkae — barbɔ ne barbules — nhwehwɛmufo kaa sɛ rachis no baa akyire yi wɔ nnoɔma nkae no ho.`
---------------------- (31) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛnea ntakra no si teɛ no ma yɛhunu sɛ, ɛnyɛ adeɛ a na wɔde tu na mmom wɔde bɔ wɔn ho ban wɔ awɔ ne ɔhyew berɛ mu. Nhwehwɛmufoɔ yi susuu sɛ, ɛmfa ho mpo sɛ wei yɛ “dinosaur” ba bi podua no, saa nkaeɛ no kyerɛ nhini a ɛyɛ nea wanyini deɛ na mmom akokɔ ba ho akwaa.`
F2: `Sɛnea ntakra no si teɛ no kyerɛ sɛ wɔamfa anni dwuma wɔ hyɛn mu na mmom ne hyɛe anaa nwunu nhyehyɛe mu anaa ne kyerɛ mu. Nhwehwɛmufoɔ yi susuu sɛ, ɛwom sɛ wei yɛ dinasour a ɔsua no tua de, ɛkyerɛ n’atabu na ɛnyɛ chick's down.`
---------------------- (32) ----------------------
F1: `Nhwehwɛmufoɔ yi susuu sɛ, ɛmfa ho mpo sɛ wei yɛ “dinosaur” ba bi podua no, saa nkaeɛ no kyerɛ nhini a ɛyɛ nea wanyini de na mmom akokɔ ba ho akwaa.`
F2: `Nhwehwɛmufoɔ yi susuu sɛ, ɛwom sɛ wei yɛ dinasour a ɔsua no tua de, ɛkyerɛ n’atabu na ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔbɛtumi de abɔ ne ho ban.`
---------------------- (33) ----------------------
F1: `Kaa bi a topaeԑ wom toe wɔ apolisifoɔ atenaeԑ kԑseԑ a ԑwɔ Gaziantep, Turkey nnora anɔpa maa ԑkumm apolisifoɔ mmienu maa nnipa bԑboro aduonu nso pirapirae.`
F2: `Kaa mu topae too wɔ polisi asoe a ɛwɔ Gaziantep, Turkey nnora anɔpa na ekumm apolisifo nnipa baanu na wɔn a wɔpirae no boro aduonu.`
---------------------- (34) ----------------------
F1: `Mantam Soafoɔ no ɔfese bɔɔ amanneԑ sԑ nnipa a wɔpirapiraeԑ no mu du-nkron yԑ apolisifoɔ.`
F2: `Aban no asoe bɔɔ amanneɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔpirae no mu du nkron yɛ apolisifo.`
---------------------- (35) ----------------------
F1: `Polisifoɔ se wɔsusu sԑ nnipa a wɔtaa saaa bɔnefosԑm yi akyi ne adɔnyԑkuo (ISIL).`
F2: `Polisifo kyerɛɛ sɛ wɔsusu sɛ Daes (ISIL) akofo na wɔdii sa dwuma yi.`
---------------------- (36) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔhunuu sԑ awia no yԑ adwuma te sԑ deԑ nsoromma yԑ no ara: Wɔhunuu sԑ nsoromma no dwumadie nyinaa gyina ne kanea anaa ne hyerԑn no so ne sԑdeԑ wɔtwa wɔn ho no so, na mmom ԑnyԑ biribi foforɔ biara.`
F2: `Wɔhunuu sɛ Awia yɛ adwuma wɔ tebea ko ara mu te sɛ nsroma nkae no: Nsroma dwumadi nyinaa wɔhunuu sɛ deɛ ɛhyɛ ne kutupa yɛ n wɔn luminosity, wɔn ntwaho na ɛnyɛ biribiara.`
---------------------- (37) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑdeԑ nsorommahyerԑn ne sԑdeԑ ԑtwa ne ho so na wɔgyina de kyerԑ ne ‘Rossby nɔma’ a ԑgyina ‘plasma flow’ so.`
F2: `Wɔde luminosity no ne ntwaho no di dwuma de kyere nsroma Rossby nɔma, a ɛfa sɛnea plasma no ɛtene no ho.`
---------------------- (38) ----------------------

F2: `Sɛna Rossby no sua no, saa na nsroma no magnɛtek no a ɛsane kɔ ne nkyi no dwumadi wɔ fam.`
---------------------- (39) ----------------------

F2: `Akwantu no bi mu no, Iwasaki nyaa asɛm mpɛn pii.`
---------------------- (40) ----------------------
F1: `Nkurɔfoɔ a wɔde nsuomhyԑn kɔ korɔnobɔ kɔwiaa no, ɔkraman bi to hyԑԑ ne so wɔ Tibet, ɔdwanee awareԑ wɔ Nepal ԑnna wɔkyeree no wɔ India.`
F2: `Piratefo wiaa no, rabid nkraman to hyɛɛ ne so wɔ Tibet, guan firii aware mu wɔ Nepal na wɔsan kyeree no wɔ India.`
---------------------- (41) ----------------------
F1: `‘802.11n standard’ no yԑ adwuma wɔ ‘2.4Ghz ԑne 5.0Ghz frequencies’ no mmienu nyinaa so.`
F2: `802.11n nostandaad yɛ adwuma wɔfirkwɛnsi a ɛyɛ 2.4Ghz ne 5.0Ghz so.`
---------------------- (42) ----------------------
F1: `Wei bԑma ԑne 802.11a, 802.11b ԑne 802.11g, ntumi ntentam, ɛkɔba sԑ ‘base station’ no wɔ radio afa mmienu a.`
F2: `Wei bɛma kwan ama asane akɔ akyi a ɛne 802.11a, hyia802.11b ne 802.11g,sɛ ɛkɔ ba sɛ base siteehyin no wɔ radio abien.`
---------------------- (43) ----------------------
F1: `802.11n no yԑ adwuma ɔhare so pa ara sene deԑ ԑdi n’akyi no bԑyԑ 600Mbit/s so.`
F2: `Ne mmirika a ɛyɛ 802.11n yɛ deɛ ɛho yɛ hare sene deɛ edii anim no a ne maximum theoretical throughput ɛyɛ 600Mbit/s.`
---------------------- (44) ----------------------
F1: `Duvall a waware awo mma mpanimfoɔ mmienu no antumi anyԑ biribi amma no ansɔ Miller a na asԑm no fa no ho no ani.`
F2: `Duvall, a wɔaware a wɔwɔ mma abien a wɔanyinini, annya biribi a ɛwɔ nkɛntɛn so kɛse wɔ Miller so, a na asɛm no fa ne ho.`
---------------------- (45) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a wɔkakyerԑԑ no sԑ ɔnka biribi no, Miller kaa sԑ, "Mike kasa dodo wɔ berԑ a na otie no rekɔ so…Na mereboaboa me ho nti na mente deԑ ɔreka no."`
F2: `Bere a ɔbisaa anom asɛm no, Miller kaa sɛ, “ Mike kasa pii bere a asenni no gu so rekɔ so no.... Na mereyɛ ahoboaboa nti na mente deɛ ɔreka no ankasa.”`
---------------------- (46) ----------------------
F1: `Hu se, "ԑntɔ nkɔsi afe 2020 mu no, yԑbԑhwԑ sԑ yԑde yԑn GDP mu fa a ԑsԑ bԑte ‘carbon dioxide a yԑto gu mframa mu no so pa ara, ama no afiri mpɔmpɔnsoɔ a yԑnyaa no afe 2005 mu no".`
F2: `Hu kaa sɛ“ Yɛbɛbɔ mmɔden sɛ yɛbɛte mframa a nnipa home fi ne mu a ɛfiri mu ba no a ɛyɛ GDP nkyɛmu baako a ɛyɛ nea ɛnnnuru 2020 fiti 2005 deɛ no.”`
---------------------- (47) ----------------------
F1: `Wamfa nɔma a wɔde bԑte so biara anto dwa, ɔse ԑbԑgyina deԑ ԑbԑfiri China sikasԑm ne dwadie mu aba no so.`
F2: `Wankyerɛ mu pɔtee ahe a ɔbɛyi afiri mu, ɔka sɛ wɔbɛyɛ wei na ɛbɛgyina China sikasɛm so.`
---------------------- (48) ----------------------
F1: `Hu hyԑԑ aman a afei na wɔretu mpɔn no nkuran sԑ, "wɔntwe wɔn ho mfiri sԑ wɔbԑsԑe adeԑ no kane ansa na wɔabԑsiesie no akyiri no ho."`
F2: `Hu tu aman a afei na wɔretu mpɔn fo sɛ ” ɛsɛ sɛ ɔkwati wɔbɛsɛe adeɛ deɛ edi kan ansa na wɔahwɛ asiesie no akyire yi”.`
---------------------- (49) ----------------------

F2: `Ɔde kaa ho sɛ “ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔyɛ, na ɔfa asodi a ɛkɔ akyi sene nkɔanim siteegyi, asodi ne deɛ ɔtumi yɛ. ”`
---------------------- (50) ----------------------

F2: `Iraq adesua kuw de wɔn amannebɔ too gua 12.00 GMT nnɛ.`
---------------------- (51) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔabɔ kɔkɔ sԑ Obiara ntumi nkyerԑ sԑ biribi a ԑbԑkɔ so wɔ Iraq saa berԑ yi mu no bԑtumi asi ԑko ano, basabasaeԑ a ԑrema ne homene so, ԑne mmara so buo no ano.`
F2: `Ɛbɔɔ kɔkɔ sɛ obiara ntumi nsi sectarian ako a ɛrekɔ so wɔ Iraq saa bere wei mu no, basabasayɛ a ɛrenya nkɔanim anaasɛ ɛkɔ basabasayɛ so.`
---------------------- (52) ----------------------
F1: `Asԑm a wɔde too dwa no de kyԑw pa na ԑhyԑԑ aseԑ sԑ wɔmma kwan mma wɔnkyerԑ wɔn adwene na wɔnkɔ bԑnkorɔ mu wɔ United State mfa ne nhyehyԑeԑ a ɔwɔ ma ‘Middle East’.`
F2: `Amannebɔ no de adesrɛ na efi ase sɛ ɔma dibeeti ho kwan na wɔnya nteaseɛ wɔ Uinited States a ɛfa Middle East nhyehyɛe ho.`
---------------------- (53) ----------------------
F1: `Nsԑm a wɔde too dwa no mfoa nnԑ nhyehyԑeԑ a Aban mu mpanimfoɔ no wɔ fa Iraq ho no so koraa nti wɔka sԑ wɔnsesa no anim anim yi ara.`
F2: `Amannebɔ no hia paa ɛma mprenpren nhyehyɛe a ɛfa Iraq ho na ɛkamfo kyerɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ nsesae wɔ kwan a wɔnam so no.`
---------------------- (54) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑdi kan wɔ nsusuiԑ aduɔson-nwɔtwe no mu ne sԑ, wɔnyԑ amanaman ntam nkutahodie wɔ dwumadie mu ho nhyehyԑeԑ foforɔ ansa na afe yi akɔ awieeԑ sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a wɔde bԑbɔ Iraq ahyeԑ so ho ban afiri nneԑma a ԑmmoa wɔn ho na wɔnyԑ nhyehyԑeԑ mma wɔne aman a atwa wɔn ho ahyia no ntumi nni nsawɔsoɔ.`
F2: `Deɛ edi nkamfo 78 mu no ne ɛsɛ sɛ wɔtu diplomatic initiative ho anamɔn ansa na afe yi akɔ awiei na wɔde abɔ Iraq ahyeɛ ho ban de atia amanmmɔefo na wɔsan ne wɔn a wɔbɛn no no hyɛ diplomatic nkitahodi mu kena.`
---------------------- (55) ----------------------
F1: `Senator a ԑwɔ hɔ seisei ԑne Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner de n’anisoadehunu fa mampanin die ho no too dwa nnora wɔ La Plata, kuro a ԑyԑ 50 kilometers (31 miles) firi Buenos Aires ho.`
F2: `Mprempren mmarahyɛbaguani ne Argentine Ɔbaa a ɔdi kan Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner de gyina a ɔregyina sɛ ɔman panin too gua nnora anwummere wɔ La Plata, kuro a ɛyɛ kilomita 50 (maale 31) ɛde firi Buenos Aires.`
---------------------- (56) ----------------------
F1: `Owurayere Kirchner de ne nsԑm a ԑkyerԑ sԑ ɔpԑ sԑ ɔyԑ mampanin no too dwa wɔ ‘Argentine Theatre’ beaeԑ korɔ no a ɔdehyԑԑ ne 2005 ntoabɔ ase sԑ wɔnto aba mma no mmԑyԑ Buenos Aires province manfoɔ no mmarahyԑbadwani.`
F2: `Owurayere Kirchner de n’adwene a wayɛ sɛ ɔbɛgyina sɛ ɔmanpanin no too gua wɔ Argentine Theatre, baabi korɔ no ara ɔfirii ne mmarahyɛ bagua ntoabɔ no ase afe 2005 sɛ obi ɔka Buenos Aires mansin delegation no ho.`
---------------------- (57) ----------------------
F1: `Saa anobaebaeԑ yi baa wɔ berԑ a mente me ho ase bi ba faa mmoa ne adan a na wɔresi no bio no ho wɔ berԑ a na Hurricane Katrina wɔ hɔ no ho; ԑno na ‘fiscal conservatives’ no bi de yԑԑ aseresԑm de ato din sԑ, "Bush Orleans Deal Foforɔ" no.`
F2: `Deɛ akɔ fa nkyinwahyew a ɛfa ka wɔbɔe de siesiee nneɛma wɔ mframa gyampadurudu Katrina ho; a fiscal conservatives binom aka sɛ ɛyɛ "Bush's New Orleans Deal."`
---------------------- (58) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ na wɔde rebɔ wɔn akyi ne sԑ wɔde saa dwumadie no maa nkurɔfoɔ bi a wɔsusu sԑ wɔyԑ Washington mu foɔ.`
F2: `Nnipa fawohidi a ɛfa siesie mmɔdemmɔ ho no de ani akyerɛ sɛnea wɔde kɔtraagye ma wɔn a wɔwɔ Washington .`
---------------------- (59) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa bԑboro ɔpepe nnan na wɔkɔɔ ayie no wɔ Rome.`
F2: `Nnipa bɛboro ɔpepem nnan na wɔkɔɔ ayi no bi wɔ Rome.`
---------------------- (60) ----------------------
F1: `Na nnipa no dɔɔso ara ma na ԑntumi mma sԑ obiara bԑtumi anya kwan akɔ ayie no ase wɔ ‘St. Peter’s Square' hɔ.`
F2: `Nnipa wɔkɔɔ no na wɔdɔɔso ara ma na ɛnyɛ obiara na wɔtumi nya kwan kɔ ayi no ase wɔ St.Peter's Square hɔ.`
---------------------- (61) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde tԑlԑbihyԑn akԑseԑ bebree bobɔɔ mmeaeԑ mmeaeԑ wɔ Rome sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a nnipa no bԑtumi ahwԑ deԑ ԑrekɔ so.`
F2: `Wɔde akasamfonin akɛseɛakɛseɛ sisii mmeae mmeae wɔ Rome na ama nnipa tumi ahwɛ dwumadi no.`
---------------------- (62) ----------------------

F2: `Nkuro ahorow mu wɔ Italy ne wiase afanan ahorow no, ne titire ne Poland no, wɔhyehyɛɛ biribi a ɛtete saa, na nnipa pii na wɔhwɛɛ bi.`
---------------------- (63) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔnim abakɔsԑm akasa atia FBI nhyehyԑeԑ a atwam no sԑ, wɔsԑe akadeԑ wɔ nsԑm a na ԑyԑ mmrԑ sԑ wɔbԑtumi anya anoyie, ne titire ne kaa a wɔawia ho nsԑm nti ne sԑ na wɔwɔ adwene bi sԑ wɔpԑ so wɔnya no korɔgyee.`
F2: `Abakɔsɛm ho animdefo akasa atia FBI no nhyehyɛeɛ wɔ sɛnea wɔsɛe sika wɔ nsɛm a ano sie nyɛ den ho no, ne titire ne kaa wɔawia ho nsɛm, a wɔn adwene sɛ wɔbɛma asoe no nkunimdi no akɔ soro.`
---------------------- (64) ----------------------
F1: `Congress no hyԑԑ aseԑ de sika wura nneyԑԑ ho asԑm mu wɔ fiscal 2005 ԑnna wɔyԑԑ no sԑ FBI no nte wɔn ani na wɔmfa nkorabata no du nhwԑ mpanin adwaman sini so.`
F2: `Mmarahyɛbagua no fii ase sɛ wɔrefa obscenity initiative no ka wɔ afe 2005 abd wɔkaa sɛ FBI no nhyɛda nyi nnipa 10 nsi hɔ mma mpaninfoɔ nnwamansɛm.`
---------------------- (65) ----------------------
F1: `Robin Uthappa nyaa ‘innings’ no mma a ԑwɔ soro pa ara, ‘70 runs’ wɔ ‘41 balls’ pԑ mu wɔberԑ a ɔbɔɔ ‘11 fours ԑne 2 sixes’.`
F2: `Robin Uthappa bɔɔ ne ho mmɔden paa hyɛɛe, run 70 wɔ bɔɔlo 41 pɛ muna ɔbɔɔ 11 ahorow nnan ne nsia ahorow 2.`
---------------------- (66) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa a wɔtaa di mfimfini, Sachin Tendulkar ԑne Rahul Dravid, yԑԑ adeԑ ԑnna wɔka bɔɔ mu yԑԑ 'runs' ɔha.`
F2: `Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar ne Rahul Dravid, dii agoru yiye na wɔdii nkonim bɔɔ mu.`
---------------------- (67) ----------------------

F2: `Nanso bere a wɔhweree kapitin wicket no India tumi yɛɛ runs 36, hweree wickets no 7 de mmɔden bɔ no baa awiee.`
---------------------- (68) ----------------------
F1: `U.S. Mampanin George W. Bush kɔduruu Singapore Obubuo da a ԑtɔ so 16 anɔpa, de hyԑԑ ne nnawɔtwe kyini a ɔrekɔkyini wɔ Asia no ase.`
F2: `U.S. manpanin George W. Bush bɛpuee mu wɔ Singapore wɔ Obudu 16, na ɛyɛ nnawɔtwe a na ɔrebɛdi wɔ Asia no ahyɛase.`
---------------------- (69) ----------------------

F2: `Deɛ ɔbɛhyiaa no yɛ Singapore Mansoafo Panin Abadiakyi Wong Kan Seng na wɔbɔɔ aguadi ne awurukasɛm ho nsɛm ho nkɔmmɔ na wɔne Singapore Mansoafo Panin Lee Hsien Loong na ɛtwetwee nkɔmmɔ no.`
---------------------- (70) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a ɔdii nkoguo wɔ abatoɔ a wɔyԑԑ no berԑ no mfimfini no mu nnawɔtwe akyire, Bush kaa dwadie a ɔrebԑtrԑm wɔ Asia no ho asԑm kyerԑԑ nnipa bi.`
F2: `Bere a wɔdii nkogu wɔ midtɛɛm abato mu, Bush kaa sɛnea wɔrebɛtrɛ aguadi mu wɔ Asia no mu ho asɛm.`
---------------------- (71) ----------------------
F1: `Osuafoↄ Titire Stephen Harper agye atom sɛ ↄde aban "Clean Air Act" no bɛkↄ akↄto ekuo a amanyↄkuw ahodoↄ mufoↄ wom no anim, ma wayɛ emu nhwehwɛmu ansa na n'akenkan a etↄ so mmienu no eduru soↄ, berɛ a wↄne NDP kannifoↄ Jack Layton wiee nhyiamu a edii sima 25 benada no.`
F2: `Mansoafo panin Stephen Harper ate ase sɛ ɔde aban no 'Clean Air Act' ɛma amannyɔ akuo kɔmitii ama wɔasusu ho, ansa na wɔakan no mprɛ a ɛtɔ so abien, wɔ Benada bere a wɔhyiam sima 25 a wɔne NDP kanifoJack Layton hyiaam wɔ PMO no.`
---------------------- (72) ----------------------

F2: `Layton asrɛ sɛ wɔnyɛ nsakrae wɔ conservatives no bill a ɛfa atenae ho wɔ nhyiam a wɔne PM no yɛeɛ no ase no, na ɔsrɛ sɛ Conservative amannyɔku no bill a ɛfa atenae ho no“ wɔntwerɛ no yiye na wɔnwie” .`
---------------------- (73) ----------------------
F1: `Efiri ɛberɛ a Aban a odi Ɔman Mu no so no gye too wↄn ho so sɛ wↄde sika bɛhyɛ Mersey ayaresabea a ɛwↄ Devonport, Tasmania no mu no, aban a odi nkuro so no ne Aban Mmarahyɛ Abadwafoↄ binom akasa atia saa adeyↄ yi sɛ esiane aman mu no abatoↄ a ɛbɛba so wo abubuo mu no nti na wↄhyɛɛ da yɛɛ saa.`
F2: `Ɛfiti bere a Aban no baa mu sɛ ɔrefa Mersey ayaresabea a ɛwɔ Devonport, Tasmania,siteeti aban no ne ɔman no mu MPfoɔ binom akasa atia saa ade yi ɛrekɔ ɔman no abato bere no mu a wɔbɛto no Obubuo mu no.`
---------------------- (74) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso ↄsuafoↄ titire John Howard aka sɛ wotuu anammↄn yi, de AUD$45 million pem so sɛdeɛ wↄde bɛbↄ ayaresabea no ho ban na Tasmania aban no amma anhwe ase.`
F2: `Nanso Masnsofo panin John Howard aka sɛ na boatae no ne sɛ wɔreyɛ saa na Tasmanian aban no amma no ante amma fam, ɛno nti wɔmaa no ɔpepem AUD$45.`
---------------------- (75) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ amaneɛbↄ a abɛtↄ dwa seesei kyerɛ no, berɛ a wↄhwɛɛ ɛpo no sɛdeɛ ɛforo kↄ soro ba no, ɛbedaa adi sɛ ahum tuui. Wↄgye di yie sɛ ahum bi kↄↄ so wↄ beaɛ a ɛbɛn Pago Pago ne Nuie.`
F2: `Sɛnea nsɛm aba foforo kyerɛ no, sɛnea po no akɔ soro no kyerɛ sɛ wɔyɛɛ tsunami no. Tsunami dwumadi bi kɔɔ so wɔ beae a ɛbɛn Pago Pago ne Niue.`
---------------------- (76) ----------------------
F1: `Adeseɛ anaa opira titire ho amanneɛbↄ biara nkↄↄ so wↄ Tonga, nanso wↄn anyinam kanea dundumee berɛ tiawa bi, na ɛno maa Tonga mpanyinfoↄ nsa entumi anka tsunami kↄkↄbↄ a PTWC de maeɛ no.`
F2: `Wɔmmɔɔ adesɛe kɛseɛ anaa pira biara ho amanne wɔ Tonga, nanso anyinam kanea nni hɔ, na wei amma Tonga mpaninfoɔ nsa antumi anka kɔkɔbɔ a PTWC no de maae na ɛfa tsunami no ho no.`
---------------------- (77) ----------------------

---------------------- (78) ----------------------

---------------------- (79) ----------------------

---------------------- (83) ----------------------

---------------------- (85) ----------------------

---------------------- (86) ----------------------

F2: `“Ɔno [Wales] dii atorɔ kyerɛɛ yɛn firi ahyɛase. Deɛ edi kan bere ɔyɛɛ ne ho sɛ ɛnam mmara kwan so. Deɛ ɛtɔ so abien ɔyɛɛ ne ho sɛ ɔretie yɛn, kɔsii ne art no popa no so.`
---------------------- (87) ----------------------

F2: `Kuro no abufuw na ɛkɔfaa mmɔden a wɔrebɔ sɛ wɔbɛtwerɛ nhyehyɛe foforo a ɛfa nna ho nsɛm ɛma site ɛkuro miidia ɔpepem a wɔama ho tumi krataa obiara nsa tumi sɔ so no.`
---------------------- (88) ----------------------

F2: `Adwuma no mprɛ pii na ɛyɛ theoretical, nanso wɔkyerɛw dwumadi sɛnea ɛbɛsimulate observation a wɔde Sagittarius galaxy na ayɛ.`
---------------------- (89) ----------------------

F2: `Nsunsuanso a na kuo rehwɛ kwan na tidal forces no na na ɛbɛkɔ akɔfa aba na ɛbɛda galaxy's dark mata no ne Milky Way's dark mata no ntam.`
---------------------- (90) ----------------------

---------------------- (91) ----------------------

F2: `Nyansahunufo no tumi de too gua sɛ dark mata no ɛka dark mata afoforo wɔ kwan koro no ara so te sɛ nea rɛgula mata no yɛ no.`
---------------------- (92) ----------------------

F2: `Saa theory yi ka sɛ dark mata dodoɛ no ara ɛwɔ galaxy no ho no wɔ galaxy a ɛte sɛ halo no, na ɛyɛ ɛwowɔ particles nketewa.`
---------------------- (93) ----------------------

F2: `Tɛlɛvihyin bɔ amanne sɛ show white smoke a ɛfiri afifide mu.`
---------------------- (94) ----------------------

F2: `Mpatam hɔ mpaninfo rebɔ temanmufo wɔte bɛn plant no kɔkɔ sɛ wɔntena fie, nnunnum air-conditioners na ɛnsɛ ɔnom paapo nsuo.`

---------------------- (97) ----------------------

---------------------- (98) ----------------------

F2: `Nkɔmmɔ twetwe, ɔkaa sɛ variant foforo no “ wɔ soro paa” ɛha adwene na ɛyɛ hu esiane owuo ɛwɔ soro no nti.`
---------------------- (99) ----------------------

F2: `Ɛbɛtumi aba sɛ ayeforo no nyaa bug wɔ ayaresabea,Dr. Mol dwene sɛ, na anyɛ hwee koraa emu ɛbien yɛ ayaresabea apomuden adwumayɛfo.`
---------------------- (100) ----------------------

F2: `Afe biako ntam no, nnipa yare no aka no de bɛsae nnipa 10 kɔsi 15 a wɔbɛn no pa ara.`
---------------------- (101) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, nnipa a dodoↄ a woanya tuberclosis no mu ↄha mu nkyekyɛm kakra bi pɛ na wↄwↄ XDR-TB no bi, nnipa 330,000 wↄ berɛ pↄtee bi mu nnipa 6,000 na woanya yareɛ no bi wↄ South Africa.`
F2: `XDR-TB ɔha nkyekyɛmu a ɛwɔ kuo no nyinaa mu no a wɔwɔ nsamanwa da so ara wɔ fam; nnipa 330,000 mu 6,000 na yare no aka wɔn bere bi mu wɔ South Africa.`
---------------------- (102) ----------------------
F1: `Afidie a wɔde hwɛ nneɛma nketenkete, a emu duru bɛboro 1,000 pounds, ne akwantuo wɔ 17,500 miles dɔnhwre baako biara , hyiam 491 miles wɔ Asaase suro.`
F2: `Ahunmu mfiri abien a emu duru bɛboro "pound" apem biako (1,000 pounds) na ɛtwa ne ho bɛyɛ akwansin mpem du-ason ne ahanum (17,500) dɔnhwere biara pem wɔn ho hyia pem akwansin ahannan aduokron-biako wɔ asase so wɔ wim.`
---------------------- (103) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeɛmunyansapɛfoɔ se ahyiamu a ɛde ɔtopae no ba no yɛ kɛse pa ara.`
F2: `Nyansahufo kae se, atopae a ɛhyia to bɔm no ano yɛ peme.`
---------------------- (104) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔguso rebɔ mmɔden sɛ obehu sɛnea asiane no kɛse te ne sɛnea ɛbɛka Asaase no.`
F2: `Wɔda so rehwɛhwɛ sɛnea asehwɛ kɛse no teɛ ne sɛnea aka asase no afa.`
---------------------- (105) ----------------------
F1: `United States Anamɔtuo Asoɔeɛ a ɛwɔ U.S. Asoɔeɛ ma ahobanbɔ ɔfis no ɛhwehwɛ nneɛma a asɛe.`
F2: `United States asrafopanyin dwumadie bea a ɛwɔ U.S na na hwehwɛ fi ahorow a ɛbae asasewoso no akyi mu.`
---------------------- (106) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛde nea efi "plotting analysis"(nhyehyɛe nhwehwɛmu) mu ba bɛto dwa wɔ websaete bagua.`
F2: `Sɛ wɔto hama hu sɛnea tupae no sɛe nneɛma wiei a, wɔde bɛgu abɛɛfo ahoma ntentan so.`
---------------------- (107) ----------------------
F1: `Mpaninfoↄ a wↄwↄ Ohio aka sɛ, wↄde awudie a ani yɛ nyan ho soboↄ bɛbↄ ↄyaresafoↄ bi a na ↄyɛ adwuma wↄ Children's Hospital of Pittsburg, Pennsylvania berɛ a wohuu ne maame sɛ wawu wↄ ne hyen mu beaeɛ a wↄde nneɛma hyɛ wukuada no.`
F2: `Mpaninfo a wɔwɔ Ohia ka sɛ wɔbɛbɔ dɔkota bi a ɔyɛ adwuma wɔ Mmɔfra ayaresabea wɔ Pittsburgh,Pennsylvania no kwaadu bere wɔhunu sɛ wɔadi ne maame awu de no ahyɛ ne kaa akyi Wukuada.`
---------------------- (108) ----------------------
F1: `Wohuu Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, a wadi mfeɛ 29, wↄ Blue Ash, Ohio, borↄno a ɛbɛyɛ akwansin 15 wↄ Cincinnati atifi fam sɛ ↄda fam wↄ kwan no ho a ↄhyɛ T-shirt ne deɛ wohyɛ no atadeɛ ase a na nnuru abo no.`
F2: `Wɔhunuu Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, wɔ Blue Ash, Ohio, a ɛyɛ mpatam bi a ɛyɛ maale 15 wɔ Cincinnati atifi sɛ ɔda fam wɔ kwan ho a ɔhye T-shirt na ɔhyɛ ade wɔ n’ase a na ayɛ sɛ obi a wafa aduru kɛse paa bi.`
---------------------- (109) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄkyerɛɛ apolisifoↄ kwan kↄ ne Oldsmobile Intrique tuntum no ho a na ɛwↄ akyire anammↄn 500.`
F2: `Ɔkyerɛɛ mpaninfo kwan kɔɔ Oldsmobile Intrigue a ɛyɛ tuntum no mu a na ɛwɔ fiiti no 500.`
---------------------- (110) ----------------------
F1: `Woduru hↄ no, wohunuu Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, a wↄde kuntu a mogya ayɛ mu ma akata ne ho.`
F2: `Ɛhɔ na wɔhunuu Saroja Balasubramanian, 53 sɛ wɔde kuntu bi a na mogya ayɛ no twɔnn akyekyere no.`
---------------------- (111) ----------------------
F1: `Apolisifoↄ kaeɛ sɛ ɛte sɛ deɛ nnipadua no ada ho da mu no.`
F2: `Polisifo ka sa ayɛ sɛ deɛ amu no ada hɔ bɛyɛ da koro.`
---------------------- (112) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄbↄↄ yareɛ yi amanneɛ berɛ a edi kan wↄ kitawonsa awiei mu hↄ.`
F2: `Wɔbɔɔ yare no amannebɔ sa bere yi mu wɔ Kitawonsa awiee.`
---------------------- (113) ----------------------
F1: `Mprako na wↄsoa saa yareɛ yi, na wↄde ma nnipa denam ntontom so.`
F2: `Yare no wɔ mprako mu, na ɛnam so tumi sae nnipa denam ntontom so.`
---------------------- (114) ----------------------
F1: `Nsaneyareɛ a etu atese yi ama India aban de nneɛma bi agu akwan mu a ebi ne sɛ wↄde wↄn a wↄkyere mprako akↄ beaeɛ a yareɛ no mu yɛ den, na wakyekyɛ atwamtam a wↄdi pam ntontom ne ntontom aduru mpempem.`
F2: `Yare a etuu atese no maa India aban no tu anammɔn pɛɛ wɔn a wɔbɛkyere mprako no wɔ mmeae a yare no atu ate se no, wɔakyeyɛ ntontom nnan mpempem ne nnuro a wɔde supree wɔn.`
---------------------- (115) ----------------------
F1: `Aban no ahyɛ bↄ sɛ ↄde nnuru a wↄde bↄ ban firi encephalitis ho bɛba, na ɛno bɛboa ma ayaresabea ahodoↄ no asieasie wↄn ho ama afe a edi anim no.`
F2: `Aban no ahyɛ encephalitis a ɛwowɔ ntoa nkumaa bi mu ho bɔ , a ɛbɛboa ama wɔaboaboa apomuden asoe no ano ama afeda.`
---------------------- (116) ----------------------
F1: `Nhyehyeɛ a wↄyeɛ sɛ wↄde nnuru a ɛbo yɛn ho ban firi yareɛ ho no bɛkↄ mmeaeɛ a yareɛ no aka nkurofo paa afe yei no kaa akyire esiane sikasɛm ne di a wamfa anni kan wↄ wↄn nhyehyeɛ mu sɛ yɛde toto yareɛ ahodoɛ ho a.`
F2: `Nhyehyɛe a wɔyɛɛ sɛ wɔde nnuro bɛkɔ mmeae atu atese no twetwɛnn kakra esiane sikasɛm nti ne yare no a wɔamma ɛho anhia wɔn paa kɛse te sɛ yare nkae no nti.`
---------------------- (117) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ 1956 mu no Slania tu kↄↄ Sweden, na mfeɛ mmiɛnsa akyire no ofii aseɛ ne Swedish Post Office yɛɛ adwuma na ↄbɛyɛɛ omo twerɛfoↄ panin.`
F2: `1956 mu Słania ti kɔɔ Sweden, na akyi yi ɔfii ase yɛɛ adwuma Swedish Poos Ɔfese na ɔbɛyɛɛ wɔn engraver panin.`
---------------------- (118) ----------------------

F2: `Ɔyeyɛɛ setampo no bɛboro 1,000 maa Sweden ne aman ahorow.`
---------------------- (119) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄmo agye atom sɛ n'adwumayↄ ho twa na edi mu na ↄyɛ ↄmo a ↄmo yɛ ntimsoↄ ho adwuma "a w'agye din" kakra bi no mu baako. Ebinom yɛ n'adwuma ho nimdefoↄ.`
F2: `Na n’adwuma no sɔ ani ara ɔka “nnipa kakra a wɔbɔ wɔn din no ho” wɔ wɔn a na wɔyeyɛ setaampo no mu. Ebinom ahyɛ da de wɔn ani asi sɛnea wɔbɛboaboa ne dwumadi nko ara no so.`
---------------------- (120) ----------------------
F1: `Ntimsoↄ a ɛtↄ so apem (1000) a ↄyɛɛ ho adwuma no ne "Great Deeds by Swedish Kings" a David Ehrestrahl yɛe wↄ 2000 mo a na ɛyɛ fɛ boro soↄ, na apue wↄ Guinness Book of World Records no mu.`
F2: `David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl wɔ 2000 ka sɛ ne setampo a ɛtɔ so 1,000 no yɛ fɛ “Adwuma sronn a ɛfiri Sweden Hene” na ɛwɔ Guinness Book of rɛkɔd a wɔyɛ Wiase nyinaa twerɛtohɔ wom no.`
---------------------- (121) ----------------------
F1: `Na ↄsan twerɛ wↄ sika so ma aman ahodoↄ pii, a n'adwuma a ɛnkyɛe koraa bi ne osuafoↄ kunini mfonin a eda Canada sika $5 ne $100 anim no.`
F2: `Wɔyeyɛɛ adwinni totoo amanaman sika so, ɛho nhwɛso a ɔyɛɛ no nansa yi deɛ Mansoafo Panin no mfoni a ɛda Canadian $5 sika foforo no so ne bills a ɛyɛ $100 no so no.`
---------------------- (122) ----------------------

---------------------- (123) ----------------------

---------------------- (124) ----------------------

---------------------- (125) ----------------------
F1: `Obi a na ↄyɛ adwuma wↄ beaeɛ a wↄde ahyɛn si berɛ a akwanhyia no sii no kae sɛ: "Na mmofra retwɛn sɛ wobetwa okwan no mu na na wↄreteateam resu."`
F2: `Nipa bi na ɔreyɛ adwuma wɔgaraagye bi a ɛbɛn baabi akwanhyia no siiɛ no kaa sɛ; “ Na mmɔfra bi retwɛn sɛ wɔbɛtwa kwan no mu na wɔreteatea mu na na wɔresu.”`
---------------------- (126) ----------------------

F2: `Wɔn nyinaa guan firii baabi na akwanhyia no asi no.`
---------------------- (127) ----------------------
F1: `Nsɛm afoforↄ a wobesusuw ho wↄ Bali bi ne sɛ wↄbɛgye kwaeɛ a aka wↄ wiase no, na afei wↄne aman a afei na wↄrekↄ wↄn anim no bɛkyɛ abɛɛfo nkoanim na w'atumi anya nkosoↄ a wonsɛe abↄde a etwa wↄn ho ahyia no.`
F2: `Nnɛma ahorow a ɛda pono so wɔbɛssusu ho wɔ Bali ne sɛnea wɔbɛbɔ kwae a aka wiase no ho ban, wɔne wɔn ho wɔn bɛkyekyɛ tɛknogyi na ama aman atutu mpɔn wɔ akwan ɛnsɛe nneɛma pii so.`
---------------------- (128) ----------------------
F1: `U.N pɛ sɛ ↄgye sika puduo bi tom a ɛbɛboa aman a wiase afanan nyinaa a ayɛ hyeɛ no anya wↄn so nsunsuanso no.`
F2: `U.N. no hwɛ kwan wɔn nsa bɛka sika de asɔ aman a wiase nsesae akɔfa ɔhaw abrɛ na ama wɔadi ɔhaw ɛde abrɛ wɔn yi so.`
---------------------- (129) ----------------------

F2: `Wɔde sika no bɛhyɛ afa a ɛyɛ adan a nsuo no ntumi nyiri mfa no, nsuo ho ntotoe papa na wɔaduadua nnɔbae ahorow pii.`
---------------------- (130) ----------------------
F1: `Fluke twerɛɛ sɛ mmↄden a ebinom rebↄ sɛ wↄbɛma mmaa aka wↄn ano atom wↄ mmaa apↄmuden nsɛm ho no anye yie.`
F2: `Fluke kyerɛɛw sɛ mmɔden a ebinom bɔe sɛ wɔbɛma mmea akasa a ɛfa mmea apomudenno anyɛ yiye.`
---------------------- (131) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄkaa saa esaine nsɛm a awerɛhyɛm wom na ɛhyɛ nkuran a mmaa ne mmarima nyinaa twerɛ kↄmaa no a na wↄreka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wↄyɛ nnuru a ɛboa si awoↄ ho kwan no adeɛ a ehia wↄ nnuruyɛmu.`
F2: `Ɔde saa asɛm yi too gua bere a ne nsa kaa amannebɔ firii mmea ne mmarima hɔ sɛ aduru a wɔde si nyinsɛn ano yɛ aduru bi a ɛho hia yiye paa.`
---------------------- (132) ----------------------
F1: `Ntↄkwa no baa ewieɛ berɛ a wↄde wↄn a wapirapira no kↄↄ ayaresabea, na bɛyɛ wↄn a woaka no mu 40 kaa adihↄ hↄ na wampene so sɛ wↄbɛkↄ wↄn afiase dan no mu.`
F2: `Bere a ntɔkwa no to twaae bere a wɔde apirafo no kɔɔ ayaresabea, nneduafo no a wɔaka akyi no bɛyɛ 40 na wɔyɛɛ sɛ wɔnkɔ wɔn cells no mu bio,`
---------------------- (133) ----------------------
F1: `Ntamgyinafoↄ no bↄↄ mmↄden sɛ wobesiesie tebea no, nanso wonhyɛɛda nhuu adeɛ pↄtee a nnaduafoↄ no rehwehwɛ.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔne afoforɔ kasa ma ntease yɛ adwuma no yɛɛ sɛ wɔbɛdi tebea no dwuma, nanso nea nneduafo no rehwehwɛ no mu nna hɔ.`
---------------------- (134) ----------------------
F1: `Nnaduafoↄ no hyɛɛ ogya bi ase wↄ adihↄ hↄ, firi 10:00 pm kosi 11:00 pm MDT.`
F2: `Ɛbɔɔ bɛyɛ anwummere 10:00-11:00 MDT, nneduafo no de ogya too beae hɔ.`
---------------------- (135) ----------------------
F1: `Ankyɛ, apolisifoↄ a wↄwↄ nneɛma a wↄde ko tia basabasayɛ wuraa adihↄ hↄ na wↄde "tear gas" kaa nnaduafo no hyɛɛ mu.`
F2: `Ankyɛ koraa na adwumayɛfo a wɔakwdare wɔ sɛnea wɔsi basabasayɛ ano no wuraa yaade no mu na wɔde tear gas dii dwuma de dii nneduafo no so nkunim.`
---------------------- (136) ----------------------

F2: `Dumgyafo tumi dumm gya no bere a ɛbɔɔ anwummere 11:35.`
---------------------- (137) ----------------------

F2: `Bere a wɔsii dam no afe 1963 no, nsuo a bere ano bere ano a ne sediment no ɛbɛtrɛ akɔ asubɔnten mu no gyae.`
---------------------- (138) ----------------------

F2: `Na sediments no hia na wɔatumi ayeyɛ sandbars ne beaches a na ɛyɛ bea a mmoa de yɛ wɔn atenae.`
---------------------- (139) ----------------------

---------------------- (140) ----------------------

F2: `Ɛwom so sɛ nsuo ba soro bere nsu ayire no de, mpanimfo gye di sɛ ɛbɛyɛ sɛ ɛma sandbars a ahohoro asi ne dada mu.`
---------------------- (141) ----------------------
F1: `Wammmↄ Ahum ho kↄkↄ biara, na sedeɛ "geophysics" asoeɛ a ewↄ Jakarta kyerɛ no, wↄremmmↄ ahum no ho kↄkↄ efiri sɛ asasewosoↄ no ahoↄden no annuru 6.5 a wↄhwehwɛ no.`
F2: `Wɔmɔɔ tsunami ho kɔkɔ biara, na sɛnea Jakarta geophysics asoɛ no kyerɛ no, wɔmmɔ tsunami biara ho kɔkɔ esiane sɛ asase woso no nnuru magnitude 6.5 ahwehwɛde no ho.`
---------------------- (142) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ ahum rentu no, ehu kaa temanmufoↄ no na wↄhyɛɛ aseɛ firii wↄn nwuma mu ne wↄn afie mu.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ asaasewosow a esii wↄ po mu biara nni hɔ no, temanmufo no fii ase bɔɔ hu na wɔguan gyaa wɔn nnwuma na wɔfifii wɔn afie mu.`
---------------------- (143) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ na Winfrey ani atetɛ berɛ a na ↄredi nkra no, ↄmaa n'akyidifoↄ no hunuiɛ pefee sɛ ↄbɛsan aba bio.`
F2: `Ɛwom sɛ na Winfrey werɛ aho wɔ ne nkradi a etwa to no mu, ɔmaa n’akyitaa fo tee ase sɛ ɔbɛsan aba.`
---------------------- (144) ----------------------

---------------------- (145) ----------------------

F2: `Nsunsuanso a etwa to a efiri Namibia ɔmanpanin ne mmarahyɛbagua abato no kyerɛ sɛ ɔmanpanin a ɔte agua so no Hifikepunye Pohamba adi nkunim na mma ɔde dii nkunim no dɔɔso paa yiye.`
---------------------- (146) ----------------------

F2: `Amannyɔku a ɛredi tumi a ɛyɛ South West Africa People's Organisation (SWAPO), tumi nyaa mmarahyɛbagua nkongua dodow no ara wɔ abato no mu.`
---------------------- (147) ----------------------
F1: `Amanaman a woaka abom ne Afganistan asraafoↄ kↄbↄↄ beaeɛ hↄ ban na wↄn wiemhyɛn ahodoↄ nso bi nam kwan so rebɛboa.`
F2: `Coalition ne Afghan asraafo kɔ beae hɔ kɔgyee hɔ bɔɔ so na ɔsomaa coalition afoforo wimhyɛn sɛ ɛnkɔ hɔ nkɔ boa.`
---------------------- (148) ----------------------
F1: `Akwanhyia no sii wↄ soro wↄ beaeɛ a mmepↄ wↄ paa, na wↄgye di sɛ ogya a woantumi ansↄ ano na ɛde baeɛ.`
F2: `Nkwanhyia no sii wɔ mmeae a na ɛhɔ yɛ mmepɔ mmepɔ, na wɔgye di ɛno na ɛkɔ faa gya hyehyeɛ no baae.`
---------------------- (149) ----------------------
F1: `Ewiem tebea a enyɛ papa ne asase no ani so a ayɛ basaa ama mmↄden a wↄrebo sɛ wↄbehwehwɛ beaeɛ a akwanhyia no siiɛ no ayɛ den.`
F2: `Mmɔden wɔrebɔ sɛ wɔbɛhunu beae a nkwanhyia no sii no nyɛ yiye esiane wim tebea a ɛnyɛ papa nti.`
---------------------- (150) ----------------------
F1: `Medical Charity Mangola, Medicines Sans Frontieres ne World Health Organization kyerɛ sɛ nsaneyareɛ enye koraa a ate asi kuro no mu.`
F2: `Medical charity Mangola no, Medecines Sans Frontieres ne Wiase Apomuden Ahyehyɛde no ka sɛ ɛyɛ biribi esen biara a asi wɔ ɔman no mu.`
---------------------- (151) ----------------------
F1: `Kasamafo ma Medecines Sans Frontieres Richard Veerman kae se: "Yei bɛyɛ nsaneyareɛ a ate asi Angola a ɛsen biara na ↄkae nso sɛ tebea no nnyɛ koraa wo Angola".`
F2: `Kasamafo ma Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman kaa sɛ: “ Angola rekɔ baabi a ɛyɛ hu a na asɛm da so ara nnyɛ wɔ Angola,ɔno na ɔkae.`
---------------------- (152) ----------------------
F1: `Agokansie no hyɛaseɛ anɔpa nnɔndu ne wiem tebea ɛyɛ paa ne annɔpa bosuo a antɔ ankyɛ no, na ɛyɛ da sronko ma 7's rugby.`
F2: `Akansi no fii ase anɔpa nnɔndu (10:00am) na wim yɛ kama pa agye nsu kakra a pete anɔpa tutuutu no. Na da no yɛ kama 7’s rugby.`
---------------------- (153) ----------------------
F1: `Akansie dikanfo South Africa shɛ ase wɔ kwan pa so bere a wonyaa ahotɔ nkonimdi 26 - 00 tia akansie kuo a ɔto so num Zambia.`
F2: `South Africa man no bɔɔ wɔ ho mmɔden mfitiase pɛɛ, ɛno nti ɛma wɔhyɛɛ aduonu asia (26) de dii nkonim a Zambia man no antumi ante ɛka no mu biako mpo.`
---------------------- (154) ----------------------
F1: `Wotumi hunu sɛ na woa we nnaakyene wo agokansie a etia wɔn akyerɛbaa anaafoɔ, nanso South Africa tɔɔ so tu mpɔn bere a akansie nyaa nkan kɔ no.`
F2: `Akansi no mu yɛ den wɔ South Africafo fam ne wɔ nuammanom a wɔwɔ anafo fam no bɔ wɔ ho mmɔden tu mpɔn bere a na akansi no kɔ anim no.`
---------------------- (155) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛnea wɔtwe wɔn ho fi afoforo ho bo wɔn ho ban, bɔɔl a wɔde di nkitaho ne sɛnea ɔka wɔn ho bom yɛ adwuma a ɛtwa yie ma wɔn yɛ adutwam maa no da adi pefee sɛ wei ne ekuo a wɔhwee wɔn.`
F2: `Ɔkwan a bɔɔlobɔfo fa so danedane bɔɔlo no, bɔ wɔn bea ho ban wɔ agoprama no so, sɛnea wɔn nnyinaa bɔɔmu yɛ adwuma wɔ agoprama no so no, na ɛyɛ sononko koraa ɛma no da adi sɛ wɔn na wɔbɛdi nkonim wɔ akansi no awie.`
---------------------- (156) ----------------------

---------------------- (205) ----------------------

F2: `ℇde fa asɛm a wɔde kɔɔ asɛnnibea ne sɛ, efi a ɛfi UN nsraban a w’ankora so yiye nti na ɛmaa efi wura asubɔnten Artibonite a ɛyɛ Haiti asubɔnten akɛse no mu biako.`

F2: `Xinhua bɔ amanne sɛ Wukuada no aban nhwehwɛmutɛfo ahunu wimhyɛn ‘black box' abien .`
---------------------- (319) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔbɔ akuturuku nkaeɛ no kɔgyamm Luna ne wuo akyi.`
F2: `Wrestlers a wɔne di agoru nso daa wɔn yaakɔ nsɛm adi faa Luna ho.`
---------------------- (320) ----------------------
F1: `Tommy Dreamer kaa sɛ "Luna ɛna na ɛyɛ Queen of Extreme a ɔdi kan. Me hwɛsofoɔ a ɔdi kan. Luna wuu bosome mmienu akyi anwummerɛ. Ɛyɛ ade soronko te sɛ ɔno ara. Ɔbaa hoɔdenfoɔ."`
F2: `Tommy Dreamer kaa sɛ” Na Luna yɛ Queen of Extreme a ɔdi kan. Me kwankeyrɛfo a ɔdi kan. Luna gyaa mu wɔ asramo abien anadwo. Na ɔda nso. Ɔbea na ne ho yɛden.”`
---------------------- (321) ----------------------
F1: `Dustin "Goldust" Runnels kaa sɛ "Na Luna pɛ anigyeɛ tesɛ me ara…ebia ɛboro saa…medɔ no na mɛfe no…megye di sɛ ɔwɔ tenabea pa."`
F2: `Dustin "Goldust" Runnels kaa sɛ “Na freakyte sɛ me... ebia na ɔkyɛn me koraa... medɔ no na mɛfe no... megye di sɛ ɔwɔ baabi a somdwoe ɛwɔ.`
---------------------- (322) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛfa nnipa 1,400 a wɔtwerɛɛ wɔn ansaana 2010 abatoɔ no a, wɔn a wɔmpene so sɛ Australia bɛbu ne man no nea kuro mma pɛ no so kɔɔ soro 8% firi afe 2008 mu reba.`
F2: `Nnipa 1,400 a ansa na wɔre to aba 2010 no, wɔn a na wɔmpene so sɛ Australia mmɛyɛ adehyeman no nyaa nkɔanim ɔha nkyekɛyɛmu 8 wɔ 2008 mu.`
---------------------- (323) ----------------------
F1: `Mansoafoɔ panin a na ɔyɛ hwɛsofoɔ, Julia Gillard, daa nsɛm bi adi wɔ ntoabɔ a ɔbɔeɛ wɔ 2010 abatoɔ mu sɛ ɔgye di sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ Australia bu ne man fa ɔmanmma nsusuiɛ ho sɛ Ohemaa Elizabeth II adedie kɔ n’awieeɛ a.`
F2: `Ɔmansofa Panin a ɔrehwɛ akyi Julia Gillard kaa sɛ wɔ 2010 abato ntoabɔ no mu no, ɔgye di sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ Australia bɛyɛ adehyeman wɔ Ɔhemaa Elizabeth II nniso awiee.`
---------------------- (324) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔha mu abupɛn 34 na wɔgye saa nsusuiɛ yi tom, sɛ wɔpɛ sɛ Ohemaa Elizabeth II yɛ ɔhempɔn a ɔtwa toɔ.`
F2: `Nnipa a wɔgyina hɔ ma ɔha nkyekyɛmu 34 kura adwene sɛ,wɔpɛ sɛ Ɔhemaa Elizabeth II yɛ ɔhemaa a ɔbɛtwa to wɔ Australia.`
---------------------- (325) ----------------------
F1: `Abatoɔ no mu yɛɛ den no, ɔha mu abupɛn 29 a wɔtoto wɔn ano no gyedi sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ ɔmanfoɔ nsusuiɛ na yɛde bu Australia man no anim anim yi ara, wɔ aberɛ a ɔha mu abupɛn 31 nso ne wɔn nyɛ adwene.`
F2: `Abato no gyina mu wɔ ne mpɔnpɔn so no, ɔha nkyɛkyɛmu 29 na ɔkaa sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ Autalia bɛyɛ adehyeman anim anim yi ara, na ɔha nkyekyɛmu 31 nso kyerɛ sɛ ɛnsɛ sɛ Australia ɛbɛyɛ adehyman da.`
---------------------- (326) ----------------------
F1: `Onipa a ɔgyee sikakɔkɔɔ abasobɔdeɛ kɛseɛ pa ara no nyaa saa abasobɔdeɛ no ɛnam 100m ne 200m nsuomudware akansie a wɔde kyerɛ bɔberɛ, ne nnadaaho mmiɛnsa a wɔyɛ no wɔ Commonwealth Agokansie mu, nanso ɛnam nkuro a ɔbɔɔeɛ no nti ama n’apomden no atɔ kyima kakra.`
F2: `Na bere aso sɛ obi na wagye sikakɔɔ abasobɔde wɔ Olympic akansi mu kɔ guare nsu mu wɔ 100m ne 200m freestyle akansi no mu na wɔ relays abiɛsa mu wɔ Commonwealth Akansi no mu, nanso esiane ne kɔmpleen nti wɔnhunu n’apomuden no so yiye.`
---------------------- (327) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔntumi mfa nnuro a ɛho hia sɛ ɛboa ma ne yaw no korɔ no esiane sɛ wabra wɔ agokansie no mu.`
F2: `Ɔntumi mfa nnuro a ɛbɛma yeaw no so ate esiane sɛ wɔbra wɔ sɛ obi bɛnom wɔ akansi no mu.`
---------------------- (328) ----------------------
F1: `Curtis Cooper a ɔkyerɛ nkontabuo ne kɔmputa abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛ wɔ University of Central Missouri, ahunu ‘prime’ nɔma a ɛso pa ara bɛsi nnɛ wɔ Ɔpɛpɔn 25 mu.`
F2: `Ɛbɛduruu Ɔpɛpɔn 25 no,Curtis Coope ɔyɛ prɔfeɛsa wɔ nkotabu ne kɔmpta sɔience mu wɔ Central Missouri Suapɔn mu na ɛde prime nɔma a ɛs o paa yɛnim aba.`
---------------------- (329) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa bebree nam kɔmputa nkorabata a yɛtumi sɔ mu ne nea yɛntumi nsɔ mu so de sii n’adehunu no so dua wɔ Ɔgyefoɔ bosome ahyɛaseɛ na wɔbɔɔ ho dawuro Benada.`
F2: `Nnipa pii na wɔnam hardware ne software ahorow so asɔ wei ahwɛ wɔ Ogyefuo mfiase na wɔde too gua Benada no,`
---------------------- (330) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔgye di sɛ ‘Comet’ na ɛnam so ma nsuo ba asase so, na ɛne adeɛ bi a ɛtumi ma yɛ nnipa dua mu ahoɔden na ɛbɔ nkwa ho ban na ɛdi dwuma bom.`
F2: `Comets bɛtumi ayɛ baabi nsu firi ɛba asase yi so ne organic matter ɛbɛtumi ayɛ protens na aboa nkwa.`
---------------------- (331) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeɛ mu nhwehwɛmufoɔ pɛsɛ wɔhunu ɔkwan a akyinsoromma ba, nkanka sɛnea ewiase baeɛ, esianesɛ ‘comets’ taa ne asase hyia firi mmere santen.`
F2: `Nyasahunufo pɛsɛ wɔde sɛdeɛ okyinsromma a fɔɔme, ne titire sɛnea Asase ɛfɔɔme, esiane sɛ comets ne Asase di ahyia bere ten atwam.`
---------------------- (332) ----------------------
F1: `Cuomo, 53, hyɛɛ ne mampanin dwumadie ase afe yi ahyɛaseɛ na wadane mmara bi adi bosome a atwam a ɛkyerɛ sɛ mmarima anaa mmaa mmienu bɛtumi aware.`
F2: `Cuomo, 53 firii n’amammuo ase afe yi mfiase na ɔde ne nsa hyɛɛ mmara ɛma nnipa wɔn bɔbease yɛ pɛ tumi ware ase.`
---------------------- (333) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkaa sɛ saa atesɛm no yɛ "amanyɔ nsɛnkeka ne nsɛmhunu".`
F2: `Ɔka faa huhunu no sɛ ɛyɛ "ɛyɛ amammansɛm mu nsɛm a ɛsɛ wɔbɔ to gu baabi na ntease nnim”.`
---------------------- (334) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛretete no mframa mu sɛ ɔpɛ sɛ ɔbɛyɛ mampanin wɔ afe 2016 mu.`
F2: `Ayɛ huhu sɛ ɔbɛgyina apre ɔman panin 2016.`
---------------------- (335) ----------------------
F1: `NextGens yɛ adeɛ bi a FFA reka sɛ ɛbɛboa ama wiemhyɛn atu afa mmea a wɔtoto atuo na akɔ agye fangoo ɔpepe afe biara afiri ɔsɛeɛ mu na asane nso ate mframa bɔne a ɛsɛe mframa pa so.`
F2: `NextGen yɛ ade bi FAA no kyerɛ sɛ ɛbɛtumi ama wimhyɛn no atu nkwan a ɛnwowa na ɛbɛdi fango pii a wɔde di dwuma no na ate carbon emissions no so.`
---------------------- (336) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛde mfididwuma mu nkɔanim sɛtelaite na ɛdi dwuma na mmom ɛnyɛ tete kwan so a na wɔde mfididwuma mu nkɔanim a na ɛnam fɔm di dwuma no, sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ ɛbɛma mfidie a ɛhwɛ wiemhyɛn dwumadie so wɔ wiem atumi ayɛ n’adwuma fann na ama wiemhyɛnkafoɔ nsɛm korɔgyee a mfomsoɔ biara nni ho.`
F2: `Ɛde satellite-based technology na edi dwuma na ɛnte sɛ ground-radar-based technology dada no na ɛma air traffic controllers no kwanma wɔkyerɛ wimhyɛn kwan yiye na wɔatumi ne pilot no adi nkitaho yiye.`
---------------------- (337) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔmfaa beaeɛ a ɛbɛgyina nea ɛtɔ so nkaa ho, na keteke a ɛnam asase ase nso nnyina wɔ Wembley, na kaa nnyina na afei nso yɛnnya baabi a yɛde kaa bɛsisi wɔ beaeɛ hɔ.`
F2: `Wɔmfa transport biara ny adwuma na overground keteke nnyina wɔ Wembley na baabi a wɔde kaa sisi ne Park- and -ride bea nso biara nni hɔ.`
---------------------- (338) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔhu a na ɛtaa akyire sɛ nnipa nnya kaa mforo no maa sɛ wɔreyɛ akansie kokoam no maa ne ho mene so a akyitaafoɔ nka ho.`
F2: `Ahyɛn ho ɛho bɛyɛ den ma wɔhunuu sɛ anhwɛ wɔbɛsi aka bere kuo ankyitaafo nni hɔ na wɔatoto apono no mu.`
---------------------- (339) ----------------------
F1: `Adesuadeɛ bi a wɔdaa no adi Yawoada no wɔ koowaa krataa a ɛfa abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɔ mu daa no adi sɛ nnomaa foforɔ bi apue mu wɔ Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands.`
F2: `Nhwehwɛmu bi a journal Science de gua no kyerɛ mu sɛ wɔayɛ nnoma afoforo bi wɔ Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands.`
---------------------- (340) ----------------------
F1: `Adeusa nhwehwɛmufoɔ a wɔfiri Princeton University a ɛwɔ Amɛrika ne Uppsala University a ɛwɔ Sweden kaa sɛ saa nnomaa foforɔ pueeɛ bɛyɛ mfeɛ kakra akyi, mmom wɔgye di sɛ saa nsusuiɛ no akyɛ kakra deɛ, ɛnam mmoawa Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, aboawa cactus finch a wabɛfra mu ne Geospiza conirostris awoɔ nnidisoɔ.`
F2: `Nhwehwɛmuyɛfo a wɔwɔ Princeton Suapɔn mu wɔ United States ne Uppsala Suapɔn mu wɔ Sweden bɔ amanne sɛ no yɛ generation abien pɛ, na wɔsusu saa kwan yi adi akyɛ paa de, esiane breedindg a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes ne immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.`
---------------------- (341) ----------------------
F1: `Wobɛtumi asesa sika kɔkɔɔ afaafa ahodoɔ pii. Wobɛtumi nso asese no ayɛ no nketenkete.`
F2: `Wɔbɛtumi de sikakɔɔ ayeyɛ sheepu ahorow bebree. Ɛbɛtumi ayeyɛ sheepu nkenkete.`
---------------------- (342) ----------------------
F1: `Wobɛtumi adane no ama ayɛ sɛ ahoma, a yɛbɛtumi akoa mu nea yɛpɛ. Yɛbɛtumi abobɔ so anaa abaebae mu ama ayɛ traa.`
F2: `Wɔbɛtumi de ato thin wire so, na yɛbɛtumi asesa mu na ayɛ no foforo ‘plaited’. Yɛbɛtumi abobɔ so na yɛabobɔ ama ayɛ sheets.`
---------------------- (343) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛbɛtumi ama no ayɛ traa ama atare dadeɛ afoforɔ so. Yɛtumi yɛ no tea pa ara ma ɔtɔ da koraa a yɛtumi de siesie mfonii a yɛde yɛn nsa ayɛ wɔ nwoma bi mu a yɛfrɛ no "nwoma yɛn ankasa ayɛ a ɛte yerɛyerɛw".`
F2: `Yɛbetumi ama ayɛ ketekete, na yɛde fam dade no ho. Yɛbɛtumi ama no ayɛ ketewa paa ma ɛtɔ mmerɛ bi a yɛbɛtumi de asiesie mfoni a yɛde nsa apeint no ho wɔ nwoma yɛfrɛ no "illuminated manuscripts no mu".`
---------------------- (344) ----------------------
F1: `Wei na wɔfrɛ no ‘chemical pH’ no. Wobɛtumi ayɛ adeɛ a ɛda biribi adi wɔ berɛ a wode ‘red cabbage juice’ reyɛ.`
F2: `Wei na yɛfrɛ no chemical's pH no. Wobɛtumi ayɛ ndiketa bere a wode cabbage juice kɔkɔɔ reyɛ adwuma.`
---------------------- (345) ----------------------
F1: `‘Cabbage juice’ no sesa n’ahosuo de kyerɛ sɛ adeɛ no ‘acidic’ anaa ‘basic’ (alkaline).`
F2: `Cabbage juice ahosuo no sesa na egyina sɛnea sɛde ɛ acidicanaasɛ basic (alkaline) kɛmikaa no siteɛ so.`
---------------------- (346) ----------------------
F1: `‘Hydrogen ions’ dodoɔ a ɛwɔ adeɛ no mu na ɛkyerɛ ne ‘pH level’ (the H in pH).`
F2: `Deɛ ɛkyerɛ pH lɛɛvoo no ne Hydrogen (H no a ɛwɔ pH mu no) ions a ɛwɔ kɛmikaa a yɛasɔ ahwɛ mu no.`
---------------------- (347) ----------------------
F1: `‘Hydrogen ions’ yɛ ‘protons’ are wɔahwere wɔn ‘electrons’ (esiane sɛ ‘Hydrogen atoms’ kura ‘Proton baako ne ‘electron’ baako).`
F2: `Hydrogen ions no yɛ protons na wɔyi electron n o afiri mu (ɛfiri sɛ Hydrogen atoms wɔ proto biako ne electron baako).`
---------------------- (348) ----------------------
F1: `Nu paada a a woɔ no mmienu bom na afei, fa nsa a ɛho awoɔ bobɔ no kurukuruwa.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ dry powdwes abien no wokyeakyea ‘swirl’ no ɛsɛ wo nsa ho afɔ na ɛhɔ te na nkekae biara nni ho, kyim wɔn gu bɔɔ mu.`
---------------------- (349) ----------------------
F1: `Nsuo kakra a ɛwɔ wo nsa ho no ne adeɛ no akyi bɛdi ahyia, na ama no asesa kakra na adane biribi tesɛ abena.`
F2: `Wo nsa ɛho afɔ no ne outer layers no bɛreact, na ɛbɛyɛ funnu na ɛbɛfɔɔme biribi te sɛ shell.`
---------------------- (350) ----------------------
F1: `Na nkuro bi te sɛ Harappa and Mohenjo-daro wɔ abɛɛfo tiefi wɔ afie biara mu a na wɔde mmɔnka pepeafo nso aka ho.`
F2: `Kurom te sɛ Harappa ne Mohenjo-daro wowɔ agyananbea a wotumi flahe wɔ afie biara mu, na ɛmubiara wɔ sewage sistɛm a ɛyɛ papa paa.`
---------------------- (351) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛda so hunu mmɔnka yi ho adeɛ binom wɔ afie ahodoɔ mu wɔ Minoan nkuro a ɛwɔ Crete ne Santorini a ɛwɔ Greece.`
F2: `Yɛahunu sewage sistɛm ase nkae wɔ afie a ɛwowɔ Minioan nkuro mu a ɛne Create ne Santorini ɛwɔ Greece mu.`
---------------------- (352) ----------------------
F1: `Na tete mmerɛ mu Egypt, Persia ne Chinafoɔ nso wɔ tiefi wɔ wɔn afie mu. Wɔ Roman anibue berɛ mu no, na wɔtaa de tiefi hyɛ adwareeɛ ma mmaa ne mmarima nyinaa tu fra kɔ mu.`
F2: `Na agyananbea wowɔ tete Egypt,Percia ne China. Roman anibue mu no, na ɛtɔ da a agyananbea ɛka wɔ afie mmarimma ne mmeae wɔ faako no mu.`
---------------------- (353) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wofrɛ obi a wo ne ne ntam kwan ware bɛyɛ kwansini mpem a, na wode ‘satellite’ na ɛredi dwuma.`
F2: `Sɛ wofrɛ obi a ɔwɔ maale a ɛwɔ akyikyi baabi no, na wode satelite na ɛredi dwuma.`
---------------------- (354) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ‘satellite’ yi a ɛwɔ wiem no di kan nya ɔfrɛ no na adane no aba asase so mpofirim.`
F2: `Satelite sno a ɛwɔ wim no nya ɔfrɛ no na asane aba fam, amono mu hɔ ara.`
---------------------- (355) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde afidie a yɛde kɔ wiem na ɛde ‘satellite’ yi kɔɔ soro. Abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛfoɔ de ‘telescope’ na ɛdi dwuma wɔ wiem ɛfiri sɛ wiem nsakraeɛ mma yɛnhunu nkanea ne ne hyerɛn yie.`
F2: `Rocket na wɔsomaa no maa ɛde satelite no kɔɔ wim. Nyanshunufo de telescope di dwuma wɔ wim esiane sɛ Asase atmophere no bi si yɛn kane ne adehwɛ kwan.`
---------------------- (356) ----------------------
F1: `Ansa na afidie a yɛde kɔ wiem a ɛso pa ara bɛtumi de ‘satellite’ anaa ‘telescope’ abɔ wiem no, ɛwɔ sɛ ɛkɔ soro bɛyɛ anmmɔn 100.`
F2: `Ɛgye rocket a ɛso paa bɛboro fiit 100 na satelite anaasɛ telescope akɔsɛn wim.`
---------------------- (357) ----------------------
F1: `Kaa asesa nneɛma bebree wɔ wiase yi mu wɔ akwan pii so. Deɛ ɛsombo pa ara kaa ayɛ ne sɛ, ama yɛn akwantuo ayɛ mmrɛ asane nso ayɛ ntɛm.`
F2: `Wheel no asesa siase no akwan ahorow bebree so. Ade kɛse biako wheel no ayɛ ne sɛ ɛma akwantu kɔ ntɛm.`
---------------------- (358) ----------------------
F1: `Abrɛ yɛn keteke, kaa, ne mfidie ahodoɔ bebree a yɛde tu kwan.`
F2: `Ama yɛanya keteke, kaa ne akwantu ho nnwinade afoforo pii.`
---------------------- (359) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn ase na mmoa a wɔwe mmoa foforɔ a wɔyԑ hɔ ne hɔ hyԑ na wɔwe mmoa hɔ ne hɔ bi te sԑ nnanko, atwe ne ɔforoteԑ.`
F2: `Deɛ ɛwɔ wɔn ase ne nkra a wɔyɛ ɛhɔ ne hɔ na wɔdi mmoa te sɛ nnanko kɔ si atwe ne nnwasane so.`
---------------------- (360) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑtwa toɔ, yɛwɔ nnyinammoa nketewa (a afiboa a wɔnni hwɛsofoɔ ka ho) a wɔwe mmoa foforɔ nketewa pii wɔ hɔ a wɔwe mmoa nketewa bi te sԑ, nkoekoeboa, akuransԑsoɔ, nkoterԑ ne nnomaa.`
F2: `Nkra nkuma wowɔ hɔ (a ayɛnmmoa a wɔato wɔn agyeegyee mu ka ho) a wɔn nso edi mmoa nkenkkete te sɛ mmoa mmoa,rodɛnts, nkotrɛ ne nnomaa.`
---------------------- (361) ----------------------
F1: `Adeԑ a ԑma wɔkɔ so ne deԑ yԑfrԑ no ‘niche’ no, ԑyԑ adwumason a mmoa no mu biara die a ɔne afoforɔ mpere ho.`
F2: `Wɔn asumasɛm nyinaa ne niche, adwuma sono bi a ɔkra kura ɛmma ɔne afoforo nsi akan.`
---------------------- (362) ----------------------
F1: `Gyata ne mmoa no mu deԑ wɔfa ayɔnkoɔ pa ara, wɔtena akuo bebree a yԑfrԑ no ‘prides’.`
F2: `Sebɔ ne sohyia nkra paa, a wɔwɔ akuo a wɔfrɛ wɔn prides mu.`
---------------------- (363) ----------------------
F1: `‘Prides’ no yԑ mmarima mpanimfoɔ no baako kɔsi mmiԑnsa a wɔbɔ abusua, na mmaa aduasa ne wɔn mma ka ho.`
F2: `Prides mu no mmarima a wɔnyinnyini ne mmea bɛyɛ aduasa ne cubs na wɔwowɔ mu.`
---------------------- (364) ----------------------
F1: `Mmaa no taa hwe bom ma wɔyԑ abusua kԑseԑ a wɔyԑ nnua mmaa ne mma mmaa.`
F2: `Mmea no ne wɔn ho wɔn ho bɔ abusua., wɔtumi yɛ abusua biako mu fo a wɔyɛ anuanom mmea ne mma mmea.`
---------------------- (365) ----------------------
F1: `Gyata ‘pride’ no yԑ adwuma te sԑ sakraman anaa nkraman a wɔte sԑ gyata (na mmom nyԑ mmoa akԑseԑ nkaeԑ no) wɔ suban mu, ԑnna wɔn ho yԑ hu ma mmoa a wɔkye wɔn no.`
F2: `Prides sebɔ yɛ wɔn ho sɛ mpataku anaasɛ nkraman, mmoa wɔsɛ sebɔ (nanso ɛnyɛ nkram nkae) wɔ suban na wɔn ho yɛ hu paa ma mmoa wɔkye wɔn we no.`
---------------------- (366) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔsebɔ bԑtumi aforo dua (nanso nyԑ pa ara), adware nsuom, ahuru kԑseԑ, ԑnna ɔwɔ ahoɔden kyԑn nnipa mprԑ nnum.`
F2: `Wɔyɛ akansifo a ɔtumi yɛ biribiara, sebɔ no tumi foforo (ɛnyɛ pii saa de), guare nsu, tumi hurihuri kɔ akyi na etumi twe ade boro nnipa de so mprɛ nnum.`
---------------------- (367) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔsebɔ ne gyata, kankane, ne ‘gyagua’ na wɔwɔ ekuo baako (Genus Panthera) mu. Saa mmoa nnan yi nko ara na wɔtumi bobom.`
F2: `Gyata wɔ ku korɔ no ara mu (Genus Panthera) te sɛ sebɔ, leopards ne jaguars. Saa nkra anan yi na wɔbwtumi su teateamu kyɛ.`
---------------------- (368) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔsebɔ mmobom no nte sԑ gyata deԑ kԑseԑ no na mmom ԑte sԑ deԑ ɔreyԑ ɔkasamu anaa ɔreka nsԑm bi no.`
F2: `Sebɔ su nteateamu nte sɛ gyata a rebɔ mu, ɛte sɛ obi a ne bo afu na ɔreteatea mu.`
---------------------- (369) ----------------------
F1: `‘Ocelots’ taa we mmoa nketewa. Sԑ wɔbԑtumi a, wɔkye nnoe, awɔ, akuransԑsoɔ ԑne nnomaa. Mmoa a ‘ocelot’ kye wɔn no nyinaa yԑ nketewa sene no.`
F2: `Ocelats pɛ mmoa nkete we. Sɛ anka wɔtumi tu a an wɔbɛɔkye nnoe,awɔwɔ, rodɛnts ne nnomaa.`
---------------------- (370) ----------------------
F1: `Abɔdeԑ mu nyansapԑfoɔ dwene sԑ ‘ocelot’ de pampan ne fam ahuahua (mmoa a wɔwe) na nya mmoa kye wɔn we.`
F2: `Nyansahunufo susu ocelots yi mmoa wɔkye wɔn no ho mpanpan, hwiahwia baabi wɔafa wɔ asase so.`
---------------------- (371) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔhunu adeԑ anadwo pa ara ԑnna wɔnante wɔ kwan a afoforɔ nhu no nso so. Kwan a ‘ocelot’ fa so kye mmoa ne sԑ, wɔde wɔn ho fra baabi a wɔwɔ no na wɔato ahyԑ mmoa no so.`
F2: `Sɛ eduru anadwo a wɔtumi hunu ade yiye na wɔ na ɔnam nwaanwaa nso. Ocelots no kɔ tɛ mmoa no mmeae a mmoa no wɔ no na wɔto hyɛn wɔn.`
---------------------- (372) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ nneԑma a nkwa wowɔ mu kuo ketewa bi (wɔn dodoɔ yԑ kakra bi) yera firi dodoɔ no a wɔfiri mu no a (te sԑ, sԑ wɔkɔfa mmepɔ bi so anaa asuo bi ho anaa wɔkɔ asase foforɔ a wɔntumi nsane wɔn akyi mma bio a) mpԑn pii baabi a wɔakɔduru no bԑdane baabi foforɔ ma wɔn.`
F2: `Sɛ ku nneɛma nkwa wom ketewa bi (a ɛyɛ ketewa bi) te wɔn ho firi ku kɛse no a wɔfiri mu no ho a (sɛ ebia wɔfiri bepɔ bi mu anaasɛ nsu anaasɛ sɛ wɔkɔ island foforɔ bi so a wɔntumi nsan mma wɔn nkyi) wɔkɔ tena baabi foforɔ a wɔntum mma beae a na wɔwɔ kan no.`
---------------------- (373) ----------------------
F1: `Saa baabi foforɔ yi wɔ nneԑma ԑne wɔn a wɔne wɔn bԑpere ho foforɔ nti wɔbԑhia sԑ wɔdane wɔn ho foforɔ sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a wɔbԑtumi ne afoforɔ no apere sene sԑdeԑ na wɔyԑ no kane no.`
F2: `Atenae foforo no wɔ akade ne akansifo afoforo, ne saa nti dɔm foforo na behia feature afoforo anaasa ɛsɛ sɛ wɔadɔpti akansifo a wɔyɛ den kyɛn de na wɔwɔ dada no.`
---------------------- (374) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn dodoɔ no nsesae koraa, wɔda so hia sԑdeԑ na wɔteԑ dada no ara.`
F2: `Dɔ a na ɛyɛ oregyinaa no nsesaae koraa, wɔhia adapation koro no sɛ kan no.`
---------------------- (375) ----------------------
F1: `Akyire yi sԑ ekuo foforɔ no hyԑ aseԑ hunu baabi foforɔ no tena a, wɔhyԑ aseԑ sԑ wɔresesa afiri ekuo dodoɔ no ho.`
F2: `Bere kɔ so no sɛ dɔm foforo no ho ggye atenae foforo no a, wɔnhwehwɛ pii na saa n ku nkae no te.`
---------------------- (376) ----------------------
F1: `Afei, mfeԑ mpempem anaa ɔpepem akyire no, saa akuo yi mmienu sesa koraa a wontumi nka sԑ wɔyԑ baako.`
F2: `Mfe mpempen anaasɛ mfe ɔpepem pii akyi no dɔm abien no bɛsesa ayɛ foforo a wɔnka mpo sɛ wɔfiri faako.`
---------------------- (377) ----------------------
F1: `Yԑfrԑ saa adeԑ yi ‘speciation’ a ԑkyerԑ sԑ wɔayԑ ekuo foforɔ. ‘Speciation’ yԑ adeԑ a wontumi nsi ano na ԑyԑ pa ara ma nnanemu anaa nsesa ba.`
F2: `Yɛfrɛ saa kwan specialisation, a deɛ ɛkyerɛ ara ne sɛ yɛreyɛ species foforo. Speciliasation yɛ biribi a ɛontumi nkɔ nnya na ɛho hia paa wɔ adandanedi mu.`
---------------------- (378) ----------------------
F1: `Nnua na wɔyԑ mframa a nnipa home no, na wɔagye mframa a nnipa home ba abɔntene no (ԑne sԑ, wɔhome ba abɔntene).`
F2: `Afifide ma nnipa oxygen home, wɔn nso fa carbon-dioxide nnipa home gu no ( kyerɛ home a ɛba abɔnten).`
---------------------- (379) ----------------------
F1: `Nnua de awia nam ‘photosynthesis’ so noa wɔn aduane. Wɔsane nso ma nwunu.`
F2: `Afifide yɛ wɔn aduane firi owia denam photosynthesis so. Afei wɔma nwunu.`
---------------------- (380) ----------------------
F1: `Yԑde nnuasi yԑn fie sane nya ntadeԑ firi nnua mu. Nnuane ahodoɔ a yԑdie yԑ nnua. Sԑ nnua nni hɔ a, mmoa nnya nkwa.`
F2: `Afide ma yɛtum si yɛn afie na yɛnya ntaadeɛ firi afifide mu. Nnuane dodo no ara a ɛyde no yɛ afifide. Sɛ afifi nni hɔ anka mmoa ntumi ntena nkwa mu.`
---------------------- (381) ----------------------
F1: `Na Mosasaurus yɛ aboa kɛse tenten kyɛn aboa biara wɔ wɔn bere so, a no ɔtow hyɛ mmoa afoforo so. Na wɔnsuro hwee, gye mosasaurus ahoforo.`
F2: `Mosasaurus na na ne ho yɛ hu wɔ ne bere so, na ɔnsuro hwee, gye mosasaurs nkae.`
---------------------- (382) ----------------------
F1: `N'apantan tenten no wɔ ɛse bɛbro 70 a ɛyɛ nam sɛ blade. Ɛno akyi no, ɔwɔ ɛse fofro wɔ nanum soro hɔ, a aseɛ ne sɛ, biribiara ntumi ntwam wɔ n'anum a ebeguan.`
F2: `N’apantan atenten ɛse a ɛyɛ nam a ɛyɛ reza bɛboro 70 apuepue ho,deɛ ko ne deɛ ɛwɔ ano no soro, kyerɛ sɛ biribiara ɛbɛtware ne kwan mu biara mfa ne ho nni da.`
---------------------- (383) ----------------------
F1: `Yentumi nsi no pi, nanso na ebia ɔwɔ tɛkrɛma a ɛte sɛ adinam. Na nnuan a odi no bi ne nsuo mu akyekyedeɛ, nsuo mu nnam akɛse, mosasaurus afoforo, ne ebia nnipa.`
F2: `Yɛnnim ankasa de, nanso ɛbɛtumi ɛwɔ tɛkyerɛma a emu apae abien sɛ adinam. Ne nnuane ne akyekyede,nsumnam akɛse, mosasaurs nkae, na ɛbɛtumi ayɛ sɛ na ɔwe mmoa a wɔfi abusua koro mu.`
---------------------- (384) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔtow hyɛ biribiara a ɛbɔwura nsuo no mu no so; dinosaur kɛse tenten te sɛ T.rex mpo ntumi no.`
F2: `Ɛtow hyɛɛ biribiara a ɛwuraa nsuo mu no so, mpo ɛyɛ dinosour ɔso pa ara mpo no, T. rex antumi annyina n’anim da.`
---------------------- (385) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ yԑnim wɔn nnuane deԑ, nanso na Romanfoɔ wɔ nnuane bi a na ԑyԑ soronko anaa nwanwa bi te sԑ, ‘prakonini’, ‘peacock’, nwa, ԑne akuransԑsoɔ bi a yԑfrԑ no ‘dormouse’.`
F2: `Bere a wɔn nnuane bi bɛyɛ deɛ yɛnim no, Romanfo no dii nnuane bi a wɔn ntaa nni, te sε wuram prako, kohaa, nwa, ne akura bi a yεfrε no dormouse`
---------------------- (386) ----------------------
F1: `Nsonsonoeԑ baako bio ne sԑ, berԑ a ahiafoɔ ne mmaa tena akonnwa mu di wɔn aduane no, na asikafoɔ no taa yԑ ‘banquet’ pԑ baabi tena di wɔn aduane no.`
F2: `Nsonsonoe foforo nso ne sɛ bere a nnipa ahia wɔn ne ɔbea no redi wɔn aduane bere a wɔte agua mu no, asikafo nso pɛ sɛ wɔdidi bom na wɔbɛnya lounge wɔ wɔn nkyɛn bere a wɔredi wɔn nnuane.`
---------------------- (387) ----------------------
F1: `‘Ancient Roman’ nnuane no nni nnuane a ԑfiri Amerika aba Europe anaa Asia bi wom wɔ mfeԑ ɔha a ԑtwa toɔ no mu.`
F2: `Nnuane a ɛfifiri America anaasɛ Asia wɔ mfeha atwam no baa Europe no ntumi mmɛka tete Roman nnuane ho.`
---------------------- (388) ----------------------
F1: `Nhwԑsoɔ ne sԑ, na wɔnni aburo, anaa ntoosi, anaa abrɔfo ntɔmmԑ, anaa kookoo, ԑnna tete Romani biara nni hɔ a ɔde kurokurokoko kaa n’ano da.`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso no, na wɔnni aburo, anaa ntoosi,anaa santwom,anaa kookoo na tete Romanfo biara anka kurokurokoko anhwɛ.`
---------------------- (389) ----------------------
F1: `Babelfoɔ no sii dan maa wɔn abosom no mu biara na ԑhɔ na wɔfa no sԑ ɔbosomkorɔ no wɔ.`
F2: `Babilɔnfo no sisii abosomdan memaa wɔn abosom na wɔbuu no sɛ ɛyɛ wɔn abosom no afie.`
---------------------- (390) ----------------------
F1: `Nkurɔfoɔ bԑbɔ afɔdeԑ ma saa abosom no ԑnna wɔn asomfoɔ no nso nam nnadie ne afahyԑ so yԑ wɔn ahiadeԑ ma wɔn.`
F2: `Na nnipa bɛbɔ afɔre ma abosom no na ɔkɔmfo no bɔ mmden yɛ abɔsom no apɛde denam dwumadie ahorow ne afahyɛ so.`
---------------------- (391) ----------------------
F1: `Na beaeԑ no nyinaa wɔ baabi petee a nnipa no nyinaa tumi ba ԑnna kronkron mu bea a asomfoɔ no nko ara na wɔ kɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Na abosomfi biara wɔ baabi a ɛbae na afei nso ebi hyem a ɛho teɛ a na ɔkɔmfo no ara na ɔtumi wura hɔ.`
---------------------- (392) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtɔ da a wɔsi ‘pyramid’ abansoro soronko bi a wɔfrԑ no ‘ziggurats’ ka asɔredan ne ho.`
F2: `Ɛtɔ da na wɔhyɛ da sisi pyramid aban atitire bi a nayɛfrɛ no ziggurats kaa abosomnnan no ho.`
---------------------- (393) ----------------------
F1: `Abansoro no soro yԑ baabi a soronko ma bosom no.`
F2: `Aban no soro no wɔ beae kronkron ma abosom no.`
---------------------- (394) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ ԑduru ahuhuro berԑ wɔ Middle East a, efie ho nhia bio.`
F2: `Wɔ Middle East wim tebea a ɛyɛ hye kakra no, na afie no ho nhia saa.`
---------------------- (395) ----------------------
F1: `Hebrew abusua no nneԑma bebree kɔ so wɔ petee mu.`
F2: `Hebrew abusua no dodo no asetena mu nsɛm kokɔɔ so wɔ petee mu.`
---------------------- (396) ----------------------
F1: `Mmaa noa aduane wɔ adi hɔ, ‘stores’ no nso yԑ baabi a wɔbue wɔ kwan no ho. Na wɔde aboɔ si dan.`
F2: `Mmea no nuaa aduane wɔ yaade no mu; na sotɔɔs no no abuebue kantɛs a ɛhwɛ sitiriiti no mu. Na wɔde aboɔ sisi adan.`
---------------------- (397) ----------------------
F1: `Na kwaeԑ akԑseԑ nni Canaan, nti na nnua boɔ yԑ den pa ara.`
F2: `Na kwae nni Canaan asase so, enti na gya bo yɛ den paa yiye.`
---------------------- (398) ----------------------
F1: `Na ‘Greenland’ atenaeԑ no ahwete. Wɔka wɔ ‘Norse sagas’ no mu sԑ wɔtwaa ‘Erik the Red’ asu firii Iceland sԑ wakum obi, nti berԑ a ɔde n’ani kyerԑԑ atɔeԑ no na ɔhunuu Greenland too ne din Greenland.`
F2: `Kakraa bi na na wɔte Greenland. Wɔ Norse sagas no wɔka sɛ Erik a ɔyɛ Kɔkɔɔ no wɔtwaa wɔn asu firii Iceland esaine awudi, na ɔretu kwan akɔ atɔe no, ɔhunuu Greenland na ɔtoo ne din Greenland.`
---------------------- (399) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso saa berԑ no a ɔhunuu saa beaeԑ foforɔ yi no, na Eskimo abusua no te hɔ dada.`
F2: `Nanso ɛdefa ada a ɔhunuiɛ yi, na Eskimo abusuaku no mufo te saa beae yi dada.`
---------------------- (400) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ na aman no nyinaa yԑ 'Scandinavian', nanso na nsonsonoeԑ bebree wɔ nnipa no, ahemfo, amanneԑ, ԑnne abakɔsԑm a ԑda Denmark, Sweden, Norway ԑnne Iceland ntam.`
F2: `Ɛwom sɛ aman no mu biara yɛ 'Scandinavian', nanso nsonosonoeɛ wɔ nnipa no ntam, ahene, amanne ne abakɔsɛm wɔ Denmark, Sweden, Norway ne Iceland.`
---------------------- (401) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ woahwԑ sini a ԑde ‘National Treasure’ no a, wobԑdwene sԑ na wɔatwerԑ ‘treasure map’ wɔ Fawohodie a Wɔpaeԑ no akyi.`
F2: `Sɛ woahwɛ sini a ɛne National Treasure a, wobɛdwne sɛ wɔtwerɛɛ treasure maapo no wɔ Faahodie Mpaemuka no akyi.`
---------------------- (402) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso ԑnyԑ nokorԑ saa. Ɛwom sԑ wɔatwerԑ biribi wɔ nwoma no akyi deԑ nanso ԑnyԑ ‘treasure map’.`
F2: `Nanso wei nyɛ nokorɛ. Ɛwom sɛ wɔatwerɛ biribi wɔ krataa no akyi, ɛnyɛ treasure maapo.`
---------------------- (403) ----------------------
F1: `Nsԑm a na wɔatwerԑ agu Fawohodie krataa no akyi ne "Fawohodie Mpaemu no Ankasa, wɔ Kutawonsa 4 1776". Nsԑm a wɔatwerԑ no wɔ krataa no fam a asi ne tiri ase.`
F2: `Wɔatwerɛ “Faahodie Mpaemuka Anaksa” wɔ Faahodi Mpaemuka a wɔabɔ deei a ɛyɛ Kitawonsa da ɛtɔ so 4 1776. Ntwerɛe wɔ dɔkomɛnt no ase, ne ti asi ase no.`
---------------------- (404) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a obiara nnim onipa a ɔtwerԑeԑ no, yԑnim sԑ wɔde saa nwoma kԑseԑ yi a (na esusu 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) siee baabi.`
F2: `Bere a obiara nnim oniiko pɔtee a ɔtwerɛe no, obiara nim sɛ wɔ ne mfiase no, parchment dɔkomɛnt kɛse no (ne susu yɛ29¾ inches by 24½ inches) na n’akoare yɛ kɛse no.`
---------------------- (405) ----------------------
F1: `Wei nti, ԑbԑyԑ sԑ wɔde saa asԑm no too so sԑ ne din.`
F2: `Ɛnti, ɛbɛyɛ sɛ wɔde nkyerεwde no kaa ho te sɛ agyiraehyɛde.`
---------------------- (406) ----------------------
F1: `‘D-Day landings’ ԑne ntɔkwa a ԑtoaa so no maa France atifi fam dee ne ho, nanso na anaafoɔ fam deԑ ԑnnee ne ho.`
F2: `Na D-Day landings no ne ako a edi so no agyae France atifi, nanso na wɔnyae anafo.`
---------------------- (407) ----------------------
F1: `Na "Vichy" French no na ԑdi so. Weinom yԑ Frenchfoɔ a na wɔne German ayԑ asomdwoeԑ apam wɔ afe 1940 mu na wɔne wɔn a wɔbԑtohyԑԑ wɔn so no nko na mmom wɔyԑ adwuma bom.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔdii so ne French "Vichy" no. Wei nom yɛ Frenchfo na wɔne Germanfo no ayɛ asomdwoe apam wɔ 1940 na wɔne yɛɛ adwuma boom sene sɛ anka wɔne wɔn bɛko.`
---------------------- (408) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔsanaa 15 1940, wɔn a wɔaka wɔn ho abom no wuraa France anaafoɔ hɔ, saa adeԑ no din de "Operation Dragoon".`
F2: `Wɔ Ɔsanaa da a tɔ so 15,1940 mu no, kɔpuee mu wɔ France anafo na wɔtoo pue a wɔkɔ puee hɔ no din sɛ "Operation Dragoon".`
---------------------- (409) ----------------------
F1: `Nnawɔtwe mmienu ntam na Amerikafoɔ ne Frence asogyafoɔ a wɔade wɔn ho no agye wɔn a wɔwɔ France anaafoɔ no ma wɔde wɔn ani akyerԑ German.`
F2: `Nnawɔtwe abien pɛ ntam na Amerika ne France asraafo ama France anafo no anya faahodi a wɔresan akɔ Germany.`
---------------------- (410) ----------------------
F1: `Anibue yԑ amanneԑ baako a nnipakuo bebree a wɔte bom na wɔyԑ adwuma bom, fekuo de di dwuma.`
F2: `Anibue yɛ amammere biako bi a ɛho hia nnipaku bi awɔdɔɔ so na wɔte na wɔdi dwuma bo wɔ ɔman bi mu.`
---------------------- (411) ----------------------
F1: `Asԑmfua ‘civilization’ firi ‘Latin civilis’ mu, ԑkyerԑ ‘civil’ a ԑne ‘Latin civis’ bɔ abusua, a ԑkyerԑ ‘citizen’, ԑne ‘civitas’, a ԑkyerԑ ‘city anaa city-state’, ԑnna ԑno nso tumi kyerԑ fekuo no kԑseԑ.`
F2: `Asɛmfua civilization firi Latin asɛmfua civilis mu, a ɛkyɛerɛ anibue a ɛsɛ Latin asɛmfua civis a ɛkyerɛ ɔman ba ne civicats a ɛkyerɛ kuropɔn anaaasa kuropɔn-siteeti nɛno nso kyerɛ nnipa dodow a wɔwɔ ɔman no mu.`
---------------------- (412) ----------------------
F1: `‘City-states’ no ara ne aman no. Anibue amanneԑ kyerԑ sԑ wɔrekyerԑ nkyirimma nimdeԑ bi ama awɔ hɔ daadaa na wɔde ama nkyirimma.`
F2: `Kuropɔn-siteeti yɛ ade a edi aman anim. Anibue amammere kyerɛ wɔne awontoatoaso bebree rekyɛ nimde a etena hɔ kyɛ na ɛyɛ akyerɛ kwan na ɛso obiara so.`
---------------------- (413) ----------------------
F1: `Amammerԑ nketewa bi tumi yera wɔ berԑ a ԑnnya abakɔsԑm biara wɔ hɔ nti wɔnhu sԑ ԑyԑ anibue papa.`
F2: `Amammere nkumaa no yera na enya abɔsɛm ho adanse biara hɔ na ɛmma wɔmmu no sɛ ɛyɛ anibue a ɛyɛ.`
---------------------- (414) ----------------------
F1: `‘Revolutionary War’ no berԑ mu no, ‘thirteen states’ no yԑԑ aban a emu yԑ mmrԑ bi—a ‘Congress’ no nko ara na na wɔyԑ saa aban no—wɔ ‘Articles of Confederation’ no ase.`
F2: `Bere ɔmananidani ‘Revolutioanr’y ako no rekɔ so no, siteeti du abiɛsa no dii kan kaa wɔn boom yɛ aban a wɔyɛ mmerɛ na wɔnyɛ den—a na Congress no nko ara na ɛyɛ wɔn koponɛnte— wɔ Articles of Confideration no ase.`
---------------------- (415) ----------------------
F1: `Na ‘Congress’ no nni tumi biara sԑ ԑde ԑtoɔ bԑto nnipa no so, ԑnna ԑnam sԑ na ‘national executive anaa judiciary’ no nni hɔ nti, na ɔdan ‘state authorities’ no nso na wɔmmoa no.`
F2: `Na Congress no nni tumi biara wɔde totua bɛto ɔmanfo so, na esiane sɛ na national executive anaasɛ atemmu biara nni hɔ nti,na ɛdan siteeti no mpanimfo, na wɔn nso wɔmmoa sɛ wɔde acts no nyinaa bɛyɛ adwuma.`
---------------------- (416) ----------------------
F1: `Na ԑnni tumi biara sԑ ԑbԑyԑ biribi afa mmara a ԑda ԑtoɔ ho wɔ ‘states’ no ntam no ho.`
F2: `Afe nso na wɔnni tumi sɛ wɔbɛkyerɛ sɛnea siteeti no bɛtumi apɛgya wɔn toɔ ne wɔn tarrifs no mu wɔ siteeti ahorow no ntam.`
---------------------- (417) ----------------------
F1: `Na ‘Articles’ no hia sԑ nnipa no nyinaa bԑgye atom ansa na wɔatumi asesa no nanso na ‘states’ no mfa ‘central government’ no nsԑm nyԑ asԑm biara nti na wɔn ananmusifoɔ no koraa kɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Articles no hia sɛ siteeti no nyinaa pene so a obiara ntia ansa na wɔatumi asesa mu na siteeti no amfa central govmɛnt no aniberesɛm na mpɛn pii na wɔn ananmusifo noa na wɔnni hɔ.`
---------------------- (418) ----------------------
F1: `‘Italy man no bɔɔlobɔ kuo, ԑne German man no bɔɔlobɔ kuo no yԑ bɔɔlobɔ kuo a ԑtɔ so mmienu a adi yie pa ara wɔ wiase akansie mu ԑnna wɔn na wɔgyee FIFA World Cup wɔ afe 2006 mu.`
F2: `Italy ɔman bɔɔlobɔ ku no ne German ɔman no bɔɔlobɔ ku no a wɔto so abien a wɔnim bɔɔlo bɔ yiye na wɔn na wɔgyee FIFA Wiase nyinaa akansie a ɛkɔɔ so 2006 no sii wɔn nanso.`
---------------------- (419) ----------------------
F1: `Agokansie a agye din bi te sԑ ‘football, basketball, volleyball, water-polo, fencing, rugby, cycling, ice hockey, roller hockey ԑne F1 motor racing’.`
F2: `Agodie a agye din bi te sε bɔɔlbɔ, baskɛtbɔɔlo, vɔlibɔɔlo, nsuom bɔɔlbɔ, bangye agorɔ, rugby, sakretwe, asukyenee hockey, roller hockey ne F1 moto akansi.`
---------------------- (420) ----------------------
F1: `‘Winter sports’ no agye din wɔ Atifi fam, a Italy man no si akan wiase akansi ne Olympic dwumadie mu.`
F2: `Winta akansi na aggye din yiye wɔ Atifi amnatam mu, na Italifo si akan wɔ wase nyinaa agodi ne Olympic dwumadia horow mu.`
---------------------- (421) ----------------------
F1: `Japan man no wↄ nsuopↄwa bεyε mpem nson (Honshu na εyε ne nyinaa mu kεseε), na εma Japan man no nsuopↄwa a ne kεseε tↄ so nson wↄ wiase nyinaa.`
F2: `Japan kuta island bɛyɛ 7,000 (deɛ ɛyɛ kɛse paa ne Honshu), na ɛma Japan bɛyɛ island kɛse paa a ɛtɔ so 7 ɛwɔ wiase!`
---------------------- (422) ----------------------
F1: `Esiane sε Japan man no wↄ nsuopↄwa bebree enti, wↄtaa ferε japan man no "archipalgo", sε εba asase ho nsεm ho a.`
F2: `Esiane island nkyekyɛmu/aku a Japan ɛwɔ nti, wɔtaa frɛ Japan a ɛwɔ geographical stance sɛ "archipelago"`
---------------------- (423) ----------------------
F1: `Taiwan man no fii aseε wↄ mpem aha num mu beaε a Europe apofoↄ a wↄ twaa mu wↄ hↄ kae sε wↄferε nsuopↄwa no IIha Formosa, anaa nsuopↄwa fεfε.`
F2: `Taiwan ahyɛse firi afeha a ɛtɔ 15 bere European sailors twaam wɔ island no so na wɔtweree island no din sɛ Ilha Formosa anaasɛ island fɛfɛɛfɛ.`
---------------------- (424) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ 1624, mu no Dutch Apueεfam India Adwumakuo no sii beaeε bi wↄ Southwestern Taiwan, de fii aboriginal aburo ho dwumadie ho adwuma na wↄ bↄↄ Chinese adwumayεfoↄ paa sε wↄbεyε adwuma wↄ ne εmo ne ahwedeε afuo so.`
F2: `Wɔ 1624 mu no, Dutch East India Adwumaku kɔ buee bi wɔ Taiwan anaafoatɔe, a ɛmaa nsesae baa aboriginal grain dwumadi na wɔfaa Chinafo sɛ wɔnyɛ adwuma wɔ wɔn mmoo ne ahwede mfu mu.`
---------------------- (425) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ afe 1683 mu no, Qing adedie (1644-1912) asraafoↄ no bεdii Taiwan atↄeεfam ne atififam mpoano so na wↄbεfrεε hↄ Qing Empire ↄmantam wↄ afe 1885 mu.`
F2: `1683 mu no,Qing dynasty (1644-1912) akofo gyee Taiwan atɔe ne mpoano atifi fam nsase bɔɔ so na na wɔkaa sɛ Taiwan ɛyɛ Qing Ahemana mantam wɔ 1885.`
---------------------- (426) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ afe 1895 no Sino-Japanese Ko edikane (1894-1895) nkuguo die akyiri no, Qing aban no de wↄn nsa hyεε Treaty of Shimonoseki aseε, de gyae Taiwan so tumidie maa Japan, a edii nsupↄwa no so kosii 1945.`
F2: `1895 mu no, ɛwɔ Sino-Japanese a edi kan no akyi (1894-1895), Qing aban no de ne nsa hyɛɛ Shimonoseki apam ase, na ɛma tumi no bɛkyɛn Taiwan wɔ Japan so a edii island kɔsii 1945.`
---------------------- (427) ----------------------
F1: `Adan ahodoↄ mmiεnsa na εwↄ Machu Picchu, εno ne Intihuatana, Awia no Asↄrefie no, ne Tree Window Ↄdan no.`
F2: `Structures ahorow na ɛwɔ Machu Picchu mu, a wɔn din ne Intihuatana, Awia Abosomfi no be Mpoma ɛma Mpoma Abiɛsa no.`
---------------------- (428) ----------------------
F1: `Adan a εwↄ adan a wↄn asi no woworane no ano no wↄn asan esi biom sεdeε εbεma nsrahwεfoↄ anya adan no teε ankasa.`
F2: `Adan a ɛwɔ complex no ano dodo no ara wɔsii wɔ kwan bi so ɛbɛma nsrahwɛfo no ahunu sɛnea na esi te anksa.`
---------------------- (429) ----------------------
F1: `Bεyε afe 1976 mu no, na wↄn asiesie Machu Picchu fa bi bεyε ↄha mu nkyekyεmu aduasa na wↄguso siesie hↄ de bεsi εnnε.`
F2: `Eduu 1976 no, na wɔasane asi Machu Picchu ɔha nkyekyɛmu aduasa na nnɛ wɔgu ara resisi.`
---------------------- (430) ----------------------
F1: `Sε nhwεso no, mfonini a egyina faako ho akwan a obiara nim wↄ wiase no yε 35mm, εno nana εyε mfonini kεseε a na εwↄ analog mfonini bere no ewiε.`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso no, mfoni fɔɔmat a ɛho nyɛ na wɔ wiase ne 35 mm, a na ɛyɛ na ɛyɛ dɔminant film size bere analog film reba awiee.`
---------------------- (431) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄdaso yε de bεsi nnε, nanso dea εho hia paa yε sεdeε εteε a mfonitwa afidie ho nkateε abεsi anan mu no.`
F2: `Wɔda so ara yɛ bi nnɛ, nano ne fa a ɛho paa na digitaa kamera sɛnsa fɔɔmat afa no.`
---------------------- (432) ----------------------
F1: `35mm deε no, sεdeε εteε no yε sakasaka kakra, ne ntrεmu yε 36mm na ne tenten yε 24mm.`
F2: `Fɔɔmat no taa yɛ 35mm, ɛtɔ na ayɛ keserenee, ne ntrɛmu yɛ 36mm na tenten yɛ 24mm.`
---------------------- (433) ----------------------
F1: `Sεdeε εteε no (sε yεkyεmu dubaako na yenya akontahyεdeε a εno nkoaa gyina a) ma yεka sε εyε 3:2.`
F2: `Sa fɔɔmat wei nkyɛmu (kyɛ mu du abien na bɛnya whole-nɔmba ration a ɛnyɛ den) a ɛyɛ 3:2.`
---------------------- (434) ----------------------
F1: `Afoforↄ nso (yεmfa APS abusua no, sε nhwεsoↄ) ne sεdeε wei teε no yε ayε pεpεεpε.`
F2: `Fɔɔmats ɛho nyɛ nna (APS abusua fɔmats, sɛ nhwɛso no) ne ratio yi yɛ pɛ anaa ɛbɛn ho.`
---------------------- (435) ----------------------
F1: `Rule of thirds a wɔyɛɛ no basabasa na wɔdii ho fɛw no yɛ ɔkwan a wɔfa so danedane neama eni na wɔsan hwɛ sɛnea wɔhyehyɛ neama wɔ mfonini bi mu.`
F2: `Deɛ ɛtɔ so abiɛsa afa ateetee mu na mpɛn wɔadi ho fɛw ne akwankyerɛ a ɛnyɛ den a yɛde yɛ dynamism bere a yɛrekora mfoni measure of order so.`
---------------------- (436) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛka sɛ baabi a ɛyɛ paa ma mfonini ho asɛm asɛtitiriw no yɛ baabi a nsensane no hyia na ɛkyɛ mfonini no mu kɔ afa mmiɛnsa efiri soro besi fam ne efiri nkyɛn kɔ nkyɛn (sɛ nhwɛsoɔ no).`
F2: `Ɛka sɛ baabi a ɛyɛ paa ma sɔbjɛts no ankasa ɛyɛ lines no ntasɛhyins a ɛkyɛ mfoni no mu abiɛsa mmeamu ne ntentenso (hwɛ nhwɛso no).`
---------------------- (437) ----------------------
F1: `Saa berɛ yi mu wɔ aburokyiman abakɔsɛm mu, Romanfoɔ asɔre a anya sika ne tumi afa nhwehwɛmu kɛseɛ mu.`
F2: `Europe abakɔsɛm mu no, Katolek Asɔre no a anya sika ne tumi no, nnipa de wɔn ani adi akyire rehwɛ wɔn pa ara.`
---------------------- (438) ----------------------
F1: `Bɛyɛ mfeɛ apem ne akyire nie no Kristosom aka Europe aburokyiman abom ɛmfa ho mpo ne wɔn kasa ne amamerɛ a ɛsesa.`
F2: `Bԑboro mfe apem ni na Kristosom aka Europe aman ahorow no abobom ɛmfa ho ne nsonosonoe a ԑda wɔn kasa ne amammere mu. I`
---------------------- (439) ----------------------
F1: `Ne tumi a ate atese no anya nsunsuansoɔ wɔ ahemfo ne temanmufoɔ nyinaa so.`
F2: `Ne tumi a ahyeta mmaa nyinaa no kaa obiara ɛfiti ɔhene kɔsi famfamfo so.`
---------------------- (440) ----------------------
F1: `Kristosom no nkyerɛkyerɛ kɛseɛ ne sɛ ɛwɔ sɛ yɛde sika tu ɔyaw ne ohia ase, na asɔre fotoɔ no wɔ hɔ ma asɛm yi ankasa.`
F2: `Akristofo nkyerɛkyerɛ biako ne sɛ, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔde ahode di dwuma de yi ahokyerɛ ne ohia firi hɔ na asɔre no fotoɔ ɛwɔ hɔ ma saa boate yi.`
---------------------- (441) ----------------------
F1: `Asɔre no tumidie fapem no ankasa awɔ Rome bɛboro mfeɛ apem na saa tumidie ne sika a akɔdi faako no ama nnipa dodoɔ no ara rebisa sɛ mpo yɛatumi adi ɔsom no mu nokorɛdie no so.`
F2: `Na asɔre no tumipɔn gyina Rome boro mfe apem, na n’ani a ɛdi sii tumi ne sika so no ama nkorɔfo rebisa sa ɛredi nhyehɛe yi so.`
---------------------- (442) ----------------------
F1: `Akodie no patu gueε akyi pεε no, Britain man no fii aseε sii Germany man no kwan sε wↄrentumi mfa hyεn biara mane nnipa anaa neama mma ↄman no mu.`
F2: `Bere a ntɔkwa no pae guiɛ no Britain yɛɛ naval akwansi ɛwɔ Germanyfo so.`
---------------------- (443) ----------------------
F1: `Saa kwan a wↄfaa so no yεε adwuma paa, na etwaa kra a na wↄkra asraafoↄ ne wↄn a wↄnnyε asraafoↄ neama a εho hia wↄn no so, εmfa ho sε saa akwansideε wei buu amanaman mmra a na wↄn ayhε ato hↄ mfe ↄpepem ahanu a etwa mu no.`
F2: `Kwan a wɔfaa so yɛɛ adwuma, ɛbɔɔ asraafo ne temanmufo nneɛma pii guiɛ, ɛwom sɛ akwansi yi buu wiase nyinaa mmmara a na wɔayɛ bɛboro mfeha abien a na atwam so de.`
---------------------- (444) ----------------------
F1: `Britain man no tutuu amoa wↄ amanaman po mu sεdeε bεyε a ɛpo so hyεn biara rentumi mfa ɛpo no so, na εbↄ asiane to hↄ ma ɛpo so hyεn a anni ↄfa biara mpo.`
F2: `Britain de ade a etumi to di awu hyehyɛ nsu ase sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ ɛbɛsi a hyɛmm biara kwan na ama ocean no fa biara na ɛmaa ɛyɛɛ hu maa hyɛmma a ennyina ɔfa biara no mpo.`
---------------------- (445) ----------------------
F1: `Esane sε saa εpↄ wei annya anoyie papa biara enti, na Germany man no hwε kwan sε wobenya saa anoyie no bi sε εba wↄn po aseε hyεn ho yiedie a wↄrensi ho kwan.`
F2: `Nanso kwan a wɔfaa so yi pii no ammua, Germany hwɛɛ kwan koro a ɛte saa anim wɔ submarine a ɛwɔ akono a na wɔasiɛw no kwa no ho.`
---------------------- (446) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ 1920 no, na aman ne emufoↄ beberee gye di sε ɛyɛ sε wↄne afoforↄ bεtena asomdwoe mu na na wↄtwe wↄn ho fi afoforↄ ho.`
F2: `1920s mu no,na ɔmanfo a wɔwɔ amanman dodo no ara akɔyɛ sɛ akodi ho nhia na wɔne wɔn ho nni ako.`
---------------------- (447) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄhuu ahodwirideε ne atirimↄdennesεm a εkↄↄ so wↄ Wiase Nyinaa Ko a edi kan mu no, aman no pεe sε tebea a εte saa rensi bio daakye.`
F2: `Wiase Ko I baa awiee no na wɔhuu nneɛmabɔne a ɛkɔɔ so wɔ akodi no mu no aman no ampɛ sɛ biribi a ɛte saa bɛsi daakye.`
---------------------- (448) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ 1884 no, Tesla kↄↄ United States of America kↄyεε adwuma wↄ Edison Adwumayεbeaeɛ a εwↄ New York City.`
F2: `Afe 1884 mu,Tesla tu Unites states Of America kɔyɛɛ adwuma wɔ Edison adwumaku mu wɔ New York.`
---------------------- (449) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄduu US no na abrokyire sika 4 cents nana ↄwↄ wↄ ne din mu, anwensεm nhoma, ne krataa a εka ne ho nsεm a efi Charles Batchelor (n'adwuma wura wↄ n'adwuma deda no mu) de kↄma Thomas Edison.`
F2: `Ɔkɔduruu US no na sika nyinaa yɛ sɛnt 4,anwonsɛm nhoma ne adansedi krataa na ɛfi Charles Batchelo (ne kwankyerɛ wɔ n’adwum dada no mu) ɛma homas Edison.`
---------------------- (450) ----------------------
F1: `Na tete China man no wↄ ↄkwan soronko a na wↄde kyerε merε ntem; China gyinapεn biara anaa abusua biara a wↄn aba tumi mu da no da nso.`
F2: `Na tete China wɔ kwan soronko a wɔde kyerɛ bere ahorow; China fa biara anaasɛ abusua biara a na wɔwɔ tumi no adehye ‘dynasty’ a wɔda nso.`
---------------------- (451) ----------------------
F1: `Afei nso wↄ adedie biara ntem no na wↄwↄ mfie bi a na amansin mu akyeyε. Dea agye din paa no yε Ahinnie Mmiεnsa no bere no na εde mfe aduosia na εkↄↄ so wↄ Han ne Jin Ahemfo ntem.`
F2: `Afei nso wɔ dynasty ntam biara no yɛ amantam ahorow a wɔkyekyɛm a ennyina faako. Mmere a agye din a wɔnim yɛ Aheman Abiɛsa epock kɔɔ so mfe 60 wɔ Han ne Jin Dynasty ntam.`
---------------------- (452) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ saa bere no mu no ntↄkwa a εyεhu paa kↄↄ so wↄ adehyeε ntam esane ahinie enti.`
F2: `Saa mmere yi mu atitire pii dii ako sɛ wɔde pere agua no.`
---------------------- (453) ----------------------
F1: `Ahennie Mmiensa no bere so no yε bere a mogya hwie gui paa wↄ Tete China abakↄsεm mu nnipa apem wuwuiε abere a na wↄreko sεdeɛ εbεyε a wↄbεtena akonnwa a εkrↄn no so wɔ Xi'an ahemfie.`
F2: `Aheman abiɛsa no no na edii awu wɔ Tete China abakɔsɛm mu, nnipa mpepem wuwui sɛ wɔbɛtena agua kɛse no wɔ ahemfi soronko Xi’an.`
---------------------- (454) ----------------------
F1: `Amanyↄsεm ne asetena mu Nnoɔma pii na efi metric akwanso adeyɔ mu aba, efiri tumidie a εwↄ nipa baako nsam kↄ tumidie a εwↄ ↄman mu no nyinaa nsam, ↄman pↄtee bi ho ahiadeε a wↄde bɛdi kane ne gyidi a wↄwↄ sε ↄmanmu no nyinaa na edi ↄman no so na εnyε nipa baakopε.`
F2: `Nkɛtɛno pii te sɛ sohyia ne amannyɔsɛm nkɛntɛnso te mɛtrik sistɛm, a ɛfiri absolutism ɛkɔrepublicanism,nationalism ne ɔman no gyidi sɛ ɔman yɛ nnipa no de na ɛnyɛ soddifo no de.`
---------------------- (455) ----------------------
F1: `Atuateε no akyi no adwuma ho kwan bue maa mmarima nyinaa na εmaa wↄn a na wↄn ani abre sε wↄbεyε yie no yεε yie.`
F2: `Anidane ‘Revolution’ no akyi wɔbuee nnwuma mu kwan maa mmaruma nyinaa na ɛboaa wɔn a wɔwɔ anisodehunu maa wɔdii yiye.`
---------------------- (456) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ara na na εteε wↄ asraa adwuma no mu sε anka wↄbegyina gyinapεnso ama dibea no na afei deε wↄhwε sεdeε nnipa no teε mmom.`
F2: `Ebinom kɔɔ sraadi esaine sɛ tumidi a ɛwɔ sraadi mu no gyina klass na wɔwɔ no so na seesei ɛbɛgyina cailaber so.`
---------------------- (457) ----------------------
F1: `French Atuateε no hyεε adwumayεfoↄ a na wↄhyε wↄn so no pii wↄ aman foforↄ so nkuran sε wↄn ankasa mfi wↄn atuateε aseε.`
F2: `Frenɔh Anidane “Revolution” hyɛɛ aforo nkae a wɔyɛ adwuma a wɔhyɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ aman afoforo maa wɔfii wɔn revolution ase.`
---------------------- (458) ----------------------
