F1: `Na Muhammad anigye ho sε ͻbehu nneεma a na εboro n'abrabↄ a na anigyieε biara nni mu no. Na ↄtaa kↄ ↄbodan bi a wↄbε frεε no “Hira” wↄ “Noor” (kanea) Bepↄ so kↄ dwennwen nneεma ho.`
F2: `Na Muhammad ani gye nneɛma a ɛsene saa mudane asetena ho koraa. Na ɔtaa kɔ bodan bi a yɛbɛfrɛɛ hɔ “Hira‘” ɛwɔ Bepɔ “Noor” (kanea) so kɔdwendwenn nneɛma ho.`
---------------------- (459) ----------------------
F1: `ↄbodan no ankasaa no, a etumi atena hↄ akyε yie no, ma yehu sεdeε na Muhammad honhomfam nsusuiε εteε.`
F2: `cave ne ho, nyaa ne ti didii mu, maa Muhammad spiritual inclinations ho mfoni sɛnea ɛte.`
---------------------- (460) ----------------------
F1: `Ↄbodan no wↄ bepↄ bi so wↄ Mecca atififam, ↄbodan no ate ne ho afi wiase no ho.`
F2: `Ɛwɔ Mecca atifi baabi, na bodan no ate ne ho koraa afi wiase nkae no ho.`
---------------------- (461) ----------------------
F1: `Nokorɛmu no, εnyε merε sε wobehu baabi a εwↄ sε mpo wonim sε εyε adeε a εwↄ hↄ mpo a. Sε wo wura ↄbodan no mu a, εte sε dea wate wo ho afiri wiase ho.`
F2: `Ɛnna fam sɛ obi bɛhunu sɛ mpo wonim sɛ ɛwɔ hɔ mpo a. Bere a wowɔ bodan mu no, ate ne ho koraa.`
---------------------- (462) ----------------------
F1: `Wonnhu hwe agye ewiemu fεfεεfε, a ani da hↄ na bepↄ beberee na etwa ho ahyia. Sε wo wↄ bodan no mu a wↄnte hwee na wonnhu hwee nso.`
F2: `Hwee ni hɔ wobɛhunu asene wim fɛfɛɛfɛ a ɛwɔ soro ne mmepɔ ahorow a atwa ho ahyia no. Wei mu kakraa bi pɛ na wowɔ bodan no mu a wobɛte anaasɛ wobɛhunu`
---------------------- (463) ----------------------
F1: `Great Pyramid a εwↄ Giza no nkoaa na εyε anwonwadeε asↄn no mu nea εda so wↄhↄ εnnε.`
F2: `Pyramid Kɛse a ɛwɔ Giza yɛ anwanwade nson no mu biako pɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ nnɛ.`
---------------------- (464) ----------------------
F1: `Egyptfoↄ no sii wↄ afe ↄpepem ahasa bere no mu BCE, Great Pyramid no yε pyramid a εso no mu baako a wosi de daa obuo kεse adi maa Pharaoh wuo no.`
F2: `Egyptfo sii wɔ afeha ɛtɔ so abiɛsa BCE, Pyramid Kɛse no yɛ pyramids akɛse a wɔasisi no biako de hyɛ Pharaoh animuonyam.`
---------------------- (465) ----------------------
F1: `Giza Plateau, anaa "Giza Necropolis" a εwↄ Egyptfoↄ Awufoↄ Amena mu wↄ pyramid pii (na great pyramid no na εso wↄ nyinina mu), εnna pii, εne great Sphinx no.`
F2: `Giza Plateau no, anaasɛ "Giza Necropolis" ɛwɔ Egyptian valley wɔ Awufo ɛwɔ pyramids pii ( a pyramid kɛse no yɛ kɛse paa), nna ketewa bebree, mmeae a wɔsosm pii ne Sphinx kɛse.`
---------------------- (466) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄsii great pyramid no de daa obuo kεseε adi maa Pharaoh Khufu, na pyramid nketewa, εnna nketewa, ne asↄrefie nketewa no wↄsi de daa obuo kεseε adi maa Khufu yerenom ne n'abusuafoↄ.`
F2: `Wɔyɛɛ pyramid kɛse no de hyɛɛ Pharaoh Khufu animuonyam, ne pyramid nketewa pii, nna, ne mmeae a wɔsom wɔsii de hyɛɛ Khufu yerenom ne abusuafo animuonyam.`
---------------------- (467) ----------------------
F1: `"Up bow" no ahyεnsodeε no te sε V na "down bow ahyεnsodeε" te sε ahianan a aseε ayera.`
F2: `"up bow" no maaks no te sɛ V na "down bow mark" no te sɛ staple anaasɛ square a yera n’ase no.`
---------------------- (468) ----------------------
F1: `Soro kyerε sε fi aseε firi ano na pia bow no, na fam kyerε sε fi aseε firi (baabi a ahama no ba ewiεm no) na twe bow no.`
F2: `Up kyerɛ sɛ ɛs wohyɛ ase fi ano na womia bow no, na down nso kyerɛ sɛ ɛsɛ wofi ase wɔ frog (ɛhɔ na kura bow no mu) na twe bow no.`
---------------------- (469) ----------------------
F1: `Soro-bow tae ma dede a ano wↄ fεm, abere a fam-bow ma dede a ano yε den paa.`
F2: `Up-bow taa ma nnyegyeeɛ a ɛwɔ fam, bere down-bow ano yɛ den na ɛyɛ asɛɛtifu paa.`
---------------------- (470) ----------------------
F1: `Wobetumi de twerεdua asesan ahyεnsodeε a wopε, nanso kae sε ahyεnsodeε a εwↄ bow no so deda no wↄ hↄ ma nnwomto ho biribi, enti εsε sε wo di so.`
F2: `W’ankasa firi wopɛ fa pɛnsire no yɛmaak a wo ara wopɛ nanso kae sɛ printed bowing maaks wɔ hɔ esiane nnwom nti, enti ɛsɛ sɛ wɔbu no.`
---------------------- (471) ----------------------
F1: `Ahinime 6, 1789 mu no, mmaa a wɔdi dwa bebree bi hyԑԑ King Louis XVI a na wɔsuro no, Queen Marie Antoinette wɔn mma nketewa mmienu (Marie Therese a wadi mfeԑ du-baako ԑne Louis-Charles a wadi mfeԑ nnan) ԑne Ɔhene no nuabaa, Madam Elizabeth maa wɔsane firi Versailles kɔɔ Paris.`
F2: `Ɔhene Louis XVIn na wabɔ hu Ɔhemaa Marie Antoinette, wɔn mma nkumaa abien a ( wMarie Therese a na wadi mfe 11 ne Louis-Charles a na wadi mfe nnan) ne Ɔhene no nuabea, Awuraa Elizabeth, na wɔhyɛɛ wɔn ma wɔsan ekɔɔ Paris wɔ Ahinem da ɛtɔ 6 1789 a na ɛyɛ Vesaailies aguadifo mmea na wɔyɛɛ sa.`
---------------------- (472) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔte pɔnkɔ kaa bi mu na wɔsane kɔɔ Paris a nnipa bebree atwa wɔn ho ahyia reteam bɔ Ɔhene ne Ɔhemaa no ntrԑnne.`
F2: `Wɔ hyεn mu no, wotuu kwan kɔɔ Paris a na dɔm atwa wɔn ho ahyia reteatea mu rebɔ Ɔhene ne Ɔhemaa ntrɛne.`
---------------------- (473) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa no hyԑԑ Ɔhene ne Ɔhemaa no maa wɔbuee wɔn kaa no mpoma too hɔ.`
F2: `Nnipadɔm a na wɔwɔ hɔ no nti ɛhyɛɛ Ɔhene ne Ɔhemaa maa wɔbuebue hyɛn no mpoma.`
---------------------- (474) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ no mu baabi deԑ, nnipa no mu baako maa wɔn abammɔfoɔ no mu panin a wɔkuu no Ɔhemaa no anim wɔ Versailles no bye bye.`
F2: `Eduu baabi no mpo dɔm no mu biako wosoo banbɔfo a wɔbɔ adehye no ban ti wɔ Versailles wɔ ɔhemaa na wabu ho no anim.`
---------------------- (475) ----------------------
F1: `‘U.S. imperialism’ ntɔkwa no a ԑmaa wɔdii ‘Philippines’ so sika no, ‘Filipino nnipa no ara na wɔtuaeԑ.`
F2: `Filipinofo no ankasa na wɔtuaa U.S ako a na ɛyɛ U.S. mpililisim no ho ka.`
---------------------- (476) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔhyԑԑ wɔn maa wɔtuaa toɔ maa ‘U.S. colonial regime’ no sԑdeԑ wɔde bԑte sika no so ԑnna wɔfaa mfasoɔ a wɔnya firii ‘bonds’ a wɔnam ‘Wall Street banking house’ so tɔnn no Philippine aban no din mu no.`
F2: `Wɔmaa wɔtuaa to maa U.S. nni so no ma wɔde tee ɛka atitire no ne ntrɛs a ɛwɔ bond a ɛfloat wɔ Philippine aban no din mu denam Wall Street banking houses so.`
---------------------- (477) ----------------------
F1: `Ampa sԑ mfasobum a wɔnya firii kyim a wɔkyimm Filipino manfoɔ no nsa gyeeԑ no ne ‘U.S. imperialism’ no ahonya nnyinasoɔ.`
F2: `Mfasobum a wɔnya fibu a wɔrebu Filipinofo no ɛno ne U.S. imperialism no mfaso.`
---------------------- (478) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wopԑ sԑ wote ‘Templars’ ase a ԑsԑ sԑ wote ‘context’ a ԑmaa saa adeԑ no baeԑ no ase.`
F2: `Sɛ woɛbte Templars no ase a ɛsɛ sɛ onipa no te kɔntɛst no a ɛkɔfaa order no yɛ baae no ase.`
---------------------- (479) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeԑ no a saa adeԑ no siiԑ no na wɔfrԑ no ‘High Middle Ages’ European abakɔsԑm berԑ wɔ mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so 11, 12, ԑne 13 (AD 1000–1300) no mu.`
F2: `Bere a ade no siiɛ no wɔtaa frɛ hɔ High Middle Ages a ɛyɛ Europe abakɔsɛm ɛwɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 11, 12 ne 13 (AD 1000–1300).`
---------------------- (480) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑdii ‘High Middle Ages’ no anim ne ‘Early Middle Ages’ no ԑnna ‘Late Middle Ages’ no toaa so, a ԑbԑwie bԑyԑ 1500.`
F2: `Early Middle Ages dii High Middle Ages anim na Late Middle Ages toaa so ɛbaa awiee bɛyɛ 1500.`
---------------------- (481) ----------------------
F1: `Abɛɛfo kwan a wɔfa so ne abusuafo ne nnamfo di nkitaho no fa nsusuii a nkrɔfo de yɛ adwuma, efiri mia a womia nkitahodi ade no so anaa adwene a ɛne se abɛɛfo kwan a wɔfa so ne abusuafo ne nnamfo di nkitaho no ho hia paa ma wotumi ka sɛ onipa hyɛbrɛ gyina nyansahu mmra nhehyɛe a ɛda adi wɔ abɛɛfo kwan a wɔfa so ne abusuafo ne namfo di nkitaho no so.`
F2: `Tɛknɔlɔgyikaa ditɛminasim yɛ asɛmfua bi a adwenepɔ pii na ɛwɔ mu, ɛfiri tɛknɔlɔgyi-pia anaa tɛknɔlɔgyi mparatifu a ɛma ɛyɛ sɛ nnipa hyɛberɛ yɛ biribi a ɛne nyansahunu mu mmara wɔ twaka bi ne kwan a ɛfa so da adi wɔ tɛknɔlɔgyi mu.`
---------------------- (482) ----------------------
F1: `Nkyrɛkyɛmu ahorow a ɛfa abɛɛfo kwan a wɔfaso ne abusuafo ne namfo di nkitaho no si nneɛma mmienu so dua sɛ: mpuntuo a ɛrekɔ so wɔ abɛɛfo kwan a wɔfaso ne abusuafo ne namfo di nkitaho no ɛmfa obi amamrɛ anaa amanyokuo a ɔdɔn ho, ne abɛɛfo kwan a wɔfaso ne abusuafo ne namfo di nkitaho no nya nkrɔfo so "nkɛntɛnso" afebɔɔ sene nnipa nnisoɔ.`
F2: `Deɛ mfiridwuma bɛkyerɛ no taa gyina adwenepɔ abien bi so: tɛknɔlɔgyi no ankasa nkɔanim gyina amammere anaa amanyɔsɛm nkɛntɛnso, na tɛknɔlɔgyi no “aka” aman a ɛwɔ mu no, sene sɛ ɛbɛka no abom no.`
---------------------- (483) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ nhwɛso no, obi betumi aka sɛ moto lɔɔre no maa mpuntuo baa akwan siesie so.`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso no, obi bɛka sɛ kaa no na ɛma wɔhwɛ yɛ akwan no yiye.`
---------------------- (484) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, akwan a ɛdeda nkuro ntɛm wɔ ɔman no mu no ɛmmoa mma sikasɛm nkɔ soro mma lɔɔre kakraa bi. Enti wɔhyɛɛ ase faa akwan ahorow so yɛɛ lɔɔre a ne boɔ wɔ fam ma obiara a ɔpɛ sɛ ɔtɔ bi no tɔ bi.`
F2: `Nanso akwan a ɛwowɔ hɔ no mmoa kaa dodoɛ no ara, ne saa nti akwan afoforo a yɛfa so yɛfa yɛ no yɛgu na ama wɔn a wɔbɛya kaa no ka so bɛte.`
---------------------- (485) ----------------------
F1: `Nkorɔfo pii a wonyaa lɔɔre no maa nkwanhyia kɔɔ soro wɔ akwan so, na ɛno nso ma apɔwmuden akwan ahorow a wɔde siesie nipadua no fa a atɔ kyima no nso baayɛ.`
F2: `Kaa a nkorɔfo bɛnya no bebree no ma akwanhyia dɔɔso wɔ akwan so,na ama akwan afoforɔ a ayaresamu no wɔfa so siesie nnipadua a atɔ kyema abu so.`
---------------------- (486) ----------------------
F1: `Na ‘Romanticism’ wɔ amammerԑ nnyinasoɔ bebree a wɔnya firii atwerԑfoɔ bi te sԑ Goethe, Fichte, ԑne Schlegel hɔ.`
F2: `Na Romanticism wɔ sɛnea amammere a yɛtetee obi no tumi nya nkɛtɛnso kɛse wɔ no a na ɛfiri atwerɛfo te sɛ Goethe, Fichte ne Schlegel hɔ.`
---------------------- (487) ----------------------
F1: `‘Romanticism’ mu no, nnipa a wɔte beaeԑ bi, ԑne wɔn amammerԑ ne amanneԑ wɔ berԑ bi mu maa ne ho so, nti ԑnam sԑ wei ne beaeԑ no kɔ nti na ԑyԑ sene mmara a wɔnnim na wɔde ahyԑ wɔn so.`
F2: `Wɔ Romanticism mu no, geography nyaa ankorɛankorɛ so tumi na na bere kɔ so amanne ne amammere a ɛsɛ geography be baae na esiane sɛ na ɛne ɔman hyia nti, na ɛyɛ kyɛn mmara ketee a wɔde ato hɔ no.`
---------------------- (488) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛnea yɛsi hunu Paris sɛ ɛyɛ fahyen ahenkuro wɔ ɛnnɛ wiase no, na Constantinople nso yɛ fahyen ahenkuro wɔ tete Europe amammuo berɛ mu.`
F2: `Sɛnea na wɔnim sɛ Paris na ɛyɛ ntadehyɛ ho kuropɔn de, nanso saa na naa Constantinople wɔhunu sɛ Constantinople ɛyɛ ntadehyɛ kuropɔn wɔ bere a na ɔhene di Europe so.`
---------------------- (489) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ ɛbɛgyee nhini sɛ ɛhɔ ne beaeɛ a ahotɔ wɔ no hyɛɛ aseɛ firii afe ahaanan Yesu wuo akyi de kɔsii afe apem ne ɔha mu Yesu wuo akyi.`
F2: `Wɔka ne ho asɛm pa ara sɛ afɛfɛdebea na eyi fii ase wɔ 400 A.D. na ɛtoaa so kɔsii bɛyɛ 1100 A.D.`
---------------------- (490) ----------------------
F1: `Ne diberɛ so teeɛ wɔ afe apem ɔha ne baako de kɔsi afe apem ne ahaanu mu ɛfiri sɛ na Nsɛmpakafoɔ no aba a wɔde akyɛdeɛ bi tesɛ asaawa ne aduane mu adɔdɔdeɛ a na ɛsombo kyɛn deɛ Byzantine dwadibea tɔn no bi aba.`
F2: `Ne gyinabere te kɔɔ fam wɔ afe ha a ɛtɔ so aduonum esiane sɛ na akofo no de akyɛde te sɛ serekyetam ne nnuhwam a na ɛsom bo sene deɛ Byzantine dwa de ma no.`
---------------------- (491) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛyɛ saa berɛ yi mu na wɔsesaa abodin Fahyen Ahenkuro firii Constantinople de kɔɔ Paris mu.`
F2: `Saa berɛ no na wɔde ahosiesie Kuropɔn no fiii Constantinople kɔɔ Pari.`
---------------------- (492) ----------------------
F1: `‘Gothic style’ no kɔɔ soro wɔ mmerԑ a ԑwɔ mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so 10 kɔsi 11 no ntam, ԑnna mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so 14 mu.`
F2: `Gothic style peaked wɔ bɛyɛ afeha 10-11ne afe a ɛtɔ so 14.`
---------------------- (493) ----------------------
F1: `Ahyԑaseԑ no na ‘Byzantine amammerԑ a ԑwɔ apueeԑ’ no ԑnyaa atadeԑ so nsunsuansoɔ.`
F2: `Mfiase no na Byzantine amammere nya ntadehyɛ so nkɛtɛnso wɔ apue.`
---------------------- (494) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso ԑnam nkitahodie a ankɔ so ntam nti, ‘styles’ a ԑwɔ atɔeԑ no kaa akyi bԑyԑ mfeԑ 25 kɔsi 30.`
F2: `Nanso esiane nkitahodie akwan a ɛnkɔ ntɛm nti, styles a ɛwɔ atɔe bɛka akyi mfe 25 kɔsi mfe 30.`
---------------------- (495) ----------------------
F1: `ԑrekɔ ‘Middle Ages’ no awieeԑ no, ‘Europe atɔeԑ fam’ hyԑԑ aseԑ yԑԑ wɔn ankasa ‘style’. Adeԑ baako a ԑkɔɔ so saa berԑ no yԑ nnipa a wɔhyԑԑ aseԑ de ‘buttons’ totoo atadeԑ mu no.`
F2: `ɛrekɔ Mfinimfini Mmere no awiee no Europa atɔe fii ase yɛɛ wɔn ankasa stal. Deɛ enyaa nkɔanim paa no biako saa bere no mu no yɛ bere nnipa no fii ase de button bobɔɔ ntade mu no.`
---------------------- (496) ----------------------
F1: `‘Subsistence aworokakya’ yԑ aworokakya a wɔyԑ de pԑ aduane a deԑ ɔreyԑ aworokakya no ne n’abusua hia no nko ara.`
F2: `Subsistence kuayɛ ne kuayɛ okyafo no dua nnɔbae ɛbɛso ɔno ne n’abuafo nko ara ɛso.`
---------------------- (497) ----------------------
F1: `‘Subsistence aworokakya’ no yԑ da fam, wɔntaa mfa aduro nyԑ, kwan a wɔdua aba a wɔde asie no ara bi na wɔsesa nnɔbaeԑ no dua sane de nneԑma a ԑnyԑ kuntann di dwuma sԑdeԑ ԑbԑma nnɔbaeԑ no adɔɔso.`
F2: `Subsistence kuayɛ nyɛ den, mpɛn pii no ɛyɛ organic, sistɛm a wɔde di dwuma no boa aba no wɔ ecoregion a wɔaka ɛne crop rotation abom anaasɛ tɛkniks a ɛnyɛ den ma nnɔbae no baa bebree.`
---------------------- (498) ----------------------
F1: `Abakɔsԑm kyerԑ sԑ na akuafoɔ dodoɔ no ara yԑ ‘subsistence aworokakya’ na ԑno ara na ԑrekɔ so wɔ aman a wɔretu mpɔn no bebree mu.`
F2: `Tete no na akuafo pii yɛ subsistence kua na nnɛ nyinaa aman afe na wɔrtu mpɔn mu no wɔda so ara yɛ.`
---------------------- (499) ----------------------
F1: `‘Subcultures’ boa nnipa a wɔn adwene yԑ pԑ na wɔhu wɔn ho sԑ fekuo no nhyehyԑeԑ apo wɔn no ano ma wɔhu nea wɔyԑ.`
F2: `Amammere nkumaa ɛhyɛ amammere kɛse mu no ka ankorɛankorɛ a wɔsusu societal standards ano ayi wɔn totwene na ɛma wɔn kwan ma wɔyɛ biribi a ɛkyerɛ sɛ ɔte sɛ nea wɔte no ara a nsesa biara mmaae ‘sense of identity’.`
---------------------- (500) ----------------------
F1: `‘Subcultures’ bԑtumi asesa ԑnam ekuo mma no mfeԑ, abusua, mpɔmpɔnsoɔ a wɔaduru, baabi a wɔte, ԑne/anaa wɔn bɔbea so.`
F2: `Wɔɛbtumi akyekyɛ amammere nkumaa ɛhyɛ amammere kɛse mu esiane mfe, nnipaku, klass, beae ne/anaasɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ mu no bɔbeasu.`
---------------------- (501) ----------------------
F1: `Nneԑma a ԑma ‘subculture’ bi da nso ne kasa, deԑ ԑfa adwinie ho, ԑsom, amannyɔsԑm, nna mu nsԑm, baabi a wɔte, anaa nneԑma a aka abom.`
F2: `Nneɛma a ɛkyerɛ sɛ amammere nkumaa ɛhyɛ amammere kɛse mu yɛ soronko bɛtumi ayɛ linguistic, aesthetic, ɔsom, amannyɔsɛm, ne nna, geographical anasɛ wɔakeka abobom.`
---------------------- (502) ----------------------
F1: `‘Subculture’ kuo mma no de nneԑma ne kwan a ԑda nso bi te sԑ ‘fashions, mannerisms, ԑne argot’ na ԑdi nkitaho.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔwɔ amammere nkumaa ɛhyɛ amammere kɛse mu taa bɔ ne ku mma denam style ahorow ne agyinaehyɛde, a deɛ ɛka bi ne fashions, mannerisms ne argot.`
---------------------- (503) ----------------------
F1: `Kwan baako a wɔgyina so de kyerԑ ‘socialization’ ho mfasoɔ ne sԑ wɔbԑfa nkwadaa ho nsԑm a ankɔ yie, nkwadaa a wɔpoo wɔn, wɔn tiri anyԑ yie, wɔdii wɔn ani, na mpanimfoɔ ankyerԑkyerԑ wɔn wɔ berԑ a na wɔrenyini no ho.`
F2: `Akwan biako paa wɔbɛtumi de akyerɛ mfaso a ɛwɔ bɔ yɛne afofor bɔ mu no yɛ sɛ yɛde mmɔfra edenam asaworam a wɔato wɔn,asiane anaasɛ atetee a wɔhyɛ teete wɔn na wɔne mpanimfo ammɔ bere awɔrenyini no.`
---------------------- (504) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔfrԑ saa nkwadaa yi "feral" anaa wild. Nnipa bi (ԑtaa yԑ wɔn awofoɔ) de ‘feral nkwadaa’ yi hyԑ dan mu; ԑtɔ da a, saa mmɔfra yi gya a wɔgya wɔn hɔ no gyina awofoɔ no po a wɔpoo wɔn ԑnam adwene mu anaa honam mu haw a wɔwɔ nti so.`
F2: `Yɛfrɛ saa mɔfra no"feral" or wild. Nnipa binom aka feral mmɔfra no bi ahyɛ (mpɛn pii no wɔn ankasa awof); ɛtɔ mmere bi a saa abɔfra asaworamto firi dɛmdi anaa kyematɔ bi a ɛwɔ ne ho nti.`
---------------------- (505) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtumi ba sԑ ‘feral’ nkwadaa yi adi amia anaa wɔahu biribi a aha wɔn ansa na wɔrepo wɔn anaa wɔredwane.`
F2: `Ɛbɛtumi ayɛ se feral mmɔfra no faa ateetee paa mu anaasɛ ayakayakade mu ansa na wɔreto atwene anaasɛ wɔreguane.`
---------------------- (506) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔkyerԑ sԑ mmoa na ԑtetee binom; ebinom nso nko ara na wɔatena wuram hɔ.`
F2: `Wɔkyerɛ sɛ ebinom mpo mmoa na wɔtee wɔn; ebinom mpo wɔkyerɛ sɛ na wɔn ankasa te wuram.`
---------------------- (507) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ mmoa nko ara na ԑtetee no a, aboawa niɛdenfoɔ no bԑda su bi adi (deɛ ɛfa honam mu) a ԑne aboa korɔ a ɔtetee no no deԑ yԑ pԑ, te sɛ suro a ɔwɔ anaa soronko a ɔnhunu sɛ ɛda ɔne nnipa ntam.`
F2: `Ɛnyɛ nnipa na wɔtetee wɔn, abofra a onim nnipa no da su bi adi, (ɛwɔ baabi a ɛpem) a ɛte sɛ aboa a wɔtetee no, a esuro nnipa.`
---------------------- (508) ----------------------
F1: `Berԑ a ԑsԑ sԑ adesua a ԑgyina adeԑ yԑ so boa ma adesua yԑ mmrԑ no, ‘scaffolding’ de bi ka ho.`
F2: `Berea adesua egyina project so ma adesua yɛ mmerɛ ne ɛyɛ ani ka paa no, scaffolding yɛ boro saa.`
---------------------- (509) ----------------------
F1: `‘Scaffolding’ nyԑ adesua kwan na mmom kwan a ԑboa wɔn a wɔresua biribi foforɔ bi te sԑ wɔde ‘kɔmpuuta ahyehyԑdeԑ’ foforɔ bi redi dwuma anaa worehyԑ biribi foforɔ bi ase.`
F2: `Scaffolding ny adesua akwan na mmom ade a ɛboa ankorɛankorɛa wɔresua biribi foforo te sɛ wɔresua kɔmputa dwumadi foforo anaasɛ wɔrefi dwumadi foforo ase.`
---------------------- (510) ----------------------
F1: `‘Scaffolds’ bԑtumi ayԑ ‘deԑ yԑhwԑ ne deԑ ԑwɔ hɔ’, sԑ yԑreka no kwan foforɔ so a, ɔkyerԑkyerԑni yԑ ‘scaffold’ saa nso na ‘paperclip barima ketewa’ a ɔwɔ Microsoft Office mu no yԑ bi.`
F2: `Scaffolds betumi ayɛ biribi a anni hɔ anaa biribi a εwɔ hↄ, kwan foforo so no, tikyani yɛ scaffold bi nanso ɛyɛ paperclip man ketewa wɔ Microsoft Ɔfese.`
---------------------- (511) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde ‘Virtual Scaffolds’ no ahyԑ ‘software’ no mu sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a ԑbԑbisa asԑm, atwe adwene asi so, akyerԑ kwan a wɔfa so di dwuma bi a asuafoɔ no nko ara ntumi no mu.`
F2: `Virtual Scaffolds ɛwɔ softwar mu na wɔde bisa nsɛm, yɛ prɔmpt na ɛkyerɛkyerɛ sɛ nti ɛbɛtumi ayɛ den ama sukuuni bi sɛ ɔno nko ara bɛdi ho dwuma.`
---------------------- (512) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ nti a wɔde nkwadaa hyԑ afoforɔ nsa yԑ ahodoɔ a ԑfiri po so, kɔsi anidie, ԑne wɔde nhyԑ gye wɔn nsam adeԑ mpo so.`
F2: `Wɔde mmɔfra kɔ Foster Care esiane nneɛma bebree nti a ɛfi asaworam to, ayakayakade yɛ ne mpo sika wɔgye no ɔhyɛ so.`
---------------------- (513) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnni kwan sԑ nkwadaa nyini wɔ baabi a ԑntete wɔn, ԑnhwԑ wɔn yie, anaa nwomasua nni hɔ, nanso ԑkɔ so.`
F2: `Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ abɔfra biara nyini wɔ beae bi wɔntete mmɔfra yiye, wɔnhwɛ wɔn yiye, wɔnsua nhoma anso wɔwowɔ saa mmeae yi.`
---------------------- (514) ----------------------
F1: `Yԑde yԑn ani bu sԑ ‘Foster Care System’ no yԑ baabi a ԑhɔ yԑ ma saa nkwadaa yi.`
F2: `Yɛsusuw sε Beae a Yεhwε Mmofra no yɛ baabi a banbɔ wɔ ma saa mmofra yi.`
---------------------- (515) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsԑ sԑ yԑn ‘foster care system’ no ma nkwadaa no baabi pa a ahotɔ wɔ, wɔn a wɔwɔ ɔdɔ ma wɔn, nwomasua, ԑne apomuden mapa.`
F2: `Yɛn foster care sistɛm no ɛsɛ ɛma afie a ahomabɔnmmɔ wom, ahwɛfo wɔwɔ ɔdɔ, nhomasua a egyina faako, ayaresa ɛyɛ papa`
---------------------- (516) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsԑ sԑ ‘foster care’ no ma wɔn biribi a na wɔn nsa nka wɔ baabi a wɔfaa wɔn firiiԑ no.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ foster care ma wɔn nsa ka nneɛma wɔhia a na wɔn nsa nka wɔ fi a wɔbɛfaa wɔn fii mu no.`
---------------------- (517) ----------------------
F1: `Intanɛt ɛfa nneɛma a ɛyɛ dodoɔ ne ankorɛankorɛ nkutahodie ho.`
F2: `Intanɛte no ka amansan ne ankorankora nkitahodi ho nnoɔma bobom.`
---------------------- (518) ----------------------
F1: `Intanɛt su baako a ɛda nneɛma adi twe yɛn kɔ ɔfa foforɔ a ɛkyerɛ sɛnea yɛsi yɛ biribi ne sɛ yɛbo bɛdwo biribi so.`
F2: `Dwuma soronko a ntanɛte di nso kɔfaa ade foforo koraa nso bae ɛde fa sɛdeɛ yɛde grafikeehyin bɛdi dwuma ne ɛho akwan ho no.`
---------------------- (519) ----------------------
F1: `Nhwɛsoɔ, nsusuiɛ kyerɛ sɛ “adesua” ne “ayɔnkofa” yɛ nkanyan a ɛho hia ma Intanɛt nwuma (James et al., 1995).`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso, “nhomasua” ne “wone afoforo rebɔ” yɛ biribi a wɔsusu sɛ ɛhyɛ nkuran a ɛma wɔde intanɛte di dwuma (James et al., 1995).`
---------------------- (520) ----------------------
F1: `“Ankorɛankorɛ nkutahodie” ne “ayɔnkofa ntoasoɔ” yɛ deɛ Eighmey ɛna McCord (1998) ɛhunuu no sɛ ɛyɛ adeɛ a ɛma nkanyan wɔ berɛ a wɔyɛɛ nhwehwɛmu wɔ nnipadɔm nsɛmkeka bi ho wɔ abɛɛfo ntentan so.`
F2: `“Wo ho a wode hyem” ne “nkitahodie ntoaso” yɛ biribi a wɔhunuu sɛ ɛhyɛ nkuran foforo a ɛfiri Eighmey ne McCord (1998) hɔ bere a wɔyɛɛ nhwehwɛmu wɔ sɛnea atiefo yɛ wɔn ade wɔ wɛbsaete ho no.`
---------------------- (521) ----------------------
F1: `Kwan a wɔfa so kye biribi wɔ sini kwan so no aboa ama wɔahunu sԑdeԑ yԑkyerԑ nneyԑԑ a yԑn ani nhyԑda nkɔ so no, sԑdeԑ animdua no yԑ ase wɔ simmasin kakra bi mu.`
F2: `Vidio rekɔɔden a wɔde di dwuma adan nneɛma bebree adi wɔ interpretation of micro-expressions, facial movements a edi milliseconds kakraa bi.`
---------------------- (522) ----------------------
F1: `Ne titire ne sԑ, wɔkyerԑ sԑ wobԑtumi ahunu sԑ obi retwa ntorɔ wɔ berԑ a wobԑtumi akyerԑ ‘micro-expressions’ no ase yie.`
F2: `Wɔkyerɛ sɛ sɛ wɔtumi hunu sɛ obi redi atorɔ bere ɔregyina micro-expressions yiye no.`
---------------------- (523) ----------------------
F1: `Oliver Sacks, krataa ‘The President's Speech’ mu no, ɔkyerԑԑ kwan a nnipa a wɔnte kasa ase ԑnam adwene mu haw nti no tumi kyerԑ obi nokorԑdie yie.`
F2: `Oliver Sacks, wɔ ne krataa a ɛyɛ Ɔpan panin no kasaT’he President's Speech’ mu no, ɔkyerɛɛ sɛnea nnipa nte kasa ase esiane adwene a asɛe na wɔntumi nnya biribiara sɛnea anka ɛsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ no.`
---------------------- (524) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔka to so sԑ saa kwan a nnipa fa so hunu obi suban no bi wɔ mmoa bi te sԑ efie nkraman mu.`
F2: `Ɔsusuu mpo sɛ hunu a wɔtumi sɛnea nnipa yɛ n’ade no mmoa te nkraman nso te saa.`
---------------------- (525) ----------------------
F1: `‘Twentieth mfeɛ ɔha a ɛtɔ so nhwehwԑmu akyerԑ sԑ yԑwɔ ‘genetic variation’ ahodoɔ mmienu: deԑ asie ԑne deԑ yԑhu.`
F2: `Afeha a ɛtɔ so aduonu nhwehwɛmu akyerɛ genetic variatio pool ahorow abien a ɛwɔ hɔ:`
---------------------- (526) ----------------------
F1: `Nsesaeԑ de ‘genetic variation’ foforɔ bi ka ho, ԑnna ne yie yi no firi ‘expressed variation’ no mu.`
F2: `Mutation de genetic variation foforo bɛka ho, na sɛlɛkhyin yi no fi pool of expressed variation no mu.`
---------------------- (527) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wobԑyi ‘variation’ bi ԑne sԑ wɔde wɔn bԑbom bio saa mprԑ bebree no ma saa akuo no mmienu danedane.`
F2: `Segregation ne recombination ma variation no di akɔniaba wɔ two pools ɛne generation no biara ntam.`
---------------------- (528) ----------------------
F1: `Savanna no so no, ԑyԑ den ma ‘primate’ bi a ɔwɔ ‘digestive system’ te sԑ nnipa deԑ no sԑ ɔbԑtumi anya ‘amino-acid’ a ɔhia no afiri nhaban anaa nnua no mu.`
F2: `Savanna mu no, ɛyɛ den ma primate a ɔwɔ digestive sistɛm te sɛ nnipa di n’ahwehwɛde amino-acid wɔ afifide resɔɔso mu.`
---------------------- (529) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑka ho bio ne sԑ, sԑ wannya saa adeԑ yi a, ԑma ne nyini no to ape ma ɔtumi fa mu wu.`
F2: `Bio nso, sɛ wɔanyɛ nso a ɛnyɛ nsunsuanso kɛsɛ paa:growth depression, nnuane nnuru a obi nni ne owu.`
---------------------- (530) ----------------------
F1: `Nnua anaa nhaban a wɔbԑtumi anya pa ara ne nhaban ne legume a ‘protein’ wom nanso ԑyԑ den ma ‘primates’ te sԑ yԑn sԑ yԑbԑtumi ama no adi dwuma yie gye sԑ yԑanoa.`
F2: `Afifi resɔɔsos a anka ɛbɛ wɔ proteins a obiara nsa bɛka bi yɛ ahaban ne legumes, nanso weinom yɛ den ma primate esiane ɛkyɛ ansa na ayam gye wɔanoa ansa.`
---------------------- (531) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, mmoa aduane bi te sԑ (ntatea, nkanka, nkosua) nyԑ sԑ wɔtumi adane ani no nko ara na mmom ԑwɔ ‘protein’ no bebree a ‘amino acids’ no wom.`
F2: `Deɛ ɛne no bɔ abira no, (ntɛtea, nkanka,nkosua) nnyam ntɛm,nano ɛma proteins paa na ekura amino acids a ɛhia no nyinaa.`
---------------------- (532) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ biribiara yԑ pԑ a, mma no nyԑ yԑn nwanwa sԑ yԑn nananom nsamanfoɔ nam saa kwan yi ara so na wɔde nyaa wɔn "protein haw" no anoyie te sԑ deԑ chimps no yԑ wɔ savanna no so nnԑ no.`
F2: `Sɛ yɛhwɛ biribiara a, ɛnsɛ sɛ ɛyɛ yɛn nwonwa sɛ yɛn nsamanfo di wɔn "protein haw" ho dwumasɛnea nkaatia wɔwɔ savanna yɛ nnɛ no a.`
---------------------- (533) ----------------------
F1: `Nna mu twa yԑ kwan a wohyԑ da sɔre firi wo nna mu na wosane da berԑ tiawa bi akyi (simma 10–60).`
F2: `Nna wɔtwitware mu yɛ kwan a wɔfa so nyane bere a wɔada na wɔsan da bere tiawa bi mu (sima 10–60).`
---------------------- (534) ----------------------
F1: `Wobԑtumi ayԑ wei wɔ berԑ a wode ‘alarm’ a ano nyԑ den bԑsi wo nkyԑn na ԑnnyane wo koraa na mmom ԑbԑma woaba wo ho so.`
F2: `Sɛ yɛbɛtumi ayɛ wei a gye sɛ yɛde alaam klɔk a ɛnyɛ dede di dwuma de boa wo ma w’ani so te wo a yɛnyane wo ankasa.`
---------------------- (535) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wohu sԑ wodane ‘clock’ no nsa no wɔ berԑ a woada a, ԑnneԑ wobԑtumi de asi dan no fa foforɔ sԑdeԑ ԑbԑyԑ a wobԑsɔre ansa na woakɔdum no.`
F2: `Sɛ w’ankasa na wobɛsɛte alaam no a, wobɛtumi de asi dan no mu babi foforo, ɛbɛma w’asɔre afi mpa mu sɛ worekɔ dum.`
---------------------- (536) ----------------------
F1: `Kwan foforɔ a ԑgyina ‘biorhythm’ so ne sԑ wobԑnom adeɛ a ɛyɛ nsuonsuo (nkanka nsuo anaa tea, adeɛ a ɛma dwonsɔ) ansa na woakɔda, ɛhyɛ wo ma wosɔre kɔdwonsɔ.`
F2: `Deɛ ɛka Biorhythm-based ɔphyen nkae ho ne sɛ wobɛnom fluid pii ( titire nsu anaasɛ tea, ne diuretic a wonim) ansa na woada no ma obi sɔresɔre kɔdwonsɔ.`
---------------------- (537) ----------------------
F1: `Asomdwoeԑ dodoɔ a onipa bi wɔ yɛ adeɛ a ɛbɔ abira firi ‘tension’ a ԑwɔ ne nnipadua ne ne honhom mu.`
F2: `Asomdwoe a nnipa wɔ no ɛne tɛnhyin a ɛwɔ npadua no ne susum no mu no bɔ abira.`
---------------------- (538) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ ‘tension’ no wɔ fam a, ԑma abrabɔ kɔ yie. Obiara bԑtumi anya asomdwoeԑ na n’ani nso agye deԑ ԑwɔ ho.`
F2: `Sɛ tɛnhyen no wɔ fam a, saa na life force pɔsitiifu no ɛdɔɔso. Nipa biara wɔ hokwan sɛ ɔhwehwɛ asomdwoe mapa na ɔpene de ɔwɔ so.`
---------------------- (539) ----------------------
F1: `Obiara bԑtumi anya anibue wɔ biribi ho. Adeԑ baako pԑ a ԑsi saa anisoadehunu yi ho kwan ne ‘tension’ ԑne nkoguosԑm.`
F2: `Nnipa biara ani betumi abue. Ade biako a esi yɛn boate yi kwan ne yɛn ankasa tɛnhyen ne nɛgɛtiviti.`
---------------------- (540) ----------------------
F1: `‘Tibetan Buddhism’ no gyina Buddha nkyerԑkyerԑ so, nanso ‘mahayana path of love’ no ԑne ‘techniques’ bebree a ԑfiri Indian Yoga na ԑtrԑԑ mu.`
F2: `Tibetan Buddhism no gyina Buddha nkyerɛkyerɛ so, nanso yɛtrɛ mahayana kwan a ɛkyerɛ ɔdɔ no mu ne tɛkniks bebree firii Indian Yoga.`
---------------------- (541) ----------------------
F1: `Nhyehyԑeԑ mu no, Tibetan Buddhism no nyԑ kuntann koraa. Ɛyԑ Kundalini Yoga, nnwene ho ԑne kwan a yԑn-regye ɔdɔ.`
F2: `Tibetan Buddhism nyɛ den koraa. Deɛ ɛkɔ ne Kundalini Yoga, midiehyin ne kwan a wɔnam so da ɔdɔ adi.`
---------------------- (542) ----------------------
F1: `Kundalini Yoga no, Kundalini ahoɔden (anibue ahoɔden) no ba wɔ ‘yoga ntenaeԑ so’, ‘home so’, ne nneԑma a wohu so.`
F2: `Ɛne Kundalini YogaKundalini ahoɔden no (anibue ahoɔden) nam yoga poskya so sɔre, ɔhome dwumadi mantras ne anituade ‘visualizations’.`
---------------------- (543) ----------------------
F1: `‘Tibetan nnweneho’ mfimfini ne Bosom Yoga. Sԑ wohwԑ abosom no a ԑma ahoɔden kwan no mu te, ‘chakras’ no hyԑ aseԑ na anibue adwene no aba.`
F2: `Tibetan meditatio ne Ɔbosom Yoga. Ɛdenam abosom bebree a wɔhunu wɔn no nti, ahoɔde akwan ahorow no so ate, chakras no waktiveeti na wɔayɛ enlightenment consciousness no.`
---------------------- (544) ----------------------
F1: `Na Germany yԑ bebree tamfo wɔ Wiase Ko 2 no mu, nti ԑmaa USSR ԑne USA ka bomm. Ɔko no awieeԑ no, ‘nhyehyԑeԑ, kwan a wɔyԑ biribi ԑne amammerԑ’ a ԑdii ahyia no maa aman no tee wɔn ho.`
F2: `Na Germany yɛ ɔtamfo wɔ wiase Ko 2 no mu,na ɛmaa USSR ne USA kaa wɔn ho boom. Ako no baa awiee no, na klashes sistɛm no, akwan ne amammere ama aman yi ahwehwe ase.`
---------------------- (545) ----------------------
F1: `Mfeԑ mmienu akyi wɔ berԑ a ɔko no baa awieeԑ no, aman a wɔkaa wɔn ho bomm no bԑyԑԑ atamfo maa ‘Cold War’ no hyԑԑ aseԑ.`
F2: `Ako no akyi mfe abien no, aman a wↄyε nnamfo bedan atamfo na eno na efii Apuei fam ne Atɔe fam Ntam Ntawntawdi ase`
---------------------- (546) ----------------------
F1: `Na ԑsԑ sԑ ɔko no toam saa mfeԑ 40 a ԑdi anim no, na asogyafoɔ foforɔ na wɔbԑko wɔ akono firi Afrika kɔsi Asia, wɔ Afghanistan, Cuba ԑne baabi bebree.`
F2: `Na ɛbedi mfe 40 na wɔbɛko anksa, a ɛyɛ proxy armies,wɔ akono fi Afrika kɔ Asia, wɔ Afghanistan, Cuba ne mmeae ahorow pii.`
---------------------- (547) ----------------------
F1: `Eduu Ebɔ 17,1939 no, na Polandfoɔ banbɔ no aseɛ, hokwan a na wɔwɔ ara a ne sɛ wɔbɛsan wɔn akyi na wɔasan akɔhyɛhyɛ wɔn ho bio wɔ beaeɛ a Romanfoɔ no abɔ wɔn ho adwaa.`
F2: `Eduu Ɛbɔ da a ɛtɔ so 17,1939 no, na Polish banbɔfo no agu, na anidaso no ara ne sɛ ɔnko bio na wɔasane akeka Romanian bridgehead no asi ani.`
---------------------- (548) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, atirimpɔ yei yɛɛ ɔkwa anadwo no, berɛ a asraafoɔ a wofiri Soviet Union Red Army a wɔn dodoɔ bɛboro 800,000 wuraa hɔ na wɔtow hyɛɛ Poland apueeɛ mantam no so na wɔhyehyɛɛ Belarus ne Ukraine ndianim a na ɛne Riga asomdwoe apam, Soviet ne Poland asomdwoe apam, ne amanaman apam ahodoɔ, deɛ ɛda aman mmienu ne deɛ ɛboro saa ntam no bɔ abira no.`
F2: `Nanso, saa nhyehyɛe yi ankɔsi aga, bere a asraafo bɛboro 800,000 firi Soviet's Union Red Army no bewuraam na wɔbɛtee Belarussian ne Ukrainian akofo bere wɔkɔ puee Poland apue amantam no mu no na ebuu Riga Asomdwoe Apam no so, Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact ne wiase amanaman nyinaa apam no so, a ɛyɛ bilateralne multilateral nyinaa.`
---------------------- (549) ----------------------
F1: `Po so hyɛn a wɔde di dwuma ne ɔkwan a ɛyɛ sene biara a wobetumi de afa nnipa dodoɔ ne nneɛma etwa ɛpo no.`
F2: `Hyɛma wɔde bɛfa nneɛma no ne kwan ɛyɛ sene biara wobetumi de afa nni ne nneɛma dodow wɔ ocean no so.`
---------------------- (550) ----------------------
F1: `Adwuma a ɛpo so asraafoɔ tae yɛ ara ne sɛ wɔboa ma wo man kɔ so tumi ma nnipa ne nneɛma kɔ mmeaeɛ ahodoɔ, berɛ korɔ no ara mu nso, wosi atamfoɔ kwan sɛ wɔbɛtwe wɔn nkurɔfoɔ ne wɔn nneɛma akɔ mmeaeɛ.`
F2: `Navies no adwuma fi tete no ɛne sɛ wɔbɛhwɛ sɛ wo man bɛtumi de emu nnipa ne nneɛma akɔ mmeae mmeae na bere korɔ no ara mu no, wɔasi atamfo kwan wɔ nnipa ne nneɛma ho.`
---------------------- (551) ----------------------
F1: `Yei ho mfatoho baako a yebetumi ahyɛ no nsow ne North Atlantic WWII ɔsatuo no. Na Amerikafoɔ no rebɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛtwe mmarima ne nneɛma atwa Atlantic Po no akɔboa Britain.`
F2: `Wei mu biako a ɛhia yɛhyɛ no nso paa ne nansa yi North Atlantic campaign ɛwɔ WWII. Na Amerikafo rebɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔde nnipa ne nneɛma bɛtwa Atlantic Po no de aboa Britain.`
---------------------- (552) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ korɔ no ara mu no, na Germany po so asraafoɔ no de kodoɔ a wɔfrɛ no U-boat rebɔ mmɔden sɛ wobesiw wɔn kwan.`
F2: `Wɔ saa bere no ara mu no, na German nsu su asraafo no, de U-boats titiriw, rebɔ moden sɛ wɔbɛma trafik no ayae.`
---------------------- (553) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ anka Germany edi Britain so nkonim efiri sɛ na Europa mu no nyinaa taa n'akyi, sɛ anka wɔn a wɔreboa wɔn no antumi anfa nneɛma no antwa a.`
F2: `Sɛ anka Amanaman nkabom no dii ntwo a, ebia anaka Germany bedi Britain so nkunim sɛnea edii Europe aman a aka no so no.`
---------------------- (554) ----------------------
F1: `Wofiri aseɛ yɛn mpɔnkye bɛyɛ mfeɛ 10,000 a etwam ni wɔ Zagros mmepɔ mu wɔ Iran.`
F2: `Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ mpɔnkye bɛyɛ fie mmoa bɛyɛ mfe 10,000 a atwam no wɔ Zagros Mmepɔ no so wɔ Iran.`
---------------------- (555) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ tete amammerɛ ne mmusuakuo ahodoɔ mu no, na wɔyɛn wɔn sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ mmerɛ ama wɔanya nufusuo, nwi, ɛnam, ne aboa nwoma.`
F2: `Tete amammerɛ ne mmusuakuw fii ase kuraa wɔn so sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn nsa bɛka nufusu, nhwin, nam ne honam a wɔremmerɛ ho.`
---------------------- (556) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtaa boa mpɔnkye a wɔyɛn wɔ fie mu no ano wɔ ekuo mu na wɔnante nkokoɔ so anaa beaeɛ a wɔbenya nwura aweɛ, a mpɔnkye sohwɛfoɔ a wɔtaa yɛ mmofra anaa mmaabun na ɛhwɛ wɔn soɔ te sɛ aguanhwɛfoɔ a yenim dedaw no. Wɔda so ara de saa kwan a wɔfa soɔ de yɛn mmoa no di dwuma nnɛ.`
F2: `Mmpɔnkye a na wɔyɔ fie mmoa no na wɔ kura wɔn wɔ kuo a na wɔ kyin wɔ mmepɔw so anaa mmeae ahorow a wɔwe nwura wɔ mu, na mmpɔnkyehwɛfo a na wɔ tae yɛ mmofra anaa mmabunu na na wɔhwɛ wɔn so, wɔ ne nguanhwɛfo a obiara nim no yɛ pɛ. Wɔda so de saa akwan a wɔfa so di mmoa anim yi yɛ adwuma nnɛ.`
---------------------- (557) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyɛɛ teaseɛnam kwan wɔ Engresi wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 16 no mu.`
F2: `Wɔ sii akwan a nteaseɛnam a wɔde twe neama fa so no wɔ England wɔ 16th Century mfiase.`
---------------------- (558) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔde nnua a wɔahyehyɛ no ndidisoɔ ndidisoɔ na ayɛ teaseɛnam kwan no, ɛmaa mpɔnkɔ tumi de ahoɔhare tweeɛ na wotumi nso twee nneɛma a emu yɛ duro sene sɛ wonam kwan a ɛso yɛ twitwiritwitwiri a ɛwɔ hɔ no so.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ na wɔde ntaaboo a wɔde nnua ayɛ ntɛntɛso na na ayɛ akwan a nteaseɛnam a wɔde twe neama no fa so no, ɛboaa apɔnkɔ ma wɔtumi tuu mmirika paa na wɔtwee neama akɛse wɔ so sen wɔ akwan a ɛso awereawere no so wɔ da no mu.`
---------------------- (559) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔdaa biribi adi ntɛm ara a na wɔde suso mu ma ɔkwan no da so yie. Nanso nkakrankakra, wobehunuiɛ sɛ kwan no bɛyɛ adwuma yie sɛ wɔde dadeɛ to so a.`
F2: `Wɔ daa keteke akwan no adi ntɛm de soo nteaseɛnam a wɔde twe neama no mu yie. Nanso, nkakra-nkakra no, wɔ huu sɛ nteaseɛnam a wɔde twe neama no bedi mu sɛ wɔde nnade kakra hyɛ soro a.`
---------------------- (560) ----------------------
F1: `Yei bɛyɛɛ adeɛ a na afei wɔtaa yɛ, nanso dadeɛ no maa ntwahonan a wɔde nnua ayɛ no weeɛ.`
F2: `Wei bɛyɛɛ adeyɛ a na obiara nim, nanso na daade no ma nteaseɛnam nan a wɔde nua ayɛ no wewe.`
---------------------- (561) ----------------------
F1: `Awieeɛ koraa no, wɔsesaa ntwahonan a wɔde nnua ayɛ no yɛɛ no dadeɛ. Wɔ afe 1767 mu no, wɔdaa kwan a na wɔde dadeɛ nko ara na ayɛ a edi kan no adi.`
F2: `Ɛbɛ wiee ase no, wɔde nteaseɛnam nan a wɔde nnade ayɛ be sii nteaseɛnam nan a wɔde nua ayɛ no anan mu. Wɔ 1767 mu no, wɔ daa keteke kwan a wɔde nnade nkoaa ayɛ no adi.`
---------------------- (562) ----------------------
F1: `Nanteɛ ne ɔkwan a edi kan a na yɛde firi beaeɛ baako kɔ beaeɛ foforɔ, nnipa firi aseɛ tenee ne mu nantee mfeɛ ɔpepem mmienu a etwam ni berɛ a Homo Erectus (asekyerɛ ne nnipa a watene ne mu) bɛdaa adi no.`
F2: `Ɔkwan a edi kan a na wɔfa so twe nnosoa yɛ nante, nnipa fii ase nante kyerebenn so mfe ɔpepem abien a atwam no wɔ Homo Erectus ( ɛkyerɛ nipa a ɔgyina kyerebenn so).`
---------------------- (563) ----------------------
F1: `Na ɛnyɛ wɔn a wodii wɔn kan no, a wɔfrɛ wɔn Australopithecus ne su sɛ wɔbɛnante wɛn nan mmienu so mu.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔbaa wɔ wɔn akyi, Australopithecus no na wɔn nante kyerebenn so bere nyinaa.`
---------------------- (564) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔahunu nneɛma a ɛhyɛ mmoa a wɔnante wɔn nan mmienu so no nsow wɔ Australopithecus funu nkaeɛ a wɔatutu ahu no mu firi mfeɛ ɔpepem 4.2-3.9 a etwam nie, ɛmfa ho sɛ ɛbɛyɛ sɛ Sahelanthropus no firii aseɛ nantee wɔ wɔn nan mmienu soɔ bɛyɛ mfeɛ ɔpepem nson mmerɛ no mu no.`
F2: `Bipedal ho nimdeɛ wɔ Australopithecus emu a wɔn akura so mu efi mfe ɔpepem 4.2 - 3.9 a atwam no, ɛmfa ho sɛ na Sahelanthropus betumi anate wɔ nan mmienu so mfe ɔpepem asɔn a atwam no mfiase.`
---------------------- (565) ----------------------
F1: `Yebetumi afiri aseɛ ayɛ yɛn adeɛ sɛ asase no nnamfo, yebetumi adɔm ekuo a ɛbɔ asase no ho ban, na yebetumi mpo ayɛ obi a ɔpere pɛ nsesaeɛ de boa ma ɔhaw a ɛbɛba daakye no so te kakra.`
F2: `Yɛbetumi afi ase atena ase wɔ asomdwoe wan so wɔ yɛn atenae yi mu, yɛbetumi de yɛn ho akɔ dɔm atenae kuw no, na yɛbetumi de yɛn ho ahyɛ amanyɔsɛm mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛ tew amanehunu a yɛbɛhyia daakye no so akodu dibea bi.`
---------------------- (566) ----------------------
F1: `Yei te sɛ deɛ woresi nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a yareɛ de ba no ano kɛkɛ. Nanso, sɛ yɛn mpɛ berɛ tia mu mmoa deɛ a, na ɛsɛ sɛ yɛhwehwɛ ɔhaw no farebae na yeyi firi hɔ.`
F2: `Eyi te sɛ nea woresɔ biribi ho nsɛnkyerɛne ano wɔ tebeae pii mu. Nanso, sɛ yɛmpɛ anoyi bi a ɛbɛtena hɔ bere tiaa bi a, ,ɛnde ɛsɛ sɛ yɛ hwehwɛ ɔhaw no fibeae, na yetu ase fi hɔ koraa.`
---------------------- (567) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛda edi pefee sɛ nnipa nyansahunu ne mfiridwuma a akɔ anim no ama wiase no asesa, na ɔhaw nso akɔ anim esiane nnipa a adɔɔsoɔ eburu soɔ ne nnipa abrabɔ a ɛkyɛn soɔ no.`
F2: `Eni da hɔ fann yie sɛ wiase no asesa paa esiane nnipa ho abɔde mu nyansapɛ ne mfiriyɛ ho nimdeɛ a akɔ anim no nti, na ɔhaw abɛyɛ pii efirisɛ nnipa adɔɔso wɔ wiase no mu na ahohwi na ahyɛ nnipa pii abrabɔ mu ma.`
---------------------- (568) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a Congress no gye toom wɔ Kitawonsa da a ɛtɔ so 4 no, wɔde mmara a wɔde nsa atwerɛ a Panin a ɔda Congress no ano John Hancock ne ɔtwerɛfoɔ Charles Thompson de wɔn nsa hyɛɛ aseɛ kɔɔ John Dunlap nwoma timtim beaeɛ a na ɛbɛn hɔ no.`
F2: `Bere a wɔn Nhyiamu kɛsɛ no sesa faa saa suban foforo yi wɔ Kitawonsa 4 akyi no, ahyɛde bi a Nhyiamu kɛse no panyinin a wɔferɛ no John Hancock ne Ɔkyerɛwfo Charles Thomson de wɔn nsa hyɛɛ ase no wɔde kɔɔ John Dunlap nhoma tintimbea a ɛwɔ adan kakra bi akyi no.`
---------------------- (569) ----------------------
F1: `Anadwo mu no nyinaa wotintim dodoɔ bɛyɛ 150 kosi 200, a wɔtoo no din "Dunlop nwoma a nhyɛn no trɛ".`
F2: `Wɔ anadwo mu no wɔ tintim ne sɛso bɛyɛ 150 ne 200 ntam, a ɛnnɛ wɔferɛ no "Dunlap broadsides".`
---------------------- (570) ----------------------
F1: `John Nixon na odii kan kenkan nwoma no wɔ Fawohodie Asa no adihɔ hɔ wɔ Kitawonsa ne da a ɛtɔ so 8.`
F2: `John Nixon na ɔkenkan nhoma no bere a adi kan maa amansan no wɔ Independence Hall no adio hɔ wɔ Kitawonsa 8.`
---------------------- (571) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde baako kɔmaa George Washington wɔ Kitawonsa ne da a ɛtɔ so 6, na ɔmaa wɔkenkanee kyerɛɛ n'asraafoɔ no wɔ Kitawonsa ne da a ɛtɔ so 9. Nwoma no baako nso duruu London Ɔsanaa ne da a ɛtɔ so 10.`
F2: `Wɔde kiako kɔ maa George Washington wɔ Kitawonsa 6, na ɔma wɔn kenkan kyerɛɛ ne asraafodom no wɔ New York wɔ Kitawonsa 9. Ne sɛso duu London Ɔsanaa 10.`
---------------------- (572) ----------------------
F1: `Dunlop nwoma a nkyen trɛ 25 a ɛda so wɔ hɔ no ne deɛ wotintimii a akyɛ yie. Deɛ wɔde nsa twerɛɛ no antumi annyina.`
F2: `Dunlap broadsides no mu 25 a ɛdaso wɔhɔ no yɛ nhoma no sɛso a atena hɔ akyɛ yie. Nhoma no a edi kan a wɔde nsa kyerɛw no ɛntumi antena ase.`
---------------------- (573) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wotutu fam no mu dodoɔ no ara gye di sɛ mmoa a wɔfrɛ wɔn dinosaur tenaa ase na wɔwɔ hɔ ɛnnɛ. Yɛfrɛ wɔn nnomaa.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔ sua neama a ɛtenaa ase tete no ho ade no gye di sɛ mmoa wɔferɛ wɔn dinosaurs no kuw bi tenaa ase na wɔda so te ase nnɛ. Yɛferɛ wɔn nnomaa.`
---------------------- (574) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa dodoɔ no ara adwene nyɛ wɔn sɛ wɔyɛ dinosaur esiane sɛ wɔwɔ ntaban na wotu ntira.`
F2: `Nnipa pii nnsusu wɔn ho sɛ wɔyɛ dinosaurs efirisɛ wɔwɔ ntakara na wɔtumi tu fa wim.`
---------------------- (575) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso nneɛma bebree na ɛwɔ nnomaa ho a ɛte ɛsɛ dinosaur.`
F2: `Nanso neama beberee wɔ nnomaa ho a ɛda so ne dinosaur di nsɛ.`
---------------------- (576) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔwɔ abena wɔ wɔn nan ne wɔn bɔwerɛ ho, wɔtu nkosua, na wɔnante wɔ wɔn nan mmienu a ɛwɔ ekyire no so te sɛ T-Rex.`
F2: `Wɔwɔ nan a ɛwɔ bon ne mmɔwerɛ, wɔtow nkosua, na wɔ nantew wɔ wɔn nan mmienu a ɛwɔ akyiri no so tesɛ T-Rex.`
---------------------- (577) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛbɛka a, wɔde binary nɔma na ɛdanedane nsɛm wɔ abɛɛfo kɔmputa ahorow a ɛwɔ hɔ no nyinaa so.`
F2: `Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ kɔmputa a yɛde yɛ adwuma wɔ nnɛ bere yi mu no nyinaa gyina nsɛm a wɔdanedane mu a wɔn ayɛ no tesɛ binary akontahyɛde so.`
---------------------- (578) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsɛ sɛ binary nɔma biara nya nɔma mmienu yi mu baako pɛ, 0 anaa 1. Na wɔfrɛ saa nɔma ahorow mmienu yi binary digit anaa wɔ kɔmputa nsɛmfua mu no, wɔfrɛ no bits.`
F2: `Binary akontahyɛde betumi afa tiade mmienu pɛ, ɛno ne 0 anaa 1, na wɔferɛ saa nkontahyɛde yi sɛ binary digits - anaa bits, sɛ wode kɔmputa kasa reyɛ adwuma a.`
---------------------- (579) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ aduro bɔne bi kɔ yɛn mu a, ɛtaa yɛ den sɛ yebehu. Sɛ obi fe a, ɛno nnyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a yebetumi agyina so aka biribi efisɛ ɛyɛ ade a ɛtaa si.`
F2: `Awuduru a ɛwɔ nipadua no mu no ebia ɛrenna ne ho adi ntɛm. Nsɛnkyerɛne bi, te sɛ ɛfe yɛ ade a tebea biara betumi de aba enti worentumi nyɛ nhwehwɛ mu amonom hɔ ara.`
---------------------- (580) ----------------------
F1: `Deɛ ɛbɛboa ma yeatumi ahu sɛ adurobɔne bi akɔ obi mu ne sɛ, sɛ yehu aduro toa a ano abue anaa nnuru a ano yɛ den a wɔde yɛ ofie adwuma toa sɛ ɛdeda hɔ a.`
F2: `Ade a eye paa a ebetumi akyerɛ sɛ obi anom awduru yɛ sɛ wobehu aduru bi toa a wɔn abue so anaa nnuru a ɛboro a yɛde di dwuma wɔ fie.`
---------------------- (581) ----------------------
F1: `Hwɛ ntwerɛde a ɛwɔ ho no sɛ akwankyerɛ pɔtee bi wɔ ho a ɛkyerɛ sɛnea wobetumi aboa obi a woanom saa adurobɔne no.`
F2: `Hwɛ toa no ho sɛɛ wobehu ɔkerɛkyerɛ a ɛfa ɔhwɛ a edi kan a wɔde ma obi a ɔnom saa awuduru pɔtee no.`
---------------------- (582) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ brɔfo kasa mu no, bug yɛ nea wɔn a wɔsua mmoawammoawa a wɔwɔ ntaban ho adeɛ de frɛ mmoawammoawa a wɔwɔ ntaban.`
F2: `Asɛmfua bug no, mmoawammoawa ho animdefo na wɔtaa de di dwuma berɛ a wɔreka mmoawammoawa ho asɛm no.`
---------------------- (583) ----------------------
F1: `Saa din no firi tete nimdeɛ fa Sonkruronsuo, a wɔyɛ mmoawammoawa a nnipa ho na wɔ tare ka ɔmo.`
F2: `Saa asɛmfua yi abɔseɛ firi Bed-bugs, a ɛyɛ mmoawammoawa a wɔtumi ne nnipa ɛtena mu.`
---------------------- (584) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoawa Sonkurosuo yɛ mmoa bi a wɔtena baabi a wɔwoo wɔn no kyɛ. Ɛtumi tena pirebuo mu anaa baabi a ɛgye wɔn no, wɔde hɔ yɔ wɔn fie.`
F2: `Mmoawammoawa ne nsonkuronsu nyinaa dan wɔn maamenom bere tenten, prɛbu mu na ka wɔn hɔ anaa deɛ wɔakosoeɛ no.`
---------------------- (585) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ Amerika no, Nnipa bɛyɛ 400,000 na wonim sɛ wɔwɔ Multiple Sclerosis (MS) no bi, na ɛno ma no yɛ adwene mu yareɛ a ɛte so paa wɔ mmabun ne mpaninfoɔ a wɔn mfeɛ nkɔɔ anim pii mu.`
F2: `Wɔ United States of America nyinaa no, Multiple Sclerosis (MS) ho nsɛm a wɔnim wɔ hɔ no bɛyɛ 400,000, ɛno ma no bɛyɛ adwenem yare a edi kan wɔ mmofra mu ne wɔn a wɔwɔ wɔn mmpanyinmfe so.`
---------------------- (586) ----------------------
F1: `MS yɛ yareɛ a ɛka nipadua no akwaa a ɛma yɛyɛ biribiara no, na saa akwaa yi yɛ amemene no, akyidompe no, ne ntini a ɛboa wɔ adehunu mu a aka abom no.`
F2: `MS yɛ yare a ɛka nkate a ɛwɔ nipadua mu a ɛkanyan no ma ɛyɛ adwuma pɛpɛɛpɛ no, a adwene no, akyire dompe no ne aniwa no ntini na ɛbom yɛ.`
---------------------- (587) ----------------------
F1: `Nhwehwɛmu kyerɛ sɛ ɛyɛ mmerɛ sɛ mmaa benya MS no sen mmarima no.`
F2: `Nhwehwɛmu kyerɛ sɛ mmea mmɔho mmienu paa na wɔbetumi anya MS yare no sen mmɛrima.`
---------------------- (588) ----------------------
F1: `Awarefoɔ betumi asi gyinaeɛ sɛ, abateteɛ remmoa wɔn anaa abofra no.`
F2: `Ebia awarefo betumi asi gyinae sɛ mfaso nni so mma wɔn, anaa mfaso nni so mma wɔn ba no, sɛ wɔ wo abofra a.`
---------------------- (589) ----------------------
F1: `Saa awarefoɔ yi betumi asi gyinaeɛ sɛ wɔde wɔn ba no bɛma obi foforɔ.`
F2: `Saa awarefo yi betumi ayɛ nyinsɛnyigu ho nhyehyɛ ama wɔn ba no.`
---------------------- (590) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ abagyeɛ mu no, abofra no awofo hohoro wɔn nsa firi ne ho sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a awarefoɔ foforɔ betumi abɛyɛ n'awofo.`
F2: `Wɔ obi ba gye mu no, awofo a wɔ woo abofra no twa tumi a wɔwɔ wɔ abofra no so no mu sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a awarefo foforo betumi ayɛ abofra no awofo.`
---------------------- (591) ----------------------
F1: `Nyansahu botaeɛ titire ne sɛ wɔnam nyansahu akwan ahodoɔ so behu sɛdeɛ wiase no si fa yɛ n'adeɛ. Saa ɔkwan yi na ɛboa ma wɔyɛ nyansahu nhwehwɛmu dodoɔ no ara.`
F2: `Abɔde mu nyansapɛ atirimpɔ titiriw ne sɛ wɔbɛho ɔkwan a wiase no yɛ adwuma denam abɔde mu nyansapɛ kwan so. Saa kwan yi kyerɛ abɔde mu nyansapɛ mu nhwehwɛ mu ho kwan.`
---------------------- (592) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnyɛ ɛno nko ara deɛ, wɔyɛ ɔyɛyerɛ, na wɔyɛ saa de twa nkyerɛkyerɛmu ahodoɔ abi a ɛwɔ hɔ mu. Nsɛm a wobisabisa ne nneɛma a wɔde wɔn ani di akire nso boa nyansahu nhwehwɛ mu no.`
F2: `Nanso ɛnyɛ ɛno nkoaa, nsɔhwɛyɛ, ne nsɔhwɛ yɛ sɔhwɛ a wɔde yi nkyerɛkyerɛmu biako anaa nea ennu saa, nsɛm bisa, ne ani a wode di biribi akyi nso boa abɔde mu nyansapɛ mu nhwehwɛ mu.`
---------------------- (593) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔyɛ abɔde mu nhwehwɛmu ne nyansapɛfoɔ pii de wɔn adwene sii tete nwoma ahodoɔ so, ne titire ne Bible no a ɛwɔ Latin mu no.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ abɔde mu ne nyansapɛfo de wɔn ani sii nyitohɔsɛm a ɛwɔ anim no so na, ne titiriw no, wɔ Kyerɛw Kronkron no mu wɔ Latin kasa mu.`
---------------------- (594) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔgyee Aristotle adwenkyerɛ wɔ abɔdeɛ mu nyansahunu no nyinaa too mu, ne deɛ ɛfa adwene ne suban ho nhwehwɛmu ho nso.`
F2: `Wɔgyee Aristotle adwenkyerɛ wɔ abɔde mu nyansapɛ ho no too mu, na nnipa adwene ho adesua ka ho.`
---------------------- (595) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a Hela kasa no reyera nkakrankakra no, Aman ahodoɔ a ɛwɔ Atɔeɛ fam no werɛ fii wɔn Hela nyansa ne wɔn nyansahunufoɔ nkyerɛkyerɛ no.`
F2: `Abere a Greek ho nimdeɛ kɔɔ fam no, Atɔefam fo no huu sɛ wɔn atew wɔn ho efiri wɔn Greek nyansapɛ ne abɔde mu nyansapɛ ntini ho koraa.`
---------------------- (596) ----------------------
F1: `Nneɛma pii a wɔahyɛ no nso sɛ ɛkɔ so wɔ yɛn nipadua ho ne yɛn suban ho no taa gyina nhyehyɛe bi a ehyɛɛ aseɛ firii yɛn nipadua no mu ne sɛdeɛ saa nneɛma yi ba wɔ ne bere mu wɔ abɔdeɛ mu.`
F2: `Wɔn mu pii hyɛɛ no nso sɛ rhythm a ɛwɔ sɛnea nkwammoa yɛ wɔn ade ne suban a ɛtae di wɔn mu akotene no gyina endogenous ntwahokyia a ɛwɔ hɔ ne ne yɛ ɛnam biologyical dɔn so.`
---------------------- (597) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔahyɛ no nso wɔ abɔdeɛ a nkwa wɔ mu no dodow no ara mu te sɛ bacteria, fungi, nhwiren ne mmoa mu sɛ nneɛma bi a ɛba wɔ bere ne bere mu no, ɛnyɛ deɛ ɛkɔ so wɔ nipadua ne ho no na ɛma ɛba.`
F2: `Rhythm a ɛba mmere ne mmere mu, a ɛnyɛ mmere ne mmere mu ho nsɛm a ɛwɔ abɔnten ho ngyeso a ɛyɛ merɛw no, wɔn akyerw ama neama a nkwa wɔ mu, a mmoawammoawa nketewa a wɔde yare ba, fungi, nnua, ne mmoa ka ho.`
---------------------- (598) ----------------------
F1: `Nipadua no mu mmerɛ ho nhyehyɛe kɔ so yɛ adwuma wɔ berɛ ne berɛ mu a enhia sɛ tumi foforo biara a enni nipadua no mu no nya ne so nkɛntɛnsoɔ.`
F2: `Biological dɔn yɛ oscillator pii a ɛno ankasa di boa ne ho a ɛbɛ kɔ so wɔ free-running ntwahohyia bere mu mpo sɛ ɛho nsɛm mmfi abɔn ten mma a.`
---------------------- (599) ----------------------
F1: `Hershey ne Chase nhwehwɛmu no yɛ adwenkyerɛ a edi mu no mu baako a ɛka sɛ DNA no yɛ biribi a ɛkora yɛn nipadua ho nsɛm so.`
F2: `Na Hershey ne Chase sɔhwɛ no yɛ adwenkyerɛ a edi kan no mu biako a ɛkyerɛ sɛ DNA no yɛ neama a yɛnya wɔ awo mu no mu biako.`
---------------------- (600) ----------------------
F1: `Hershey ne Chase de phages, anaa mmoawa bi wɔtaa tena nkwammoa mu, de DNA a wɔn ankasa ahyehyɛ mu wura mmoawa bi wɔwɔ nkwammoa baako pɛ mu.`
F2: `Hershey ne Chase de phages, anaa mmoawammoawa, tɛu wɔn ankasa DNA mu ma no bɛyɛɛ aboawa ketewa a ɛde yare ba.`
---------------------- (601) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyɛɛ nhwehwɛmu ahodoɔ mmienu. Deɛ edi kan no wɔde radioactive phosphorus kaa DNA a ɛwɔ phage no mu no ho ɛnna afei wɔde radioactive sulfur nso kaa protein a ɛwɔ phage no mu no ho.`
F2: `Wɔ yɛɛ nsɔhwɛ mmienu a ɛne sɛ wɔde radioactive phosphorus hyɛɛ DNA no agyirae wɔ mmoawammowa mu anaa wɔde radioactive sulfur hyɛɛ mmoawammoawa no protien nnuanennuru agyirae.`
---------------------- (602) ----------------------
F1: `Nea ebetumi afiri nsakraeɛ a ɛkɔ so wɔ DNA no mu aba no gu ahodoɔ. Nsakraeɛ korɔ no, adeɛ pɔtee a ɛsakraeɛ no so mfasoɔ ne afei yɛ a nkwammoa no yɛ awoɔ ho nkwammoa no na ɛbɛkyerɛ deɛ ebefiri nsakraeɛ no mu aba.`
F2: `Nsakrae betumi anya nkɛntɛnso ahorow pii a agyina nsakrae ho nhwɛso so, neama a yɛnya wɔ awu mu no mu fa bi so mfaso ne sɛ nkwanmoa a wɔn ho aka no yɛ germ-line nkwanmmoa.`
---------------------- (603) ----------------------
F1: `Nsakraeɛ a ɛkɔ so wɔ awoɔ ho nkwammoa mu no na mmofra tumi nya firi wɔn awofoɔ hɔ nanso nsakraeɛ a ɛkɔ so wɔ mmeaeɛ afoforo no betumi asɛe nkwammoa no anaa ɛde kokoram aba.`
F2: `Nsakrae a ɛwɔ germ-line nkwanmmoa mu no nkoaa na awofo de ma mmofra, abere a nsakrae a ɛkɔ so wɔ baabi foforo no betumi ama nkwanmoa-awu anaa kokram.`
---------------------- (604) ----------------------
F1: `Esaine sɛ nsrahwɛfoɔ pɛ sɛ wɔhwɛ abɔdeɛ a etwa wɔn ho ahyia a afudeɛ ne wuram mmoa nso ka ho nti, nsrahwɛbeaeɛ a ɛfa abɔdeɛ ho no twetwe wɔn a ɛte saa no adwene.`
F2: `Nsrahwɛ a agyina abɔde so no twetwe nnipa a wɔn ani gye ho sɛ wɔbɛ sera abɔde ho mmeae sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobenya beae hɔ ho anigye, a nnua ne mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu ka ho.`
---------------------- (605) ----------------------
F1: `Nneɛma a wɔyɛ wɔ beaeɛ no bi ne ahayɔ, po so adwuma, mfonintwa, nnomaa a wɔhwɛ, ne beaeɛ a ɛyɛ fɛ a wɔsra na wosua nneɛma fa abɔdeɛ a etwa yɛn ho ahyia.`
F2: `Neama a wɔyɛ wɔ nsrahwɛbeae hɔ no be ne ahayɛ, nnamyi, mfoninitwa, nnomaa hwɛ, ne turo mu nsrahwɛ ne adesua a ɛfa ecosystem no ho.`
---------------------- (606) ----------------------
F1: `Mfatoho bi ne nsrahwɛ, mfonintwa ne adesua fa organgatuang wɔ Borneo.`
F2: `Ɛho nhweɛso ne nsrahwɛ, mfoninitwa, ne adesua a ɛfa orangutan a ɛwɔ Bornean no ho.`
---------------------- (607) ----------------------
F1: `Anɔpa biara, nkorɔfoɔ de kaa mu firi nkuro nketewa mu sene kɔ adwuma na wɔne wɔn a wɔn nso rekɔ adwuma wɔ beaeɛ a nkurɔfoɔ no afiri hɔ no.`
F2: `Anɔpa biara, nkurɔfo firi nkuro nketewa a ɛwɔ ɔman bi mu wɔ wɔn ahyɛn mu kɔ wɔn adwumayɛ beae na afoforo a wɔn a adwumayɛ beae wɔ baabi a wɔfirii no nso twa wɔn ho kɔ.`
---------------------- (608) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ akɔneaba a ɛsesa yi mu no, obi biara ho wɔ mu na yɛboa saa akɔneaba yi denam kaa nhyehyɛe a yɛfa so.`
F2: `Wɔ ahyɛn a edi akɔ ne aba mu no ɔkwan bi so no obiara ne nnosotwe adwuayɛbeae bi wɔ nkitahodi, na wɔboa wɔn agyina ahyɛn a ɛnyɛ ɔman no de so.`
---------------------- (609) ----------------------
F1: `Nyansahunu kyerɛ sɛ wiase yi a carbon ayɛ mu ma no asesa asase no gyinabea efiri beaeɛ a edi mu a aboa nnipa nsakraɛ ahodoɔ beboro mfeɛ ɔpepem mmienu nie.`
F2: `Abɔde mu nyansapɛ kyerɛ sɛ carbon economy a ɛyɛ peme no atu afiri biosphere no mu afiri ne tebeae a ɛboaa nnipa evolution bɛyɛ mfe apepem mmienu a atwam no.`
---------------------- (610) ----------------------
F1: `Obiara de ne hyɛ ekuo mu na obiara de ɛhyɛn bi di dwuma. Ɛkame ayɛ sɛ obiara ɛhyɛn adwuma no ho asɛm.`
F2: `Obiara de ne ho hyɛ bea mu na wɔde nnosoatwe ho akwanso adeyɛ de dwuma. Ɛbɛyɛ sɛ obira nwinwi fa nnosoatwe ho akwanso adeyɛ ho.`
---------------------- (611) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ aman a enya nkoanim mu no wontaa nte soboɔ a ɛte sɛɛ mfa nsuo pa ne nsamsoɔ a ɛresɛe ho.`
F2: `Wɔ aman a atu mpɔn mu no worentae nte anwinwi a ɛte saa ɛfa nsu pa ho anaa nsamsoɔ a adwiri gu fam ho.`
---------------------- (612) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛdeɛn nti na wɔtaa bɔ ɛhyɛn ho nhyehyeɛ no soboɔ, deɛ nti na wontumi nyɛ deɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wɔyɛ da biara da? So nim na ɛhyɛn ho adwumayɛfoɔ nnim adwuma anaa? Anaa biribi a ɛsene saa rekɔ so?`
F2: `Adɛn nti na nnosoatwe akwanso adeyɛ ma anwini a ɛtete saa ba, adɛn nti na wɔdi mfomso dabiara da? So nnosoatwe ho mfiriyɛfo adwumayɛ nnimu anaa? Anaa biribi a ɛho hia rekɔ so?`
---------------------- (613) ----------------------
F1: `Traffic Flow yɛ nhwehwenu a wɔayɛ fa ahyɛnkafoɔ ne ahyɛn ahodoɔ a etu firi beaeɛ baako kɔ beaeɛ foforɔ ɛnne nkitahodie a ɛkɔ so wɔn ntam no.`
F2: `Sɛnea Trafik Sen yɛ ankorankoro ahyɛnkafo ahokeka ne ahyɛn a ɛwɔ sibeae mmienu mfinfini ne nkutahodi a wɔne wɔn ho wɔn ho nya ho adesua.`
---------------------- (614) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, esaine sɛ worentumi nhunu su a ahyɛnkafoɔ bɛda no adi pɔtee a edi mu no nti ɛma wɔn ho adesua bɛyɛ dene.`
F2: `Nea ne ka nnye mu no, trafik sen ho adesua yɛ den efirisɛ worentumi nka ahyɛnkafo suban nsie na akyinnye biara nni ho wɔ ɔha mu nkyikyemu ɔha mu.`
---------------------- (615) ----------------------
F1: `Anigyesɛm ne sɛ, ahyɛnkafoɔ taa da su ahodoɔ bi adi a edi nsɛ; ɛno nti, wɔtaa hunu nsɛdie kakra wɔ kaa a edi akɔneaba no nneyɛe mu na wɔde bu ho akontaa.`
F2: `Nea ne ka ye mu no, ahyɛnkafo da suban bi a ɛwɔ anohwete bi a esisi so adi; ne saa nti, trafik akwan sɛn wɔ ɔkwan a ntease wɔm mu na wobetumi akyerɛw ho asɛm wɔ nkontahyɛde mu.`
---------------------- (616) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a akwanmuyhɛn bɛsen dwoodwoo no, wɔn ama ayɔnkofa abɛda saa su titiri mmiɛnsa no ntam: (1) sɛdɛ adeɛ sene, (2) adeɛ mu duru, ne (3) mirika a adeɛ kɔ wɔ ne kwan so.`
F2: `Sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛ da trafik sen adi yie no, wɔn ama ayɔnkofa abɛda saa su titiri mmiɛnsa no ntam: (1) sɛnea ade sen, (2) ade mu duru, ne (3) mirika a ade kɔ wɔ bere bi mu.`
---------------------- (617) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ayɔnkofa wei boa wɔ ɛhyɛn sie ho nhyehyɛe, ɛho bɔtrimyɛ, ne akwantempɔn ho dwumadie.`
F2: `Saa ayɔnkofa yi boa wɔ nhyehyɛe yɛ, adwinne, ne sɛnea ade yɛ adwuma mu ma ahyɛn akwan. S`
---------------------- (618) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa a wodii kan tu kɔɔ ewiem ne mmoawammoawa. Tu a wotumi tu nti wotumi pam atamfoɔ a wɔmmerɛ na wɔtumi nya aduane di na wohyia nna yie paa.`
F2: `Mmoa a wodii kan tu kɔɔ wim yɛ mmoawa. Hokwan a wɔwɔ sɛ wɔtu no boaa wɔn ma wɔtumi gwan firii atamfo nsam a wɔmmerɛ ho na wɔtumi nya aduan di na wohyia nna yie paa.`
---------------------- (619) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoawammoawa pii wɔ hokwan a wotumi de wɔn ntaban fam wɔn honam.`
F2: `Mmoawa pii wɔ hokwan sɛ wɔbɛ bobɔ wɔn ntaban akɔ wɔn akyi afam wɔn honam ho.`
---------------------- (620) ----------------------
F1: `Wei ma no yɛ mmerɛ ma wɔn sɛ wɔde wɔn ho besie beaeɛ a esua afi mmoa a wɔ pɛ wɔn awe ho.`
F2: `Eyi ma wɔnya mmeae pii a wɔbetumi de wɔn ho asie afiri atamfo ho.`
---------------------- (621) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛndɛ no, mmoawammoawa a wontumi mfa wɔn ntaban mfam wɔn ho yɛ agyɛnen ne mayflies.`
F2: `Ɛnɛ, mmoawa a wɔn ntumi bobɔ wɔn ntaban nkɔ wɔn akyi yɛ agyɛnen ne mayflies.`
---------------------- (622) ----------------------
F1: `Mfe apem a atwam no, papa bi a wɔferɛ no Aristarchus kae sɛ, Splar System no twa Owia no ho hyia.`
F2: `Mfe apem a atwam no, papa bi wɔferɛ no Aristarchus kae se Okyinsoroma no twa owia no ho hyia.`
---------------------- (623) ----------------------
F1: `Ebinom susuu sɛ dea ɔka no yɛ ampa nanso nnipa pii nso ne no bɔɔ abira; sɛ Solar System no twa Asase no ho hyia, Owia no ka ho (ne ɛmpo nsoroma afoforɔ).`
F2: `Na nkurɔfo bi susu sɛ nea ɔkae no yɛ nokware nanso nkurɔfo pii gye nea ɛne no bɔ abira no dii; a ɛno ne sɛ Okyinsoroma no twa Asase no ho hyia, a Owia no ka ho (ne mpo nosroma afoforo a aka no).`
---------------------- (624) ----------------------
F1: `Nyansa wɔ wei mu, efiri sɛ yɛnte nka sɛ asase no twa ne ho, anaa wo te?`
F2: `Nyansa wɔ eyi mu, efiri sɛ yɛnte nka sɛ Asase no twa ne ho, anaa wote?`
---------------------- (625) ----------------------
F1: `Amazon Asubɔntene no yɛ nsubɔntene atenten ne akɛseɛ a ɛwɔ asase so no mu deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu. Sɛ asubɔntene kɛseɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no nsuo a ɛwɔ mu no bɛyɛ mmɔ ho nwɔtwe.`
F2: `Amazon nsubɔntene no yɛ nsubɔntene a ɛyɛ akɛse na ɛwa no mu nea ɛto so mmienu wɔ Asase so. Sɛ nsubɔntene kɛsɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu no nsu a ɛwɔ mu no bɛyɛ mmɔho 8.`
---------------------- (626) ----------------------
F1: `Amazon no san nso yɛ nsubɔntene a emu terɛ paa, ɛtɔ da a ɛyɛ akwansin nsia.`
F2: `Amazon no san nso yɛ aubɔntene a emu terɛw paa wɔ asase so, ɛtɔ da bi a ne tɛtrɛtɛ no yɛ akwansin asia.`
---------------------- (627) ----------------------
F1: `Nsuo mu ɔha mu nkyekyɛmu aduonu a efiri okyinsoroma wei mu nsubɔntene mu no firi Amazon mu.`
F2: `Nsu a ahwie firi nsoroma no mu nsubɔntene mu kɔ po no mu no ɛmu ɔha mu nkyekyɛmu 20 firi Amazon no mu.`
---------------------- (628) ----------------------
F1: `Amazon Asubɔntene no yɛ 6,387 km (akwansin 3,980). Egye nsuo firi asubɔntene nketewa ɔpepem mu.`
F2: `Amazon asubɔntene titiriw no yɛ 6,387 km (3,980 akwansin). Egye nsu firi nsubɔntene nketewa apepem mu.`
---------------------- (629) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ pyramid-adan wɔ aboɔ mu no tuaa so kosii Ahennie Dada no ewieɛ no, na Giza pyramid yɛ akɛseɛ na sɛdeɛ wosii no no na ɛyɛ adutwam a ebi rento no.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ pyramid - dan a wɔsi wɔ abo mu no toaa so kosii sɛ Ahenni Dedaw no baa ewie, Giza pyramid no na foforo biara nni hɔ a ɛto no wɔ ne kɛse ne sɛnea wɔde nimdeɛ a ɛyɛ adutwam sii no.`
---------------------- (630) ----------------------
F1: `Tete Egypt Ahennie foforoɔ no ho dwiriw wɔn wɔ adidifoɔ no ahoni no ho, na na ɛda so yɛ kama ɛmfa ho sɛ edi mfe ɔpepem no.`
F2: `Tete Egyptfo Ahenni Foforo no ho dwiriiw wɔn wɔ adidifo no nkaedum no ho, a na saa bere no na ɛda so yɛ kama ɛmfa ho sɛ adi bɛboro mfe ɔpepem no.`
---------------------- (631) ----------------------
F1: `Vatican City mu nnipa dodoɔ yɛ ahannwɔtwe. Ɛyɛ ɔman ketewa a adi ne ho wɔ wiase yi mu ne ɔman a emu nnipa sua.`
F2: `Nnipa dodow a wɔwɔ Vatican City yɛ bɛyɛ 800. Ɛyɛ aman a ade wɔn ho no mu ketewa wɔ wiase na ɛyɛ ɔman a emu nnipa sua koraa.`
---------------------- (632) ----------------------
F1: `Vatican City de Italy kasa na ebu ɔman no na ɛno nso na ɛyɛ ɔman no kasa titiri.`
F2: `Vatican City de Italyfo kasa na ebu ɔman no na ɛno na wɔde bɔ nkɔmɔ wɔ ɔman no mu.`
---------------------- (633) ----------------------
F1: `Italy kasa no na ɛyɛ ɔman no da biara da kasa a wɔn a wɔwɔ amanɔne no ka wɔ adwuma mu na Latin kasa na wɔ tae ka wɔ ɔsom nhyiamu aseɛ.`
F2: `Italyfo kasa no yɛ daadaa kasa a wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma wɔ amanɔne no de yɛ adwuma abere a Latin kasa na wɔtae ka wɔ ɔsom nhyiam ase.`
---------------------- (634) ----------------------
F1: `Vatican Cityfoɔ nyinaa yɛ Roman Catholic som mufoɔ.`
F2: `Vatican City mu fo nyinaa yɛ Roman Catholic som mu fo.`
---------------------- (635) ----------------------
F1: `Nkurɔfoɔ nim nnuro mu nnoɔma te sɛ sika kɔkɔɔ, dwetɛ, ne kɔbere fi tete mere mu no, efiri sɛ yɛbɛhu wei nyinaa wɔ abɔdeɛ mu a yɛn danedanee mu na yetumi de anwinnade a ɛho adwuma ɛnnyɛ den na etu firi fam.`
F2: `Nkurɔfo nim nnuru mu fapem a ɛka bɔmu yɛ neama tesɛ sika kɔkɔɔ, dwetɛbona, ne kɔbere a efiri teteberemu, na yɛbetumi ahu eyi nyinaa wɔ abɔde mu wɔ asase so aba mu na ɛyɛ mmerɛw koraa sɛ yɛde anwinade a efiri tete atu efiri fam.`
---------------------- (636) ----------------------
F1: `Onyansapɛfoɔ, Aristotle, kae sɛ nnoɔma baako anaa mmiɛnsa na ɛbom yɛ adeɛ. Yeinom ne asase, nsuo, mframa, ne ogya.`
F2: `Aristotle, a ɔyɛ onyansapɛfo, kae sɛ ade biara wɔ neama biako anaa nea ɛboro anan wɔ mu. Eyinom ne asase, nsu, mframa, ne ogya.`
---------------------- (637) ----------------------
F1: `Na wei yɛ nnoɔma anan a ɛbɔ mu yɛ adeɛ no (sɛdɛ yɛhyehyɛ no pɛpɛɛpɛ): adeɛ a ɛyɛ den, nea ɛsen, mframagya, ne plasma, ɔsan de kaa ho sɛ wɔ sesa kɔ ade foforɔ mu bɛyɛ dea yɛ hu.`
F2: `Na eyi tesɛ tebea anan a ade wɔmu no (wɔ nnidiso mu): ade a ɛyɛ den, ade a ɛsen, mframagya, ne plasma, ɔde kaa ho nso sɛ wɔtumi sesa kɔ ade foforo mu na ɛbɛyɛ ade a yɛhu.`
---------------------- (638) ----------------------
F1: `Nnadeɛ mmienu anaa mmiɛnsa na ɛwɔ Nnadeɛ mframa mu. Mma wo werɛ mfi sɛ nnoɔma pii na ɛwɔ periodic table no so.`
F2: `Nnade mframa yɛ nnade mmienu anaa nea ɛboro saa a wɔde frafra. Mma wo werɛ mfi sɛ neama pii na ɛwɔ periodic pono no so.`
---------------------- (639) ----------------------
F1: `Yebu nnoɔma te sɛ calcium ne potassium sɛ nnadeɛ. Afei nso, dwetɛ ne sika kɔkɔɔ nso yɛ nnadeɛ.`
F2: `Wɔbu neama tesɛ calcium ne potassium sɛ nnade. Nokwarem no, nnade wɔ dwetɛbona ne sika kɔkɔɔ mu.`
---------------------- (640) ----------------------
F1: `Nnadeɛ mframa bi nso wɔhɔ a nnadeɛ kakra te sɛ carbon womu.`
F2: `Wobetumi anya nnadeɛ afrafra a neama nketewa a ɛnyɛ nnade wɔmu tesɛ carbon.`
---------------------- (641) ----------------------
F1: `Biribiara a ɛwɔ wiase wei mu no nnoɔma na ɛbɔmu yɛ deɛ no. Adeɛ biara wɔ nnoɔma nketewa wɔ mu a yɛferɛ no atoms.`
F2: `Biribiara a ɛwɔ Wiae no mu no neama na ɛka bɔ mu yɛ ade no. Ade biara mu no neama nketenkete bi a wɔferɛ wɔn atɔm na ɛwɔ mu.`
---------------------- (642) ----------------------
F1: `Atoms yɛ ntetenkete paa na emu ɔpepepem mmiɛnsa betumi akɔ adeɛ bi aseɛ.`
F2: `Atɔm yɛ nketewa paa ma emu ɔpepepepem bɛtumi akɔ osiwie a ɛwɔ asɛmfua yi awie no mu.`
---------------------- (643) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛno nti, na twerɛdua yɛ adamfo pa ma nnipa pii bere a ɛbaeɛ no.`
F2: `Ne saa nti, na kyerɛwdua no yɛ adamfo pa ma nkurɔfo beberee bere a ɛbae no.`
---------------------- (644) ----------------------
F1: `Awerɛhoɔsɛm ne sɛ, atwerɛ ho akwan ahodoɔ pii na aba, twerɛdua abɛyɛ adeɛ a yɛdeyɛ nnoɔma a ɛba fam.`
F2: `Awerɛhosɛm ne sɛ, sɛnea akwan ahorow a wɔfa so kyerɛw aba no, kyerɛwdua no a wɔde di dwuma no so atew wɔ ne debeae ne nea wɔde yɛ mu.`
---------------------- (645) ----------------------
F1: `Seisei nkrurɔfoɔ twerɛ nsɛm wɔ kɔmputa so, na ɛho nhia sɛ wɔbɛhwehwɛ asensene deɛ koraa.`
F2: `Sesei nkurɔfo kyerɛw nsɛm wɔ kɔmputa so, eno nti wonhia sɛ wɔ bɛbɛn anwinade a wɔde sew kyerɛwdua ano.`
---------------------- (646) ----------------------
F1: `Dea obi betumi ayɛ ara ne sɛ ɔbɛdwene dea ɛbɛto keyboard sɛ adeɛ foforɔ san ba a daakye.`
F2: `Nea obi betumi ayɛ ne sɛ ɔbɛ dwen nea ɛbɛto keyboard no sɛ ade foforo san ba abere a mmere rekɔ so no a.`
---------------------- (647) ----------------------
F1: `Fission topaɛ yɛ adwuma wɔ gyinapɛn a ɛne sɛ ɛgye ahoɔden na atumi aka nucleus a ɛwɔ protons ne neutrons beberee.`
F2: `Fission topae yɛ adwuma wɔ nnyinasosɛm a ɛno ne sɛ ɛde ahoɔden na ɛhyehyɛ nucleus a ɛwɔ proton pii ne neutron pii.`
---------------------- (648) ----------------------
F1: `Te sɛ deɛ wopia adaka a emuyɛ duru de aforo mmepɔ bi no. Nucleus no pete na egyae ahoɔden bi a ɛte saa mu.`
F2: `Ɛte sɛ nea worepia adaka bi a amu yɛ duru de aforo bepɔ bi. Ɛpete nucleus no bio na egyae ahoɔden no bi mu.`
---------------------- (649) ----------------------
F1: `Atoms bi wɔ hɔ a nuclei a ɛwɔ mu no engyina faako na ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔn ntam tete a wohia nhyɛ kakraa anaa wonhia nhyɛ biara.`
F2: `Atɔm bi wɔ nuclei a ɛsesa na ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔn ntam tetew sɛ biribi pia no kara anaa sɛ hwee ampia no a.`
---------------------- (653) ----------------------
F1: `Beaɛ a ɛyɛ tum pii wɔ beaɛ a ɛbɛn no esane sɛ crust no yɛ tea nti. Na ɛyɛ merɛ ma lava sɛ ɛbɛba atifi.`
F2: `Ebia meae a ɛyɛ tum pii bɛwɔ beaɛ a ɛbɛn no esiane sɛ asase a ani yɛ abotan no yɛ tea nti. Na ɛyɛ merɛw ma ogyabepɔ mu ade a atu go no sɛ ɛbɛba atifi.`
---------------------- (654) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyɛ nnoɔma mu nsɛm de hwehwɛ nnoɔma a ekanyan anaa ɛsɔ nkurɔfoɔ ani.`
F2: `Wɔyɛ neama mu nsɛm de hwehwɛ neama a ɛkanyan anaa ɛsɔ nkurɔfo ani.`
---------------------- (655) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nsɛm wei kyerɛ sɛ nkurɔfoɔ wɔ nnoɔma bi a wohia/anaa wɔpɛ paa a wɔde hyɛ wɔn mu aberɛ a worenyin abɛyɛ mpaninfoɔ no.`
F2: `Saa nsɛm yi kyerɛsɛ nkurɔfo wɔ neama bi a wɔhia/anaa wɔpɛ paa a wɔde hyɛ wɔn mu berɛ a worenyin abɛyɛ mpaninfo no.`
---------------------- (656) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nsɛm wei hwɛ nea ɛwɔ nea ɛma nkurɔfoɔ bi pɛ sɛ wɔyɛ nnoɔma bi ne nea nnoɔma a ɛwɔ wɔn mpɔtam no betumi ama wɔn ayɛ anaa ɛma wɔyɛ nnoɔma bi.`
F2: `Saa nsɛm wei hwɛ nea ɛwɔ nea ɛma nkurɔfo bi pɛ sɛ wɔyɛ neama bi ne nea neama a ɛwɔ wɔn mpatam no betumi ama wɔn ayɛ anaa ɛmma wɔnnyɛ neama bi.`
---------------------- (657) ----------------------
F1: `Nnoɔma mu nsɛm mmienu a agye din paa yɛ Maslow Hierarchy of Needs Theory ne Hertzberg Two Factor Theory no.`
F2: `Neama mu nsɛm mmienu a agye din paa no yɛ Maslow Hierarchy of Needs Theory ne Hertzberg Two Factor Theory no.`
---------------------- (658) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛbɛka a, suban mmienu betumi ayi ne te sɛ adwumamu mpaninfoɔ fi aseɛ di wɔn a na wɔyɛ n'adwumayoɔ anim a. Asɛm no fa bi ne sɛ ɔbɛbɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛyɛ “mmarima bo mu biako” (anaa mmaa).`
F2: `Sɛ yɛbɛka a, suban mmienu betumi ayi ne te sɛ adwumamu mpaninfo firi ase di wɔn a na wɔyɛ n'adwuma mu mfɛfo anim a. Asɛm no fa bi ne sɛ ɔbɛbɔ mmɔden sɛ ɔbɛyɛ “mmarima bo mu biako” (anaa mmaa).`
---------------------- (659) ----------------------
F1: `Adwumamu panin a ɔte saa no ɛyɛ den ma no sɛ ɔbɛsisi gyinaeɛ, ɔbɛyɛ nnoɔma bi de ateɛ n'adwuma mu foɔ, ɔbɛhwɛ wɔn mmɔdenbɔ, ɔde dwumadie bɛhyehyɛ wɔn nsa, ne sɛ ɔbɛma wɔn ahu wɔn mfomsoɔ.`
F2: `Adwumamu panyin a ɔte saa no ɛyɛ den ma no sɛ ɔbɛsisi gyinae, ɔbɛyɛ neama bi de ateɛ n'adwuma mu fo, ɔbɛhwɛ wɔn mmɔdenmmɔ, ɔde dwumadie bɛhyehyɛ wɔn nsa, ne sɛ ɔbɛma wɔn ahu wɔn mfomso.`
---------------------- (660) ----------------------
F1: `Asɛm no fa foforɔ ne sɛ, nipa no sesa bɛyɛ nipa foforɔ na ɔte nka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɔsesa sɛdeɛ kuo no yɛ biribiara na wɔyɛ no wɔ ɔkwan a ɔbɛkyerɛ wɔn so.`
F2: `Wɔ asɛm no fa foforo no, nipa no sesa bɛyɛ nipa foforo na ɔte nka sɛ ɛsɛ sɛ ɔsesa sɛnea kuw no yɛ biribiara na wɔyɛ no wɔ ɔkwan a ɔbɛkyerɛ wɔn so.`
---------------------- (661) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ biribiara akyi no, kuo no nkunimdie ne ne ntsodie nyinaa wɔ ɔkanifoɔ no nsam.`
F2: `Wɔ biribiara akyi no, kuw no nkunimdi ne ne ntsodi nyinaa wɔ ɔkanifo no nsam.`
---------------------- (662) ----------------------
F1: `Saa suban no ta de mpapaemu ba akannifoɔ ne kuo no mufoɔ a aka no.`
F2: `Saa suban no tae de mpaepaemu ba akannifo ne kuw no mufo a aka no ntam.`
---------------------- (663) ----------------------
F1: `Virtual kuo mu nkitahodie yɛ papa te sɛ conventional kuo mu nkitahodie, nanso nsonsoneɛ kakra wɔ wɔn ntam.`
F2: `Virtual kuw mu nkitahodi yɛ papa te sɛ conventional kuw mu nkitahodi, nanso nsonsone kakra wɔ wɔn ntam.`
---------------------- (664) ----------------------
F1: `Virtual kuo mu foɔ tae yɛ adwuma sɛ beaɛ a kuo no mu foɔ a wɔhu wɔn no gye mmoa firi berɛ a wɔhia mmoa no.`
F2: `Virtual kuw mu fo tae yɛ adwuma sɛ bea a kuw no mu fo a wɔhu wɔn no gye mmoa firi bere a wɔhia mmoa no.`
---------------------- (665) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtaa wɔ tumi sen conventional kuo mu foɔ efiri sɛ kuo no mu foɔ tumi hyia wɔ mmerɛ ahodoɔ bi mu esane sɛ wɔwɔ mmeaɛ ahodoɔ nti nanso ebia wɔn man no mu foɔ renteaseɛ.`
F2: `Wɔtae wɔ tumi sen conventional kuw mu fo efiri sɛ kuw no mu fo tumi hyia wɔ mmere ahorow bi mu esiane sɛ wɔwɔ mmeae ahorow nti nanso ebia wɔn man no mu fo rentease.`
---------------------- (666) ----------------------
F1: `“Kuo a wɔn nhu” a ɛbɛ wɔ hɔ (Larson ne LaFasto, 1989, p109) no yɛ biribi soronko a ɛwɔ virtual kuo ho.`
F2: `“Kuw a wɔn nhu” a ɛbɛ wɔ hɔ (Larson ne LaFasto, 1989, p109) no yɛ biribi soronko a ɛwɔ virtual kuw ho.`
---------------------- (667) ----------------------
F1: `“Kuo a wɔn nhu” yɛ adwumayɛfoɔ kuo bi a kuo biara mu ni biara de wɔn akontabuo ma. Kuo a wɔn nhu no de akwankyerɛ ma kuo muni biara.`
F2: `“Kuw a wɔn nhu” yɛ adwumayɛfo kuw bi a kuw biara mu nipa biara de wɔn akontabu ma. Kuw a wɔn nhu no de akwankyerɛ ma kuw muni biara.`
---------------------- (668) ----------------------
F1: `Adɛn nti na kuo bi bɛpɛ sɛ wɔfa ɔkwan a ɛgye berɛ wei so sɛ wɔbɛ te adesua kuo? Atrimpɔ baako a ɛma wɔde adesua kuo ho adwene yɛɛ adwuma yɛ adwenkyerɛ afoforoɔ a na ɛde bɛba enti.`
F2: `Adɛn nti na kuw bi bɛpɛ sɛ wɔfa ɔkwan a ɛgye bere yi so sɛ wɔbɛ te adesua kuw? Atrimpɔw biako a ɛma wɔde adesua kuw ho adwene yɛɛ adwuma yɛ adwenkyerɛ afoforo a na ɛde bɛba enti.`
---------------------- (669) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wɔde nnoɔma a ɛwɔ hɔ yɛ adwuma yie wɔ mmeaɛ ahodoɔ a ɛyɛ adwuma wɔ kuo no mu a, adwene mu nsusueɛ a wɔde yɛ biribi ne nimdeɛ bɛkɔ so.`
F2: `Sɛ wɔde neama a ɛwɔ hɔ yɛ adwuma yie wɔ mmea ahorow a ɛyɛ adwuma wɔ kuw no mu a, adwene mu nsusui a wɔde yɛ biribi ne nimdeɛ bɛkɔ so.`
---------------------- (670) ----------------------
F1: `Nea ɛbɛfiri mu aba ne sɛ, ɔkwan a kuo bi bɛbɔ mu ayɛ adwuma sɛ wɔbedi akwansidiɛ bi so no betumi ama wɔn anya ɔkwan foforoɔ a wɔ bɛ fa adu wɔn adetɔfoɔ ahiadeɛ ho.`
F2: `Nea ɛbɛfiri mu aba ne sɛ, ɔkwan a kuw bi bɛbɔ mu ayɛ adwuma sɛ wɔbedi akwanside bi so no betumi ama wɔn anya ɔkwan foforo a wɔ bɛ fa so adu wɔn adetɔfo ahiade ho.`
---------------------- (671) ----------------------
F1: `Ansana kuo bi betumi ahu akwan ahodoɔ a wɔ de bɛyɛ adeɛ no, ɛsɛ sɛ akannifoɔ no yɛ amamerɛ bi a ɛbɛma wɔn adɔ akwan ahodoɔ a wɔ de yɛ nnoɔma mu asukɔ ne sɛ wɔbɛ kyerɛ afoforoɔ deɛ wɔnim ne kuo adesua.`
F2: `Ansana kuw bi betumi ahu akwan ahorow a wɔ de bɛyɛ ade no, ɛsɛ sɛ akannifo no yɛ amamerɛ bi a ɛbɛma wɔn adɔ akwan ahorow a wɔ de dɔ neama mu asukɔ ne sɛ wɔbɛ kyerɛ afoforo nea wɔnim ne kuw adesua.`
---------------------- (672) ----------------------
F1: `Angel (2006), kyerɛkyerɛɛ Continuum ɛkwan a wɔ fa so yɛ adeɛ no mu sɛ ɛyɛ ɔkwan a wɔde boa kuo no na ama edu wɔn dwumedie ho botaeɛ ho pɛɛ.`
F2: `Angel (2006), kyerɛkyerɛɛ Continuum ɛkwan a wɔ fa so yɛ ade no mu sɛ ɛyɛ ɔkwan a wɔde boa kuw no ma edu ne dwumedi ho botae ho pɛɛ.`
---------------------- (673) ----------------------
F1: `Neurobiological ho nsɛm de adanseɛ a yɛhu ma wɔ nsɛmtwerɛ kwan a yɛfa so yɛ sɛdeɛ yɛ dwene ho nhwehwɛmu. Ne saa enti ɛma beaeɛ a nhwehweɛmu no kɔ so no yɛ tee na ɛma no yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.`
F2: `Adwenem yare ho nsɛm de adanse a yɛhu ma wɔ nsɛmtwerɛw kwan a yɛfa so yɛ sɛnea yɛ dwene ho nhwehwɛmu. Ne saa enti ɛma beae a nhwehwɛmu no kɔ so no yɛ tee na ɛma no yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.`
---------------------- (674) ----------------------
F1: `Ayɔnkofa a ɛda adwene ho yare ho adesua ne suban mu no boa abɔdeɛ mu nyansapɛfoɛ wɔ wɔn nhwehwɛmu mu.`
F2: `Ayɔnkofa a ɛda adwene ho yare ho adesua ne suban mu no boa abɔde mu nyansapɛfo wɔ wɔn nhwehwɛm mu.`
---------------------- (675) ----------------------
F1: `Efiri bere tenten na wɔn ahu sɛ adwene sɛeɛ, trauma, leisions ne tumors nya suban so nkɛntɛnsoɔ na ɛma nsakraeɛ ba sedeɛ adwene no yɛ adwuma ho.`
F2: `Efiri bere tenten na wɔn ahu sɛ adwene sɛei, trauma, leisions ne tumors nya suban so nkɛntɛnso na ɛma nsakrae ba sɛnea adwene no yɛ adwuma ho.`
---------------------- (676) ----------------------
F1: `Abɛefoɔ neama a anya nkɔanim no ma yɛn kwan ma yɛtumi hu na yɛtumi hwehwɛ adwene no yɛbeaɛ ne ɔkwan a ɛfaso yɛ adwuma mu wɔ ɔkwan a yɛnhuu bi da so.`
F2: `Abɛefo neama a anya nkɔanim no ma yɛn kwan ma yɛtumi hu na yɛtumi hwehwɛ adwene no yɛbea ne ɔkwan a ɛfaso yɛ adwuma mu wɔ ɔkwan a yɛnhuu bi da so.`
---------------------- (677) ----------------------
F1: `Wei ma yɛnya nsɛm ne neama a yɛde besi biribi a akanya atenka a ɛboa yɛn ma yɛte sɛdeɛ adwene no yɛ adwuma ase.`
F2: `Eyi ma yɛnya nsɛm ne neama a yɛde besi biribi a akanya atenka a ɛboa yɛn ma yɛte sɛdeɛ adwene no yɛ adwuma ase ho nhwɛsode.`
---------------------- (678) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ AI wɔ abɔdeɛmu nyansapɛ ho anansesɛm a ɛyɛ den no, AI yɛ kɔmputa ho nyansapɛ ho nkorabata a ɛho hia paa, ɛyɛ sunan, adesua ne mfidie ho adenim mu nsesamu.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ AI wɔ abɔdemu nyansapɛ ho anansesɛm a ɛyɛ den no, AI yɛ kɔmputa ho nyansapɛ ho nkorabata a ɛho hia paa, ɛyɛ suban, adesua ne mfidie ho adenim mu nsesamu.`
---------------------- (679) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ AI mu nhwehwɛmu no mfidie a ɛma adwuma yɛ merɛ na ehia nimdieɛ hu suban ka ho bi.`
F2: `Wɔ AI mu nhwehwɛm mu no mfidie a ɛma adwuma yɛ merɛw na ehia nimdieɛ hu suban ka ho bi.`
---------------------- (680) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛho nhwɛsoɔ no bi yɛ ɛso die, ɛho atrimubɔ ne ɛho nhyehyɛe, sɛ wobetumi ayi adetɔfoɔ nhwhwɛmu ne wɔn nsɛmbisa ano, ne sɛ wobɛhyɛ wɔn nsa ano atwerɛ, wɔn nne ne wɔn anim nso.`
F2: `Ɛho nhwɛso no bi yɛ ɛso di, ɛho atrimubɔ ne ɛho nhyehyɛe, sɛ wobetumi ayi adetɔfoɔ nhwhwɛmu ne wɔn nsɛmbisa ano, ne sɛ wobɛhyɛ wɔn nsa ano akyerɛw, wɔn nne ne wɔn anim nso.`
---------------------- (681) ----------------------
F1: `Saa nnoɔma no abɛyɛ nhyehyɛe a ate ne ho, a n'atrimupɔ ne sɛ ɛbɛma asetena yi mu haw ho nsɔanoɔ.`
F2: `Saa neama no abɛyɛ nhyehyɛe a ate ne ho, a n'atrimupɔw ne sɛ ɛbɛma asetena yi mu haw ho nsɔano.`
---------------------- (682) ----------------------
F1: `Sesei wɔde AI nhyehyɛe no tae di dwuma wɔ sikasɛm ho nsɛm, aduruyɛ, mfididwumayɛ ne asrafoɔ adwuma mu, efirisɛ wɔn ayɛ wɔ afie kɔmputa ne video so agudie software application so.`
F2: `Sesei wɔde AI nhyehyɛe no tae di dwuma wɔ sikasɛm ho nsɛm, aduruyɛ, mfididwumayɛ ne asrafo adwuma mu, efirisɛ wɔn ayɛ wɔ afie kɔmputa ne video so agudie software application so.`
---------------------- (683) ----------------------
F1: `Field trip yɛ fa kɛseɛ paa wɔ adesuadanmu dwumadie biara mu. Mpɛn pii no ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ bi ani bɛgye ho sɛ ɔde n'adesuafoɔ bɛkɔ mmaeaɛ pii a wɔrentumi mfa ɛhyɛn ɛnkɔ.`
F2: `Field trip yɛ fa kɛse paa wɔ adesuadanmu dwumadi biara mu. Mpɛn pii no ɔkyerɛkyerɛfo bi ani bɛgye ho sɛ ɔde n'adesuafo bɛkɔ mmaeae pii a wɔrentumi mfa ɛhyɛn ɛnkɔ.`
---------------------- (684) ----------------------
F1: `Technology de nsɔ ano me denam virtual field trips so. Adesuafoɔ no betumi ahwɛ tete nneaɛma akoraeɛ mu neama, akɔ hwɛ aquarium, anaa ahwɛ mfonini a ɛyɛ fɛ aberɛ a wɔte wɔn adesuadan mu.`
F2: `Technology de nsɔano ma ɛnam virtual field trips so. Adesuafo no betumi ahwɛ tete neama akorae mu neama, akɔ hwɛ aquarium, anaa ahwɛ mfonini a ɛyɛ fɛ bere a wɔte wɔn adesuadan mu.`
---------------------- (685) ----------------------
F1: `Field trip a woni afoforɔ bɛkyɛ de nam abɛfoɔ ntontan so no yɛ ɔkwan pa a wobɛ susu akwantuo bi ho na wone adesua foɔ a wobenya daakye no akyɛ.`
F2: `Field trip a woni afoforo bɛkyɛ ɛnam abɛefo ntontan so no yɛ ɔkwan pa a wobɛfa so asusu akwantu bi ho na wone adesuafo a wobenya daakye no akyɛ.`
---------------------- (686) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ nhwɛsoɔ no, afe biara adesuafoɔ a wɔfi Bennet School wɔ North Carolina yɛ websaite a ɛfa wɔn kwan a wɔtu kɔɔ Ɔman no Ahenhuro mu no, afe biara mu no wɔsesa sɛdeɛ websaite no te, nanso ne fa a etwamu no wɔgya wɔ so na ɛbɛye nhoma a wɔkyerɛu sie mu.`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso no, afe biara adesuafo a wɔfi Bennet Sukuu wɔ North Carolina yɛ wɛbsyte a ɛfa wɔn kwan a wɔtu kɔɔ Ɔman no Ahenhuro mu, afe biara mu no wɔsesa sɛnea wɛbsyte no te, nanso ne fa a etwamu no wɔgyaw wɔ so na ɛbɛyɛ nhoma a wɔkyerɛw sie.`
---------------------- (687) ----------------------
F1: `Blogs nso betumi aboa ma sɛdeɛ adesuafoɔ twereɛ no atu mpɔn. Aberɛ a adesuafoɔ de ɔkasammara a ɛho ɛnteɛ ne nsɛmfua a wɔmmɔ no yie fi wɔ blog sua hunu ase no, aso a nkurɔfoɔ de bɛma wɔn no bɛ ma saa adeɛ no asesa.`
F2: `Blogs nso betumi aboa ma sɛnea adesuafo kyerɛw no atu mpɔn. Berɛ a adesuafo de ɔkasammara a ɛho ɛnte ne nsɛmfua a wɔmmɔ no yie firi wɔn blog osuahunu ase no, aso a nkurɔfo de bɛma wɔn no bɛma saa ade no asesa.`
---------------------- (688) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛfi berɛ sɛ adesuafoɔ na wɔtae yɛ nkurɔfoɔ a wɔde wɔn aso ma wɔn enti, blog atwerɛfoɔ no bɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛtwerɛ wɔn nsɛm yie na nkurɔfoɔ ankeka ɛho nsɛm.`
F2: `Esiane sɛ adesuafo na wɔtae yɛ nkurɔfo a wɔde wɔn aso ma wɔn enti, blog akyerɛwfo no bɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛkyerɛw wɔn nsɛm yie na nkurɔfo ankeka ɛho nsɛm.`
---------------------- (689) ----------------------
F1: `Afei nso blogging "hyɛ adesuafoɔ ma wɔhu wiase a etwa wɔn ho ahyia no wɔ ɔkwan foforɔ so." Esani ɔpɛ a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔdu wɔn a wɔyɛ aso ma wɔn ahia deɛ ho enti adesuafoɔ no adenim kɔ anim na ɛyɛ anika nso (Toto, 2004).`
F2: `Afei nso blogging "hyɛ adesuafo ma wɔhu wiase a etwa wɔn ho ahyia no wɔ ɔkwan foforo so." Esiane ɔpɛ a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔdu wɔn a wɔyɛ aso ma wɔn ahiade ho enti adesuafo no adenim kɔ anim na ɛyɛ anika nso (Toto, 2004).`
---------------------- (690) ----------------------
F1: `Blogging yɛ adwinnadeɛ a ɛkanyan nkabomu, na ɛhyɛ adesuafoɔ no nkuran ma wɔterɛ wɔn adesua mu ma no tera wɔn daadaa adesuafoɔdan mu da.`
F2: `Blogging yɛ adwinnade a ɛkanyan nkabom, na ɛhyɛ adesuafo no nkuran ma wɔterɛw wɔn adesua mu ma no tera wɔn daadaa adesuafodan mu da.`
---------------------- (691) ----------------------
F1: `'Blogs' a wɔde de dwuma wɔ ɔkwan pa so no "betumi ahyɛ adesuafoɔ nkura ma wɔn atumi pɛnsɛnpɛnsɛn nsɛm mu na wɔn atumi a susu neama ho yie; de nam sɛ wɔbɛ gye wiase ntontan kɛseɛ no so neama so ntɛm no, adesuafoɔ tumi kyerɛ wɔn gyinabeaeɛ wɔ deɛ afoforɔ atwerɛ ho na wɔn asan nso a kyerɛ sɛdeɛ wɔ hu neama wɔ nsɛm titiri bi ho (Oravec, 2002).`
F2: `Blogs a wɔde de dwuma wɔ ɔkwan pa so no "betumi ahyɛ adesuafo nkuran ma wɔn atumi apɛnsɛnpɛnsɛn nsɛm mu na wɔn atumi asusu neama ho yie; ɛnam sɛ wɔbɛ gye wiase ntontan kɛse no so neama so ntɛm no, adesuafo tumi kyerɛ wɔn gyinabeae wɔ nea afoforo akyerɛw ho na wɔn asan nso akyerɛ sɛnea wɔhu neama wɔ nsɛm titiri bi ho ( Oravec, 2002).`
---------------------- (692) ----------------------
F1: `Ottawa yɛ Canada man no ahenkuro a ɛyɛ fɛ yie, na wɔka kasa mmienu na wɔwɔ mfonini hwɛbeaɛ a ɛyɛ fɛ yie ne tete nnoɔma akoraeɛ a Canada man no tete nnoɔma ne wɔn nnoɔma a wɔ so wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Ottawa yɛ Canada man no ahenkuro a ɛyɛ fɛ yie, na wɔka kasa mmienu na wɔwɔ mfonini hwɛbeae a ɛyɛ fɛ yie ne tete neama akorae a Canada man no tete neam ne wɔn neam a ɛwɔ so wɔ hɔ.`
---------------------- (693) ----------------------
F1: `Niagara nsuo a ɛworoɔ a ɛwɔ anaafoɔ fam ne atifi fam yɛ tenabea ma abɔdeɛ mu afɛfɛde soronko wɔ Mustoka ne akyire.`
F2: `Niagara nsu a ɛworɔw a ɛwɔ anaafofam ne atififam yɛ tenabeae ma abɔde mu afɛfɛde soronko wɔ Mustoka ne akyire.`
---------------------- (694) ----------------------
F1: `Nnoɔma wei nyinaa ne beberee a ɛka ho ka Ontario ho asɛm ma wɔn a wɔn mfi hɔ hu Canadafoɔ sɛ wɔdi mu anksaa.`
F2: `Neama yi nyinaa ne beberee a ɛka ho ka Ontario ho asɛm ho ma wɔn a wɔn mfiri hɔ hu Canadafo sɛ wɔdi mu anksaa.`
---------------------- (695) ----------------------
F1: `Mmeaɛ akɛseɛ a ɛwɔ atifi fam anim nohɔa no ɔmanfoɔ kakraa bi na wɔte hɔ na ebi nso adane asase pradadadaa a obiara ɛnte so.`
F2: `Mmeae akɛse a ɛwɔ atififam anim nohoa no ɔmanfo kakraa bi na wɔte hɔ na ebi nso adan asase pradadadaa a obiara ɛnte so.`
---------------------- (696) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛfa ɔmanfoɔ no ho ntotoho a ɛyɛ bebree nwanwa no: Abibifoɔ Aborɔfoɔ dodoɔ naa te US ɛsen Canadafoɔ man no mma.`
F2: `Ɛfa ɔmanfo no ho ntotoho a ɛyɛ bebree nwanwa ho no: Abibifo Aborɔfo dodow naa te US sen Canadafo man no mma.`
---------------------- (697) ----------------------
F1: `East African supɔ ahodoɔ no wɔ Indian Ocean no mu a ɛbɛn po no wɔ Afrika.`
F2: `Africafo Apuefam Nsupɔ no wɔ Indiafo pokɛse a ɛwɔ Africa apuefam mpoano no.`
---------------------- (698) ----------------------
F1: `Madagascar ne kuro a ɛso paa na ɛsan yɛ asasetam a mmoa ne afifideɛ ahodoɔ wɔ so, sɛ yɛbɛka a.`
F2: `Madagascar wɔ ɔkwan biara so no yɛ kɛse sen biara, na ɛyɛ asasetam a ade ne ho sɛ ɛba mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu ho a .`
---------------------- (699) ----------------------
F1: `Supɔ nketewa no mu dodoɔ no ara yɛ aman a ade wɔn ho, anaasɛ wɔde wɔn ho abɔ France, na wɔfrɛ wɔn mpoano a ahotɔ wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Nsupɔ nketewa no dodow no ara yɛ aman a wɔn ade wɔn ho, anaasɛ ɛne France abom, na wonim no sɛ adetrasodi mpoano beae.`
---------------------- (700) ----------------------
F1: `Arabfoɔ no nso de Kramosom baa nsaase no so, na ɛgyee ntini kɛseɛ wɔ Comoros ne Mayotte.`
F2: `Arabfo no nso de Islamsom baa nsase no so, na ɛna ɔkwan kɛse so wuraa Comoros ne Mayotte.`
---------------------- (701) ----------------------
