F1: `Europafoɔ no tumi ne wɔn nnisoɔ no firii aseɛ wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 15 no mu, berɛ a Portugalni nhwehwɛmufoɔ Vasco da Gama hunuu ɔkwan a wɔbɛfa soɔ no na ɔtoo no din Cape Route a efiri Europa kosi India.`
F2: `Europefo nkɛntɛnso ne atutenasɛm firii ase wɔ 15th century mu, bere a kwanhwehwɛfo Vasco da Gama a ɔyɛ Portugualni huu Cape Route a efiri Europe kɔ India no.`
---------------------- (702) ----------------------
F1: `Sahel etwa n'atifi mantam hɔ ahyia, na anafoɔ ne atɔeɛ fam no so Atlantic Ocean no agye hɔ nso.`
F2: `Wɔ atififam no Sahel atwa ɔmantam no ho ahyia, ne anaafofam na atɔ am no Atlantic Ocean no.`
---------------------- (703) ----------------------
F1: `Mmaa: Wɔhyɛ mmaa akwantufoɔ nyinna nkuran sɛ wɔbɛka sɛ wɔaware, ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔaware anaa ɔnwareeɛ no.`
F2: `Mmea: wɔhyɛ nkuran sɛ ɔbea biara a ɔretu kwan no bɛka sɛ w’aware, ɛmfa ho sɛ w'aware anaa ɔnware yɛ no.`
---------------------- (704) ----------------------
F1: `Ebehia nso sɛ wobɛhyɛ kawa (nanso ɛnyɛ deɛ ne boɔ dene.`
F2: `Ɛboa nso sɛ wohyɛ kawa a (ɛnyɛ nea ɛsɛ nea ne bo yɛ den dodo).`
---------------------- (705) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsɛ sɛ mmaa kae hunu sɛ amammerɛ mu nsonsonoeɛ bɛma wɔabu biribi sɛ ateetee na ɛnyɛ na sɛ obi bedi w'akyi, aso w'abasa mu, ne deɛ ekeka hoɔ.`
F2: `Mmea nhu sɛ nsonsonoe a ɛwɔ amammerɛ mu no betumi awie wɔ nea wɔbɛbu no sɛ ahoguan no na ɛnyɛ ade a obiara nnim sɛ obi bedi w’akyi, sɛ obi bɛsɔ wo nsam, ne nea ɛkeka ho.`
---------------------- (706) ----------------------
F1: `Si no pi sɛ sɛ woremma mmarima no ho kwan, na nsuro sɛ wobegyina wo nan soɔ (sɛ amammerɛ pene soɔ anaa empene soɔ no, ɛno mma ɛnyɛ ne kwan soɔ).`
F2: `Yɛ den wɔ mmarima abam bu mu, na mmɔ hu sɛ wobegyina wo gyinae si ho (amammerɛ nsonsonoe anaa sɛ ɛnte saa no, ɛmma no mmfata!).`
---------------------- (707) ----------------------
F1: `Berber apofofoɔ na wɔkyekyeree ɛnnɛ yi Casablanca kuro no wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 10 ansa na yɛn berɛ yi mu, na Phoeniciafoɔ, Romanfoɔ, ne Merenidfoɔ de hɔ yɛɛ po so hyɛn gyinabea a ɛho hia a wɔfrɛ no Anfa.`
F2: `Berber afarefo na wɔ tew Casablanca kuro a abaso no wɔ 10th century BCE mu, na Phoeniciafo, Romanfo ne Merenidfo na wɔde dii dwuma sɛ ɛpo so hyɛn gyinabea a nhyehyɛe da ho a ne din de Anfa.`
---------------------- (708) ----------------------
F1: `Portugalfɔ no sɛe no na wɔsan sii foforɔ a wɔtoo no din Casa Branca, nanso woyii no totwene wɔ asasewosoɔ a ɛbaa 1755 no akyi.`
F2: `Portugualfo no sɛe no na wɔsan sii na wɔferɛɛ no Casa Branca di, na wogyaw hɔ bere a asasewosow bi sii wɔ 1755.`
---------------------- (709) ----------------------
F1: `Moroccofoɔ kannifoɔ no san kyekyeree kuro no too ne din Daru I-Badya na Spainfoɔ adwadifoɔ a wofirii adwadie ase wɔ hɔ no maa no edin Casablanca.`
F2: `Moroccofo nkramohene no san sii kuro no sɛ Daru l-Badya na Spainfo aguadifo a wɔ tew aguadi wɔ hɔ no maa no edin Casablanca.`
---------------------- (710) ----------------------
F1: `Casablanca yɛ beaeɛ a ɛhɔ adetɔ nyɛ anika wɔ Morocco man no mu nyinaa.`
F2: `Casablanca yɛ mmeae a ɛhɔ nhyɛ da nnyɛ anika sɛ wobedi dwa wɔ no mu biako wɔ Morocco.`
---------------------- (711) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ tete Medina ho no, ɛnyɛ den sɛ wobehunu mmeaeɛ a wɔtɔn Moroccofoɔ nneɛma, te sɛ tagine, anwenneɛ, nneɛma a yɛde aboa nwoma ayɛ, ɛne geegaw a ɛwɔ ahosuo ahodoɔ, nanso yei nyinaa yɛ nsrahwɛfoɔ no ntira.`
F2: `Wɔ Medina dedaw no ho no ɛyɛ mmerɛw sɛ wobehu bea a wɔtɔn Maroccofo amammerɛ ho neama, te sɛ tagines kyɛnsen, kutu, oguanhoma nneama, hookah, ne geegaws ahorow pii, nanso ne nyinaa yɛ nsrahwɛfo no de.`
---------------------- (712) ----------------------
F1: `Goma yɛ nsrahwɛbea a ɛwↄ Democratic Republic of Congo epueɛ fam a ɛbɛn Rwanda kuro no.`
F2: `Goma yɛ nsrahwɛbea a ɛwↄ Democratic republic of Congo epue fam a ɛbɛn Rwanda kuro no.`
---------------------- (713) ----------------------
F1: `Wↄ afe 2002 mu no, ogya a efiri bepↄw mu sene firi Nyiragongo bepↄw mu sɛe Goma kurow no akwan dodoↄ no ara so, ne titire no, kuro no mfimfini a edwadie ko so paa no.`
F2: `Wↄ afe 2002 mu no,ogya a efi bepↄw mu sen no fi Nyiragongo bepↄw mu sɛe Goma kurow no akwan dodow no ara so,ne titiriw no, kuro no fa a edwadie kↄ so paa.`
---------------------- (714) ----------------------
F1: `Goma yɛ beaɛ a ↄhaw nhyɛda nni deɛ, nanso sɛ wobɛpɛ sɛ wofi hↄ kↄ mmeaeɛ ahodoↄ a, ebehia sɛ wo yɛ nhwehwemu hu sɛdeɛ tebea no teɛ ɛnam ntↄkwa a ɛrekↄso wↄ North Kivu Province no.`
F2: `Ɛwom sɛ Goma yɛ baabi a ↄhaw nhyɛda nni de, nanso sɛ wopɛ sɛ wofi hↄ kↄ mmeae afoforo a, ehia sɛ wo yɛ nhwehwɛmu hu sɛnea tebea no te esiane ntↄkwa a ɛtaa kↄ so wↄ North Kivu mpↄtam no nti.`
---------------------- (715) ----------------------
F1: `ɛↄKurow no da bepↄw no ase, na wubetumi aforo bepↄw no afiri hↄ na saa nso na ɛyɛ baabi a ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobetumi atena asua "Mountain Gorilla" ho adeɛ, na ne boↄ nso da fam koraa wↄ Abibirem ha.`
F2: `Kurow no da baabi a wↄfa foro bepↄw no. Saa ara nso na ɛyɛ baabi a ɛnyɛ den koraa sɛ wobɛtumi atena asua "Mountain Gorilla" ho ade, na ne bo nso da fam koraa wↄ Abibirem (Africa) ha.`
---------------------- (716) ----------------------
F1: `Wobetumi de boda-boda (okada) ahwɛ Goma kurow no mu. Ɛboↄ a wↄtaa gye yɛ 500 Francs ne Congofo Francs sɛ worefa no ɛberɛ tiawa mu a.`
F2: `Wobetumi de boda-boda (okada) ahwɛ kurow no mu. Wↄtaa gye bɛyɛ 500 congolese Francs (Congofo sika), sɛ wofa no bere tiawa bi a.`
---------------------- (717) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛhɔ kɔ a ɛyɛ den no akyi no, wɔde "Timbuktu" gyina hɔ ma deɛ ɛfiri amannɔne, akyirikyiri man so.`
F2: `Sɛ wɔde nea ɛne no bɔ abusua a wonnya no bom a, "Timbuktu" aba sɛ wɔde begyina nnuane a ɛmfiri hɔ, na ɛfiriri akyirikyiri anan mu.`
---------------------- (718) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnnɛ, Timbuktu yɛ kuro a edi hia, ɛmfa ho sɛ din a woagye no ma ɛhɔ yɛ nsrahwɛ beaeɛ, na ɛwɔ wiemhyɛn gyinabea no.`
F2: `Nnɛ,Timbuktu abɛyɛ kuro ohia wɔ so, ɛmfa ho sɛ ne din pa ma hɔ yɛ beae a nsrahwɛfo kɔ hwɛ, na ewimuhyɛn gyinabea nso wɔ hɔ.`
---------------------- (719) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ 1990 mu no, wɔde kaa wiase nyinaa agyapadeɛ mmeaeɛ a ɛda esiane mu no ho, esaine ɔhaw a ɛserɛ so anhwea de ba hɔ no nti.`
F2: `Wɔ 1990 no, wɔde kaa wiase abakɔsɛm mmea a ɛda esiane mu no ho wɔ dinfrɛ homa no mu, esiane asase pradadaa so anhweaso ho hu nti.`
---------------------- (720) ----------------------
F1: `Na ɛyɛ mmeaeɛ titire no mu baako a Henry Loius Gates kɔe wɔ ne PBS dwumadie titire Anwonwadeɛ a ɛwɔ Afrika no mu.`
F2: `Na ɛyɛ gyinabeae titiriw no mu biako wɔ Henry Louis Gates' PBS Anwowade Soronko wɔ Africafo Wiase no mu.`
---------------------- (721) ----------------------
F1: `Kuro no da nso koraa firi ɔman no nkuro ahodoɔ a aka no ho, esiane sɛ wɔyɛ wɔn adeɛ te sɛ Arabfoɔ na ɛnyɛ Afrikafoɔ no nti.`
F2: `Kuro no wɔ nsonsonoe a atim hɔ wɔ ɔman no nkuro a aka no ho, esiane sɛ ɛwɔ Arabicfo su mmom sen Africafo de.`
---------------------- (722) ----------------------
F1: `Kruger National Park (KNP) no da South Africa atifi-apueeɛ fam na ɛnam Mozambique apuei fam hyeɛ no ho, wɔ Zimbabwe atifi fam, na anafoɔ fam hɔ no yɛ ɔdɛnkyɛm asubɔntene no.`
F2: `Kruger Ɔman no Turo (KƆT) no da Africa Atɔefam wɔ atifi-apuefam na ɛnam Mozambique ɔhye no ano wɔ apuefam, Zimbabwe wɔ atififam, na anafofam ɔhye no yɛ Ɔdenkyɛm Asubɔnten no.`
---------------------- (723) ----------------------
F1: `Ahomegyebea no wɔ beaeɛ a ne kɛseɛ bɛyɛ 19,500km² na w'akyekyɛmu afa ahodoɔ 14, mmoa ne nfifideɛ soronko na ɛwɔ emu biara mu.`
F2: `Turo no kata 19,500 Km² na wɔn akyɛ mu wɔ ecozones ahorow 14 mu, emu biako biara boa mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu ahorow.`
---------------------- (724) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛyɛ beaeɛ a ɛyɛ fɛ paa a ɛwɔ South Africa no mu baako na wobu no sɛ deɛ edi mu paa wɔ South Africa National Parks (SANParks).`
F2: `Ɛyɛ ade a ɛtwetwe adwene ba so no mu biako a ɛwɔ South Africa na wobu no sɛ South Africa Man Turo (SAMTuro) no flagship.`
---------------------- (725) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ wɔ South Africa Ɔman no Ahomegyebea nyinaa mu no, wɔwɔ da biara da nhyehyeɛ a wɔde bɔ ɛho ban ne sika a wotua ansa na woawura ahomegyebea hɔ.`
F2: `Sɛnea South Africa Man no Turo nyinaa te no, wɔwɔ da biara akorae ne emu ba akatua ma turo no.`
---------------------- (726) ----------------------
F1: `Mfasoɔ bɛba so sɛ wobɛtɔ Wild Card, a ebetumi ama woawura ahomegyebea ahodoɔ bi a wɔapaw wɔ South Africa hɔ anaa South Africa Ɔman no Ahomegyebea no nyinaa mu.`
F2: `Ebetumi nso ayɛ mfasode ama obi sɛ ɔbɛtɔ Wild Card, a ɛma kwan ma wo wura turo no mu fa biara wɔ South Africa anaa South Africa Man Turo nyinaa mu.`
---------------------- (727) ----------------------
F1: `Hong Kong asase no nyaa ne din firii Hong Kong supɔ no na ɛyɛ beaeɛ a nsrahwɛfoɔ pii de wɔn ani si so paa.`
F2: `Hong Kong nsupɔ ma Hong Kong asasesin no din na ɛyɛ beae a nsrahwɛfo bebree bu no sɛ ade titiriw a wɔn ani si so.`
---------------------- (728) ----------------------
F1: `Adan a wɔahyehyɛ no ndidisoɔ no ma wɔde Hong Kong wiem no toto bar chart a ɛhyerɛn ho na esaine nsuo a ɛwɔ Victoria Suhyɛn Gyinabea hɔ no nti ɛma ɛhɔ da hɔ kann.`
F2: `Adan nsrabɔ a ɛma Hong Kong beae a munumkum na asase no hyia no wɔde aka a bar chart a ɛhyerɛn a ɛte saa esiane sɛ Victoria Harbour nsu da hɔ nti.`
---------------------- (729) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wobehunu Hong Kong yie a, firi supɔ no so na kɔ beaeɛ a ɛne Kowloon nsuo no anim no bɔ abira.`
F2: `Sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobɛ hu Hong Kong yie no, firi nsupɔ no so na kɔ Kowloon nsuanim a ɛni no bɔ animhwɛ no.`
---------------------- (730) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa abɔ apee so wɔ Hong Kong nkuro ahodoɔ a enya nkɔanim no mu fa kɛseɛ no ara mu wɔ mpoano no atifi asase a wɔsan gyeeɛ no so.`
F2: `Hong Kong Nsupɔw no fa kɛse a enntuu mpɔn no dodow pii a ahyɛ asase wɔn asan agye a ɛwɔ atfifam mpoano ano.`
---------------------- (731) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛha na Britainfoɔ ndisofoɔ no faa sɛ wɔn deɛ, ɛno nti sɛ worehwehwɛ deɛ ɛkyerɛ sɛ wɔbedii saa beaeɛ no so wɔ tete mmerɛ no mu a, ɛha yɛ beaeɛ pa a wobetumi ahyɛ aseɛ.`
F2: `Aha yɛ beae a British man a ɛhyɛ ɔman foforo so no fae sɛ wɔn de ɛno nti sɛ worehwɛ adanse a ɛfa asasesin a ɔman foforo hyɛ so no ho asɛm a, ɛha yɛ beae pa a wobɛhyɛ ase.`
---------------------- (732) ----------------------
F1: `Sundarbans yɛ kwaeɛ a ɛwɔ nsuo mu wɔ mpoano a ɛso paa wɔ wiase nyinaa mu, ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ 80 km (50 mi) a efiri mpoano hɔ wura Bangladeshfoɔ ne Indiafoɔ kuro no mu.`
F2: `Sundarbans no yɛ littoral mangrove abɔso a ɛso paa wɔ wiase, ɛtene 80 km (50 mi) kɔ Bangladeshifo ne Indiafo asase a efiri mpoano no ano.`
---------------------- (733) ----------------------
F1: `UNESCO ada no adi sɛ Sundarbans yɛ Wiase nyinaa Agyapadeɛ Beaeɛ. Wɔfrɛ kwaeɛ ne fa a ɛwɔ Indiafoɔ asase soɔ no Sundarbans National Park.`
F2: `Wɔada Sundarbans adi sɛ UNESCO Wiase Amammerɛ Beae. Kwae no fa a ɛwɔ Indiafo hye mu no so no wɔferɛ no Sundarbans Man Turo.`
---------------------- (734) ----------------------
F1: `Kwaeɛ no nyɛ beaeɛ a nnua sisi atɛkyɛ mu nkoaa — mmom kwaeɛbiretuo a aka a na berɛ bi agye Gangetic asase pradadaa no so no ka ho bi.`
F2: `Kwae no nnyɛ mangrove atɛkyɛ kɛkɛ mmom - gyinabeae a etwa to a aka wɔ kwaebirentu a mmere bi na ɛkata Gangetic asase no so no.`
---------------------- (735) ----------------------
F1: `Sundarbans no da asase a ne kɛseɛ yɛ 3,850 km², a sɛ wokyɛ mu mmieɛnsa a, ne fa baako yɛ nsuo/atɛkyɛ mu.`
F2: `Sundarbans no kata beae a ɛyɛ 3,850 km², a bɛyɛ abiesa mu nkyɛmu biako yɛ nsu/atɛkyɛ mantam.`
---------------------- (736) ----------------------
F1: `Efiri 1966 no, Sandarbans hɔ ayɛ beaeɛ a wɔakora so ama mmoa ne mfifideɛ, na sɛ wɔsese a, seesei asebɔ a wɔfrɛ wɔn Royal Bengal no 400 ne aforoteɛ a biribi sisi wɔn ho bɛyɛ 30,000 na ɛwɔ saa beaeɛ hɔ.`
F2: `Efiri 1966 no Sundarbans no ayɛ mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu ahobanmmɔ beae, na wɔbu akonta sɛ afei wɔwɔ Bengal Adehye asebɔ 400 ne ɔforɔte a ne ho yɛ anworan nworan 30,000 wɔ mpɔtam hɔ.`
---------------------- (737) ----------------------
F1: `Bɔɔso ahodoɔ tu firi mansini mansini ahyɛn gyinabea (twa asubɔntene no so) da mu no nyinaa, nanso emu dodoɔ no ara, ne titire no deɛ eni kyerɛ epueeɛ ne Jakar/Bumthang tu firi 06:30 ne 07:30 ntam.`
F2: `Ahyɛn firi ɔmansin-ntam hyɛn gyinabea (twa nsu no) da mu n nyinaa, ɛmfa ho sɛ dodow no, titiriw wɔn a wɔrekɔ apuefam ne Jakar/Bumthang sim wɔ 06:30 ne 07:30 ntam.`
---------------------- (738) ----------------------
F1: `Esaine sɛ mansini mansini bɔɔso no taa yɛ ma no nti, ɛbɛyɛ papa sɛ wobedi kan atɔ wo tekiti no nna kakraa bi ansa.`
F2: `Sɛnea ɔmansin-ntam ahyɛn tae yɛ ma no, nyansa wom sɛ wobɛtɔ akwannya nkrataa nna kakra ansa na bere aso.`
---------------------- (739) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔde Japanese Coaster buses, bɔɔso a ɛkɔ mansini no mu dodoɔ no ara, na emu tena yɛ ahotɔ na esi pi.`
F2: `Japanfo Coaster ahyɛn som ɔmansin no dodow pii , na ahotɔ wom na ɛyɛ esi pi.`
---------------------- (740) ----------------------
F1: `Taxi a nnipa dodoɔ foro no kɔ ntɛm na ɛyɛ ɔkwan a ahotɔ wom a wubetumi de akɔ mmeaeɛ a ɛbɛn, te sɛ Paro (Nu 150) ne Punakha (Nu 200).`
F2: `Ahyɛn a wɔkyɛ yɛ ɔkwan a ɛyɛ ntɛm na ahotɔ wɔ mu a wɔfa so tu kwan lɔ mmeae a ɛbɛn, te sɛ Paro (Nu 150) ne Punakha (Nu 200).`
---------------------- (741) ----------------------
F1: `Oyapock Asubɔtene Nsamsoɔ no yɛ nsamsoɔ a wɔde nhoma asoso mu. Efiri Oyapock Asubɔntene no so fa Oiapoque wɔ Brazil ne Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock wɔ Guiana.`
F2: `Wͻde nhoma na asoso Oyapock asubͻntene no nsamsoͻ no mu agyina hͻ.Wͻde asoso Oyapock asubͻntene no mu fi Oiapoque kuro a ԑwͻ Brazil ne Saint-Georges de l’Oyapock a ԑwͻ French Guiana.`
---------------------- (742) ----------------------
F1: `Abantenten mmienu yi sorokɔ yɛ mita 83, ne tenten yɛ mita 378 na ɛwɔ akwan mmienu a ne tɛtrɛtɛ yɛ 3.50 m.`
F2: `Abantenten no sorokͻ yԑ mita 83, emu tenten yԑ mita 378 na ԑwͻ akwan mmienu a ne tԑtrԑtԑ yԑ 3.50 m.`
---------------------- (743) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛkwan a ɛwɔ nsamsoɔ no aseɛ no yɛ mita 15. Wosi wieeɛ wɔ Ɔsanaa 2011 mu, nanso woamma kaa amfa so kosi Ɔbɛnem 2017.`
F2: `Ԑkwan a ԑda nsamsoͻ no ase yԑ mita 15. Wosi wiei wͻ Ͻsanaa 2011, nanso wͻammue anto hͻ ma kaa amfa so kosi Ͻԑnem 2017.`
---------------------- (744) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔahyehyɛ sɛ nsamsoɔ no bɛyɛ adwuma ankasa wɔ Ɛbɔ 2017, berɛ a wɔhwɛ kwan sɛ wobewie Brazilfoɔ beaeɛ a wɔhwɛ deɛ ewura hɔ anaa efiri hɔ kɔ no so no.`
F2: `Wͻahyehyԑ sԑ wobebue msamsoͻ no ano wͻ Ԑbͻ 2017, bere a Brazilfo awie baabi a wͻhwԑ nneԑma a ewura na anaa epue firi hͻ no.`
---------------------- (745) ----------------------
F1: `Na Guaranifoɔ no yɛ kuromma a na wɔte beaeɛ a ɛnnɛ wɔfrɛ no Paraguay, a na wɔyɛ abɔmmɔfoɔ a wontena faako a wodua aduane de hwɛ wɔn ho ne wɔn mmusua.`
F2: `Na Guaranifo no yԑ tetefo kuw a wͻn ho hia paa a na wͻte baabi a nnԑ wͻfrԑ no Eastern Paraguay, a na wͻyԑ abammͻfo a wontena faako na wodua aduane de hwԑ wͻn ho ne wͻn mmusua.`
---------------------- (746) ----------------------
F1: `Na tete mmusuakuo bi te sɛ Guaycuru ne Payagua mo de Chaco mantam hɔ ayɛ wɔn fie, na na wɔkɔ ahayɔ, wɔboaboa nnuane ano na woyi nam de hwɛ wɔn ho.`
F2: `Na Chago mantam yԑ fie ma tete mmusuakuw ahorow bi te sԑ Guaycuru ne Payagua, a na wͻkͻ ahayͻ, boaboa nnuane ano na wͻkͻ po de hwԑ wͻn ho.`
---------------------- (747) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 16 mu no, Paraguay a na wɔfrɛ no "India Mantam gramo no", nyaa ne din esaine nkitaho a Spainfoɔ nkonimdifoɔ no ne tete kuromma ekuo kuo no nyaeɛ no.`
F2: `Wͻ afeha a ԑtͻ so 16 mu no, Paraguay a na wͻfrԑ no “India Mantam Gramo no” bae bere a Spainfo nhԑsofo no ne tete kuromma kuw ahorow no nyaa nkitahodi no.`
---------------------- (748) ----------------------
F1: `Spainfoɔ no hyɛɛ wɔn ndisoɔ berɛ a edii mfeha mmiɛnsa no aseɛ.`
F2: `Spainfo no hyԑԑ wͻn nniso a edii mfehaha mmiԑnsa no ase.`
---------------------- (749) ----------------------
F1: `Efiri sɛ wɔhyɛɛ Asuncion aseɛ wɔ 1537 mo no, Paraguay abɔ mmɔden akora wɔn tete nneɛma ne deɛ wogyina hɔ ma no so.`
F2: `Fi bere a wͻde Asunción sii hͻ wͻ 1537 no, Paraguay abͻ mmͻden akora ne tete nneԑma ne nea ogyina hͻ ma no so,`
---------------------- (750) ----------------------
F1: `Argentina agye din sɛ ɔwɔ polo kuo ɛne polo bɔfoɔ a edi mu no mu baako wɔ wiase nyinaa.`
F2: `Argentina agye din sɛ ɔwɔ polo kuw ne wͻn a wͻbɔ polo a edi mu no mu baako wɔ wiase nyinaa.`
---------------------- (751) ----------------------
F1: `Akansie a ɛyɛ kɛseɛ paa no kɔ so afe no mu wɔ Ɔpɛnimma mu wɔ beaeɛ a wɔbɔ polo wɔ Las Canitas.`
F2: `Akansie a ɛyɛ kɛse paa no kɔ so afe no mu wɔ Ɔpɛnimma mu wɔ baabi a wɔbɔ polo wɔ Las Canitas.`
---------------------- (752) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtɔ mmerɛ bi nso a, wobehunu akansie nketewa a wosi wɔ afe no mu.`
F2: `Ɛtɔ da a, wobehu akansie nketewa a wosi wɔ afe no mu.`
---------------------- (753) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wopɛ akansie ahodoɔ no ho kaseɛ ne beaeɛ a wobetumi atɔ tekiti a, hwɛ Asociation Argentina de Polo.`
F2: `Sɛ wopɛ akansie ahorow no ho kaseɛ ne baabi a wobetumi atɔ tekiti a, hwɛ Asociacion Argentina de Polo.`
---------------------- (754) ----------------------
F1: `Falklandfoɔ sika a wodi no ne Falkland pound (FKP) a sɛ wɔkari a, ɛte sɛ British pound (GBP) no baako.`
F2: `Falklandfo sika a wodi no ne Falkland pound (FKP) a sɛ wɔkari a, ɛte sɛ British pound (GBP) no baako.`
---------------------- (755) ----------------------
F1: `Wobetumi asesa sika wɔ sikakorabea baako pɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ a wobehunu wɔ Stanley sɛ wotwa kwan no mu firi FIC West sotɔɔ no.`
F2: `Wubetumi asesa sika wɔ sikakorabea koro pɛ a ɛwɔ supɔw no so a wobehunu wɔ Stanley berɛ a woatwa FIC West sotɔɔ no mu no.`
---------------------- (756) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛyɛ deɛ wɔbɛgye British pounds wɔ supɔ no so baabiara ne Stanley mu nso. Kaade a wɔde yi sika ne United States dollar no nso yɛ deɛ wɔgye tom.`
F2: `Ɛyɛ nea wɔbԑgye British pounds wɔ supɔw no so baabiara. Na wͻ Stanley mu nso, kaade a wɔde yi sika ne United States dollar no nso yɛ nea wɔgye tom.`
---------------------- (757) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ supɔ no mmeaeɛ a ɛmmɛn kurom no, ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wɔbɛgye kaade a wɔde yi sika no, nanso wobetumi agye Britainfoɔ ne United Statesfoɔ sika no. Di kan bisa beaeɛ ne wura no sika tua ho nhyehyɛe ɛwɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Wɔ supɔw no beae a ɛmmɛn kurom no, ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wɔbɛgye kaade a wɔde yi sika no, nanso wobetumi agye Britainfo ne United Statesfo sika no. Di kan bisa beae no wura no sika tua ho nhyehyɛe a ɛwɔ hɔ.`
---------------------- (758) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛsesa Falklandfoɔ sika no berɛ woafiri supɔ no so no, ɛno nti sesa sika no ansa na woafiri supɔ no so.`
F2: `Ɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛsesa Falklandfo sika no bere a woafi supɔw no so no, ɛno nti sesa sika no ansa na woafi supɔw no so.`
---------------------- (759) ----------------------
F1: `Esaine sɛ Montevideo wɔ Equator no anaafoɔ fam no nti, berɛ a ɛhɔ ayɛ hyeɛ no na n'atifi fam hɔ ayɛ nwunu na saa ara nso na sɛ ɛhɔ yɛ nwunu a, na ɛha nso ayɛ hyeɛ.`
F2: `Esaine sɛ Montevideo wɔ Equator no anaafo fam no nti, bere a ɛhɔ ayɛ hye no na n'atifi fam hɔ ayɛ nwini na saa ara nso na sɛ ɛhɔ yɛ nwini a, na ɛha nso ayɛ hye.`
---------------------- (760) ----------------------
F1: `Montevideo yɛ beaeɛ a ɛhɔ tumi yɛ hyeɛ na ɛhɔ tun\mi yɛ nwunu nso; na wɔ bosome a ɔhyew wɔ mu no, wɔtaa nya ɔhyew a ano yɛ den boro +30°C.`
F2: `Montevideo yɛ baabi a ɛhɔ tumi yɛ hye na ɛhɔ tumi yɛ nwini nso; na wɔ bosome a ɔhyew wɔ mu no, wɔtaa nya ɔhyew a ano yɛ den boro +30°C.`
---------------------- (761) ----------------------
F1: `Awɔberɛ no tumi yɛ te sɛ deɛ ayɛ nwunu no; wiem tebea ntaa nyɛ nwununwunu, nanso mframa no ne deɛ emu yɛ hyeɛ a aka abom no ma ɛyɛ awɔw sene sɛdeɛ afidie a wɔde hwɛ no kyerɛ no.`
F2: `Awɔbere no tumi yɛ te sɛ nea ayɛ nwini no; wim tebea ntaa nyɛ nwininwini paa, nanso mframa no ne nea emu yɛ hye a aka abom no ma ɛyɛ awɔw sene sɛnea afiri a wɔde hwɛ no kyerɛ no.`
---------------------- (762) ----------------------
F1: `Wonni "nsuo" ne "ɔpɛ" mmerɛ pɔtee bi: nsuo a ɛtɔ afe mu no nyinaa te sɛ deɛ ɛte ara.`
F2: `Wonni "nsu" ne "ɔpɛ" mmere pɔtee bi: nsu a ɛtɔ afe mu no nyinaa te sɛ nea ɛte ara.`
---------------------- (763) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ mmoa a wɔwɔ turo no mu pii no tae hu nnipa no, mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu no deɛ wɔnte saa na ɛnsɛ sɛ woma wɔn aduane anaa sɛ wo haw wɔn.`
F2: `Ɛwom sɛ mmoa a wɔwɔ park so no taa hu nnipa de,nanso wuram mmoa yɛ ani so yɛ hye na ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔma wɔn aduane anaa wɔhaw wɔn.`
---------------------- (764) ----------------------
F1: `Turo no ahwɛfoɔ kyerɛ sɛ, gyina akwansin bɛyɛ 100 firi nsisire ne mpatakuo ho ne akwansin bɛyɛ 25 firi mmoa ahodoɔ a aka no ho.`
F2: `Sɛnea mpaninfo a wɔhwɛ beae a mmoa no wɔ no kyerɛ no, twe wo ho bɛyɛ mita/abasamfa 100 fi asisi ne mpataku ho na mita/abasamfa 25 fi wuram mmoa a aka no ho.`
---------------------- (765) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ ebia wɔbɛyɛ wɔn ho sɛ wɔbetie wo no, ɛkoɔ, aforɔ, torɔn, nsisire ne mmoa akɛseɛ a aka no betumi ato ahyɛ wo so.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ dea wɔbrɛ wɔn ho ase no, ɛkoɔ, ɔforote, torɔn, asisi ne mmoa a wɔso nyinaa tumi tow hyɛ nnipa so.`
---------------------- (766) ----------------------
F1: `Afe biara no, ahɔhoɔ edumienu mu pii pira esane sɛ wɔn angyina akyi enti. Mmoa wei yɛ akɛseɛ, wɔn aniso yɛ den, na wɔn ho yɛ hu, enti twe wo ho firi wɔn ho.`
F2: `Afe biara no, nnipa pii pira esaine sɛ wɔantwe wɔn ho yiye amfi wɔn ho nti.Saa mmoa yi soso, wɔn ani so yɛ hye, na wobetumi apira nkurɔfo, enti ma kwan nna mo ntam.`
---------------------- (767) ----------------------
F1: `Deɛ ɛka ho no, adeɛ hua twetwe nsisire ne mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu, enti mɛmfa nduane a ne hua ano yɛ den nkɔ hɔ na mɛnyɛ nsraban no mu fi.`
F2: `Nea ɛka ho no, hyɛ no nsow sɛ biribi hua tumi twetwe Osisi ne wuram mmoa a aka no, enti ɛnsɛ sɛ wofa anaa wonoa aduane a eyi hua na ma beae hɔ ntew.`
---------------------- (768) ----------------------
F1: `Apia yɛ Samoa ahenkuro. Kuro no wɔ Upolu nsuopɔ no so na emufoɔ dodoɔ yɛ 40,000 pɛ.`
F2: `Apia yɛ Samoa kuropɔn. Kuro no wɔ Upolu supɔw no so na aka kakraa na emu nnipa dodow no edu 40.000.`
---------------------- (769) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtee Apia wɔ 1850 mu na abɛyɛ Samoa ahenkuro efiri 1959.`
F2: `Wɔkyekyeree Apia wɔ 1850 mfe no mu na fi 1959 na ayɛ Samoa kuropɔn .`
---------------------- (770) ----------------------
F1: `Na ɛpo so hyɛn gyinabeaɛ no yɛ naval standoff beaeɛ a agyidin bɔne paa wɔ 1889 aberɛ a ɛpo so hyɛn asɔn a efiri Germany, US, ne Britain sii gyinaeɛ sɛ wɔremfi ɛpo so hyɛn gyinabeaɛ ho no.`
F2: `Saa po so hyɛn gyinabea yi na naval standoff sii wɔ 1889 bere a po so hyɛn nson a efi Germany, US, ne Britain ampene sɛ wobefi hyɛn gyinabea hɔ no.`
---------------------- (771) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛpo so hyɛn no nyinaa memeɛ, agye British ɛpo so hyɛn wɔde gye wɔn ani no mu biako. Amerecafoɔ ne Germanfoɔ bɛyɛ 200 na wɔ hweree wɔn nkwa.`
F2: `Ahyɛn no nyinaa memee, gye sɛ Britainfo hyɛn baako. Amerikafo ne Germanyfo nnipa dodow bɛyɛ 200 hweree wɔn nkwa.`
---------------------- (772) ----------------------
F1: `Berɛ a na wɔre pere agye wɔn ahofadie a Mau kuo a wɔn ate wɔn ho no yɛɛ ɛho nhyehyeɛ no, asomdwoe nhyiamu bi a wɔ yɛe no kɔ wie sɛ wɔ kum ɔhene Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.`
F2: `Bere a Mau kuw no yɛɛ nhyehyeɛ a na wɔde repre fawohodi no, asomdwoe nhyiam bi a wɔyɛɛ wɔ kuro no mu kowiei sɛ wɔkum wɔn Hene Tupua Tamasese Lealofi III.`
---------------------- (773) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnam sɛ Auckland wɔ suhyɛn gyinabea mmienu soɔ nti mpoano bebree wɔ hɔ. Nea agye din pa ara no wɔ mmeaeɛ mmiɛnsa.`
F2: `Apo ano bebree na ɛwɔ hɔ, esiane sɛ habɔ abien na ɛwɔ Auckaland. Deɛ agye din pa ara no wɔ mmeae abiɛsa.`
---------------------- (774) ----------------------
F1: `North Shore mpoano (a ɛwɔ North Harbour mansini mu) nyinaa wɔ Pacific Ocean so na ɛtrɛ firi Long Bay a ɛwɔ atifi de kɔsi Devonport a ɛwɔ anaafoɔ.`
F2: `Mpoano a ɛwɔ Atifi fam (ɛwɔ Habɔ a ɛwɔ Atifi mansini mu) ɛwɔ Pasefeke Sukɛseɛ na ɛfi Bay Tenten a ɛwɔ atifi no kɔsi Devonport a ɛwɔ anafo.`
---------------------- (775) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛreyɛ akɔyɛ sɛ wɔwɔ mpoano a anwea abu so a wotumi dware hɔ, na ɛfa dodoɔ no ara nso pohutukawa nnua ama nwunu aba hɔ.`
F2: `Ne nyinaa wɔ mpoano a banmmɔ wɔ asuguare mu na dodow no ara wowɔ nnwunu a ɛfi pohutukawa hɔ.`
---------------------- (776) ----------------------
F1: `Tamaki Drive mpoano nso wɔ Waitemata Harbour a ɛwɔ dwadibea fa baabi wɔ Mission Bay ne St Heliers a ɛwɔ Central Auckland.`
F2: `Tamaki mpoano wowɔ Waitemata habɔ, ɛwɔ Mission Bay mpatam ne St Heliers wɔ Auckland mfimfini.`
---------------------- (777) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔwɔ abusua mpoano a nnipadom abɔ kyenku a sotɔɔ ahodoɔ samsoɔ wɔ mpoano hɔ. Ɛhɔ yɛ ma asudwareɛ.`
F2: `Ɛyɛ mmeae a mmusua kyere so wɔ hɔ na hyɔɔpo ahorow pii na ɛwɔ mpoano hɔ. Asiane biara nni asuguare mu.`
---------------------- (778) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔman no aborɔfoɔ nsa titire no yɛ 'Number One', ɛnyɛ aborɔfoɔ nsa a ne nom yɛ den, mmom no ɛyɛ kama na ɛma wo ho dwodwo wo nso. Wɔferɛ ɔman no aborɔfoɔ nsa foforɔ no "Manta".`
F2: `Nsa a wɔyɛ wɔ hɔ a agye din ne “Number One”. Ɛnyɛ nsa bi a ɛyɛ nwonworann saa, nanso ɛyɛ dɛ na ɛma akomatɔyam.Nsa a ɛka ho a wɔyɛ wɔ hɔ ne “Manta”.`
---------------------- (779) ----------------------
F1: `Frenchfoɔ bobesa pii wɔ hɔ a wobetumi anom, nanso New Zealand ne Australia bobesa no betumi akɔ yie paa.`
F2: `Francefo nsa bebree wɔ hɔ a wo nsa betumi aka, nanso New Zealand ne Australiafo nsa no betumi adu akyi.`
---------------------- (780) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔman no nsuo ho te na wobetumi anom, nanso sɛ wo suro a wobetumi anya toa mu nsuo a womerɛ ho.`
F2: `Wobetumi anom wɔn pipe ano nsu a hwee renyɛ wo, nanso wobenya nsu a wɔde agu toa mu wɔ baabiara sɛ wosuro a.`
---------------------- (781) ----------------------
F1: `Australiafoɔ deɛ, wɔ susu sɛ 'flat white' kafe yɛ aburokyirefoɔ deɛ. Tuntum tiatia yɛ 'espresso', nufusuo ani sradeɛ (ɛnyɛ froth) gu cappuccino so tententen, na wɔde tea ma berɛ a nufusuo nni mu.`
F2: `Wɔ Australiafo mu no, “flat white” kɔfe kyerɛ nea cman foforo so.Short black gyina hɔ ‘espresso’, cappuccino de wɔde nufusu ani srade bebree gu so (ɛnyɛ ahuro), na tii nso wɔmfa nufusu nka ho.`
---------------------- (782) ----------------------
F1: `'Chocolate' hyehyeehye no du Belgiumfoɔ gyinapɛn. Nnuaba mu nsuo boɔ yɛ den nanso ɛkɔ yie paa.`
F2: `Chocolate a ɛyɛ hye no ne Belgiumfo ahwehwɛde hyia. Nnuaba mu nsu a wɔayɛ no bo yɛ den nanso ɛyɛ dɛ paa.`
---------------------- (783) ----------------------
F1: `Afe mu no nyinaa nnipa pii tu kwan kɔ hwɛ aboɔ a ɛterɛ nsuo no, na dɛm die biara ɛntaeɛ emfi saa aboɔ a ɛterɛ nsuo no ho mma.`
F2: `Nkurɔfo tu kwan kɔ beae a ɔbotan ayi ne ti wɔ nsu no ani mpɛn pii afe mu no nyinaa, na ɛyɛ den sɛ wobehu sɛ weinom apira obi.`
---------------------- (784) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛmfa ho no, gye afutuo firi mmpanyinfoɔ hɔ, wɛn w'aso ma agyiraeɛ, na yɛ aso ma ahobammɔ ho kɔkɔbɔ.`
F2: `Ne nyinaa mu no, gye afotu fi mpaninfo hɔ, di ahyɛnsode nyinaa so, na tie ahobammɔ ho kɔkɔbɔ a wɔde ma no.`
---------------------- (785) ----------------------
F1: `Box jellyfish ba mpoano ne beaɛ a asubɔntene ne ɛpo no hyia efi Ahinime kosi Oforisuo atifi wɔ 1770. Wobetumi atae ahu wɔn mmerɛ wei akyi.`
F2: `Wobehu jellyfish a ɔte sɛ Adaka wɔ beae a ɛbɛn mpoano ne asubɔntene ahorow fi Ahinime kosi Oforisuo 1770 atifi fam. Nanso, ɛtɔ da a, wobetumi ahu wɔn saa bere yi akyi.`
---------------------- (786) ----------------------
F1: `Aboodede yɛ adeɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ, nanso no wɔntae ɛnto nhyɛ nnipa so. Aboodede pii suro nnipa na wɔ dware kɔ.`
F2: `Oboodede wɔ hɔ ankasa, nanso wɔntaa ntow nhyɛ nnipa so. Oboodede dodow no ara suro nnipa na wodware fi hɔ kɔ.`
---------------------- (787) ----------------------
F1: `Nkyenensuo mu adeɛnkyɛm ɛntena ɛpo no mu, wɔn tenabeaɛ yɛ beaɛ a ɛpo ne asubɔntene no hyia no wɔ atififam fi Rockhampton.`
F2: `Nkyenensu mu adɛnkyɛm ntaa ntena po nsu no mu, wɔn fie ankasa yɛ asubɔntene ahorow a ɛwɔ atifi fam fi Rockhamton.`
---------------------- (788) ----------------------
F1: `Baabi a wɔda a wɔ dikan pɛ to hɔ no boa akwantufoɔ ma wɔn aso mu dwo wɔn sɛ wɔbenya baabi ada sɛ wɔdu beaɛ a wɔre kɔ no a.`
F2: `Di a wobedi kan akora beae no so ansa na woakɔ hɔ no ma ɔkwantufo no asom dwo no esaine sɛ onim sɛ obenya baabi pa ada bere a wɔadu baabi a ɔrekɔ no.`
---------------------- (789) ----------------------
F1: `Akwantuo ho adimafoɔ tae ne ahɔhoɔdan titire pii wɔ nhyehyɛeɛ, ɛmfa ho sɛ wobetumi ayɛ ahɔhoɔ gye beaɛ ahodoɔ ho nhyehyɛeɛ, tesɛ nsraban beaɛ, ɛnam akwantuo ho adimafoɔ so.`
F2: `Akwantu ananmusifo ahorow no taa ne ahɔhogyebea ahorow pɔtee bi yɛ nhyehyɛe, ɛmfa ho sɛ wonam akwantu nanmusifo bi so betumi akora beae afoforo a wobɛda so te sɛ beae wobetumi asoɛ wɔ abɔnten.`
---------------------- (790) ----------------------
F1: `Akwantuo ho adimafoɔ tae ma adeɛtɔ ho nhyehyɛeɛ a anɔpaduan ka ho, akwantuo ho nhyehyɛeɛ afi/ɛkɔ ewiemuhyɛn beaɛ hɔ anaa mpo wɔka ewiemu akwantuo ne ahɔhoɔ dan ho adeɛtɔ ho nhyehyɛeɛ no nyinaa bɔ mu.`
F2: `Akwantu ananmusifo no wɔ nhyehyɛe ahorow bi a anɔpa aduane, kaa a wode bedi akɔneaba wɔ wimhyɛn gyinabea hɔ ka ho anaa mpo wimhyɛn a wobɛfa ne ahɔhogyebea ho nhyehyɛe a ahorow nyinaa a w’aka abom ka ho.`
---------------------- (791) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ betumi nso atwentwɛn ahɔhoɔ dan ho nhyehyɛeɛ no so sɛ wohia bere de adwennwene nhyehyɛeɛ no ho anaa wɔbɛma wo nsa aka nkrataa a ɛfa baabi a wobɛda no ho (e.g. visa).`
F2: `Wɔbetumi akora beae no so ama wo sɛ wohia bere a wode bɛdwen nhyehyɛe a wɔde rema wo no ho anaasɛ wonsa bɛka beae a worekɔ no ho nkrataa ahorow bi a. (e.g. visa).`
---------------------- (792) ----------------------
F1: `Nsesaeɛ anaa deɛ wopɛ no ɛsɛ sɛ wodefa akwantuo ho adimafoɔ no so ansa na ɛnye ahɔhoɔ dan no so tee.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ wode nsakrae ahorow anaa adesrɛde biara fa wo akwantu nanmusifo no so kane na mmom ɛnsɛ sɛ wone ahɔhogyebea no kasa tee.`
---------------------- (793) ----------------------
F1: `Afahyɛ bi wɔ hɔ a, wɔn a wɔ bɛ hwɛ ndwomtoɔ afahyɛ no si gyiaeɛ sɛ wɔ bɛ da nsraban mu wɔ beaɛ hɔ, na nnipa dodoɔ pii ho no sɛ ɛho hia paa wɔ osuahu no mu.`
F2: `Wɔ afahyɛ bi mu no, wɔn a wɔba dwonto afahyɛ no ase no mu dodow no ara si gyinae sɛ wɔbɛsoeɛ wɔ beae hɔ ara, na wɔn a wɔaba hɔ no hu no sɛ ɛyɛ afahyɛ no fa titiriw.`
---------------------- (794) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wo bɛn dwumadie no a ɛsɛ sɛ wo ba ntɛm na wobɛpɛ beaɛ a ɛbɛn ndwomtofoɔ no.`
F2: `Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wohu nea ɛbɛkɔ so no yiye a, ɛsɛ sɛ wodu hɔ ntɛm na wonya beae a ɛbɛn nnwom no.`
---------------------- (795) ----------------------
F1: `Kae sɛ ɛmfa ho sɛ ebia wɔn agyae ndwom a wɔbɔ wɔ adehwɛpono no so no, afahyɛ no fa bi nso bɛ wɔ hɔ a wɔbɛ kɔ so abɔ ndwom kosi anadwo dasuo mu.`
F2: `Kae sɛ ɛmfa ho sɛ nnwom a wɔbɔ wɔ agua no so no aba awiei no, afahyɛ ne fa ahorow no bɛkɔ so abɔ nnwom kosi anadwo dasuom.`
---------------------- (796) ----------------------
F1: `Afahyɛ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔwɔ nsraban mmeaɛ soronko ma mmusuafoɔ a wɔwɔ mmofra.`
F2: `Afahyɛ ahorow bi ayɛ mmeae soronko ma mmusua a wɔwɔ mmofra.`
---------------------- (797) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ woretwa Northern Baltic no wɔ awɔberɛ mu a, hwɛ baabi a hyɛn mu dan no wɔ, efirisɛ nsuokyene so fa tae yɛ dede a ɛyɛ hu ma wɔn a dede haw wɔn no.`
F2: `Sɛ woretwa Northern Baltic no wɔ awɔw bere mu a, hwɛ baabi a ɛdan no si, efisɛ nsukyene no a wɔfa so no yɛ dede haw ebinom.`
---------------------- (798) ----------------------
F1: `Mmerɛ a wodi wɔ kuro mu no ka Saint Petersburg ɛpo so hyɛn mu anigyedeɛ no ho. Wɔngye akwantuo ho nkrataa mfi akwantufoɔ a wɔbɛgye wɔn ani hɔ (hwɛ ɛho nhyehyɛeɛ no mu).`
F2: `Saint Petersburg po so hyɛn no ma nkurɔfo tumi di mmere wɔ kuro no mu.Wɔnhwehwɛ visa ahwehwɛde ahorow biara mfi wɔn a wɔfa po so hyɛn no hɔ (hwɛ ɛho nhyehyɛe ahorow).`
---------------------- (799) ----------------------
F1: `Casinos bɔ mmɔden paa sɛ wɔbɛma ahɔhoɔ adi berɛ pii wɔ hɔ na wɔn atwe wɔn ho sika beberee. Mpoma na ɛdɔn ntae nni hɔ na ɛyɛ den sɛ wobehu akyirisie apono no.`
F2: `Casino mmeae ahorow no bɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbɛma mmere ne sika a wɔn a wɔba hɔ no di no ayɛ kɛse. Mpɛn pii no, worenhu mpoma ne ɛdɔn wɔ hɔ na ɛyɛ den sɛ wobehu baabi a wobɛfa apue nso.`
---------------------- (800) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔtae wɔ nnuane a ɛyɛ soronko, nsa ne anigyedeɛ ahodoɔ, a ɛbɛ ma ahɔhoɔ akɔ so anya anigyeɛ, na wɔn akɔ so atena hɔ akyɛ.`
F2: `Wɔtaa ma wɔn a w’aba hɔ no aduane, anonne ne anigyede soronko, senea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn ani bɛgye na wɔaka beae hɔ.`
---------------------- (801) ----------------------
F1: `Mmeaeɛ bi nso ma nsa a ano yɛ den wɔ hɔ. Nanso, asabo mma wommu atɛn yie, ɛno nti kyakyatofoɔ nim hia a ɛho hia sɛ wɔrenom nsa ɛmmo.`
F2: `Mmeae binom kyɛ wɔn a wɔaba hɔ no nsa. Nanso, asabo ma worentumi nsi gyinae pa, ɛno nti wɔn a wɔto kyakya no nyinaa nim hia ehia sɛ wɔrenbo pii.`
---------------------- (802) ----------------------
F1: `Obiara a ɔbɛka hyɛn wɔ asase nhwɛso korokorowa a ɛnam ne terɛ mu a ɛkorɔn anaa mmepɔ so no nhu sɛ nsukyerɛma, nsukyene, anaa nkyenkyen ndwodwoe betumi a wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ obiara a ɔbɛka kaa wɔ beae a ɛhɔ wɔ soro anaa ɔbɛfa mmepɔw kwan ahorow so no hwɛ hu sɛ obetumi ahyia sukyerɛma, nsukyene anaa awɔw a ano yɛ den.`
---------------------- (803) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ nsukyene ne nsukyerɛma ɔkwantempɔn so no, ntwiɛ wɔ fam na worentumi nka hyɛn te sɛ deɛ wowɔ amoba so.`
F2: `Wɔ nsukyene ne sukyerɛma kwan ahorow so no, ɛso tumi yɛ torotoro na worentumi nka kaa te sɛ nea wonam asphalt kwan so.`
---------------------- (804) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ nsukyerɛma ahum bere mu no, nsukyerɛma dodoɔ a ebetumi ama wo aka no tumi tɔ wɔ mmerɛ tiawa bi mu.`
F2: `Bere a sukyerɛma tɔ dennennen na mframa a ano yɛ den bɔ no, sukyerɛma kakraa bi betumi ama waka bere tiawa bi mu.`
---------------------- (805) ----------------------
F1: `Ebetumi ayɛ den ama wo sɛ wobɛhu kwan so esane nsukyerɛma a ɛtɔ anaa ne nane anaa nsukyene a ɛwɔ hyɛn mfɛnsere so no.`
F2: `Ebetumi aba sɛ worenhu ade yiye esaine sukyerɛma a ɛretɔ anaa mframa rebɔ no anaa nsu aboaboa ano anaa nsukyene no akata kaa no ahwehwɛ no so.`
---------------------- (806) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ ɔkwan foforɔ so no, nsukyene ne nsukyerɛma tebea yɛ ne kwan so wɔ aman beberee mu, na ahyɛn nso di akɔ ne aba yie afe mu no nyinaa.`
F2: `Wɔ ɔkwan foforo so no, nsukyene ne sukyerɛma taa tɔ wɔ aman pii so, na kaa di akɔneaba bere dodow no ara a hwee ntwintwan akwan mu afe mu no nyinaa.`
---------------------- (807) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa a wɔn ho yɛhu atenaeɛ a wobɛkɔ akɔ hwɛ yɛ nsrahwɛ kɛseɛ wɔ Abibiman mu na ahɔhoɔ bebree anigye ho.`
F2: `Safari betumi ayɛ nea ɛtwe nsrahwɛ ba Afrika paa na ɛno nti na nsrahwɛfo pii ba hɔ.`
---------------------- (808) ----------------------
F1: `Asɛmfoa safari no mpɛn pii no ɛkyerɛ asase so akwantuo a yɛde hwɛ Abibifoɔ mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu, ne titire no wɔ asase a nwura ne nnua a atete no ho wɔ so.`
F2: `Asɛmfua Safari a wɔtaa de di dwuma yiye no kyerɛ kwan a wotu bere a wɔfa asase no so na wɔhwɛ wuram mmoa wɔ Afrika a ɛyɛ nwonwa, ne titiriw no wɔ savanna.`
---------------------- (809) ----------------------
F1: `Mmoa bi, te sɛ asono ne akɔntenten, twe bɛn hyɛn na abɛɛfo adwinnadeɛ bɛma wo ahu wɔn yie.`
F2: `Mmoa ahorow bi te sɛ asono ne kɔntenten, taa bɛn kaa pɛɛ na mfidie a ɛyɛ, bɛboa ma woahu wɔn yiye.`
---------------------- (810) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛtɔ dabi a agyata, ahayɔ akra ne asebɔ fɛre na wobehu wɔn yie a gye sɛ wode binoculars afidie yɛ adwuma.`
F2: `Ɛtɔ mmere bi a, agyata, cheetah ne etwie ahorow no fɛre ade, enti wobehu wɔn yiye bere a wode afidie a wɔde hwɛ ade ma ɛyɛ kɛse rehwɛ wɔn no.`
---------------------- (811) ----------------------
F1: `Nnanteɛ nsrahwɛ a wɔyɛ de kɔ mmeae a mmoa a wɔ (wɔsan nso ferɛ no "bush walk", "hiking safari", anaasɛ ɛbɛkɔ "footing") no nnanteɛ ka ho, sɛ ɛyɛ mmerɛ kakra bi anaasɛ nna kakra no.`
F2: `Safari a wɔnantew (wɔsan frɛ no “wuram nantew”, “ safari a wɔnantew kɔ akyi” anaa worekɔ “nantew”) ne sɛ worenantew akɔ akyi, sɛ ɛyɛ nnɔnhwerew kakraa bi anaa nna pii no.`
---------------------- (812) ----------------------
F1: `Agokansie a wɔyɛ ma wɔn a sɛbe wɔn adi dɛm no bɛhyɛ aseɛ firi Ɔsanaa da a ɛtɔ so 24 kɔsi Ɛbɔ da a ɛtɔ so 5 wɔ afe 2021. Dwumadie no bi bɛkɔ so wɔ Japan nyinaa.`
F2: `Paralympics no befi ase efi Ɔsanaa da ɛtɔ so 24 kosi Ɛbɔ da a ɛtɔ so 5 ,2021. Wɔbɛyɛ dwumadi no bi wɔ mmeae ahorow wɔ Japan.`
---------------------- (813) ----------------------
F1: `Tokyo bɛyɛ Asia kuropɔn a ahohuruberɛ Olympics no bɛkɔ so mpɛn mmienu, asane agurɔdie a ɛkɔɔso wɔ 1964 mu wɔ hɔ no.`
F2: `Tokyo bɛyɛ Asia kuro baako pɛ a wɔayɛ ɔhyew bere mu Olympics mmienu, bere a ɔyɛɛ agodi yi wɔ 1964 mu no.`
---------------------- (814) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wo koraa wo ewiemuhyɛn akwantuo ne daberɛ maa 2020 ansana wɔre bɔ mmɔtohɔ no ho dawuro a, wobɛtumi ahyia akontonkyisɛm tebea.`
F2: `Sɛ wokoraa wimhyɛn beae so ne baabi a wobɛda ma 2020 ansa na wɔkaa sɛ w’atu ahyɛ da no a, ɛnde wo tebea no bɛyɛ biribi a ɛwɔ hɔ.`
---------------------- (815) ----------------------
F1: `Nsonsonoeɛ wɔ amansɛm ntwamu mu, nanso firi Ɔbenem awieeɛ no amansɛm a coronavirus enti wɔn atwam no anka Kutawonsa afe 2020, berɛ a wɔde Olympics no ahyɛ no.`
F2: `Mmara a ɛwɔ twa a wotwa biribi mu no nyɛ pɛ, nanso wɔ Ɔbɛnem awiei no na ntwamu mmara a egyina coronavirus no ntrɛw nkosii Kitawonsa 2020, bere a na wɔahyehyɛ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ Olympics no.`
---------------------- (816) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ hwɛ kwan sɛ dwumadie dodoɔ no akwanya nhoma boɔ bɛyɛ ¥2,500 ne ¥130,000, ɛne akwanya nhoma pɔtee a ne boɔ bɛyɛ ¥7,000.`
F2: `Wɔhwɛ kwan sɛ dwumadi no mu dodow no ara tekiti bo bɛyɛ ¥2,500 ne ¥130,000, nanso mpɛn pii no tekiti wobenya no bɛyɛ ¥7,000.`
---------------------- (817) ----------------------
F1: `Ntadeɛ a afɔw so to betumi aboa ma awo. Ahɔhoɔdan bebree wɔ afidie a wɔde to adeɛ a wɔde to ma ahai, ɛmpo sɛ obiara ɛnni ɔdan no mu a.`
F2: `Sɛ wo to ntade a emu afɔ kakraa a, ema ɛwo ntɛm.Ahɔhogyebea ahorow wɔ ayɔn ne ade a wɔto nneɛma wɔ so a wobetumi de afiri wo, mpo sɛ bi nni dan no mu a.`
---------------------- (818) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ afidie a wɔde to ade nni hɔ, anaa sɛ w'ani ɛgye ho sɛ wobɛhyɛ nan nnuraho a wɔn ato so a, ɛnde wobɛtumi afidie a wɔde wo ti nwini adi dwuma, sɛ ebi wɔhɔ a.`
F2: `Sɛ ayɔn nni hɔ, anaasɛ w’ani nnye ho sɛ wobɛhyɛ nea yɛde hyɛ yɛn nan a woato a, ɛnde wobetumi de afidie a ɛma yɛn ti nhwi wo no adi dwuma, sɛ ebi wɔ hɔ a.`
---------------------- (819) ----------------------
F1: `Yɛ ahwɛyie na w'amma ntama anyɛ hye dodo (a ebetumi ama adeɛ afɔn, anaasɛ wɔ tebea a ɛsen saa no, ɛbɛ hye).`
F2: `Yɛ ahwɛyie na woamma atade no anyɛ hye dodow (ebetumi ama atade no etwintwam, anaa nea ɛnyɛ koraa no, ahye).`
---------------------- (820) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkwan ahodoɔ pii wɔhɔ a yɛde te nsuo ho, ebinom bɔ ho ban firi ade titire bi a ɛyɛ hu ho.`
F2: `Ɔkwan ahorow pii wɔ hɔ a wɔfa so tew nsu ani, ebi tumi boa si ɔhaw ahorow pɔtee bi kwan.`
---------------------- (821) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ mmeae bi no nsuo a wɔ noa no sima baako no yɛ, wɔ mmeae bi nso no sima a ɛboro baako na ahia.`
F2: `Wɔ mmeae ahorow bi no, wobetumi anoa nsu no sima baako pɛ, na wɔ mmeae afoforo no, ɛho hia sɛ wonoa no sima bebree ansa.`
---------------------- (822) ----------------------
F1: `Nsɔneɛ gu ahodoɔ wɔ ne dwumadie mu, na sɛ wowɔ ho asɛm bi a, ɛndeɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wo susu toa mu nsuo a ɛwɔ nsɔano a adwumayɛbeaeɛ a agye din pa ayɛ no ho.`
F2: `Ɛnyɛ bere biara na ade a wɔayɛ a wɔde sɔne nsu so no yɛ adwuma yiye, enti sɛ wowɔ ho asɛm bi a, ende susuw ho sɛ wobɛtɔ nsu a wɔde agu toa mu na wɔasi ano fi adwumakuw a wɔagye din pa hɔ.`
---------------------- (823) ----------------------
F1: `Akwantufoɔ betumi ahyia moawammoawa a wɔn nhuu bi da wɔ wɔn nkuro a wɔfi so no.`
F2: `Akwantufo betumi ahyia mmoa a wɔsɛe ade a wonhuu bi da wɔ mpɔtam a wofi.`
---------------------- (824) ----------------------
F1: `Moawammoawa betumi asɛe aduane, anaa wɔ tebeaɛ a ɛnyɛ koraa mu no ama wɔn nkwan mmoa ako atea aduane bi, ebetumi hwɛte bɔre, anaasɛ asane nsanyareɛ.`
F2: `Mmoa no betumi asɛe aduane, ama wo ho akeka wo, anaa nea ɛsen nyinaa no ebetumi abɔ wo yare, ɛma ɛbrɔ trɛ, anaasɛ ɛma yare sane.`
---------------------- (825) ----------------------
F1: `Nyarewa a ɛsane ankasa, anaa mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu a wobetumi apira anaasɛ akum nkurɔfoɔ wɔ ahoɔden so no, ɛntaa ntwa sɛ wɔ bɛba abɛyɛ moawammoawa.`
F2: `Worentumi mfa nsaneyare ahorow, anaasɛ mmoa a wɔn ho yɛ hu a wotumi pira anaa wokum nnipa ɔhyɛ so no nka mmoa a wɔsɛe ade no ho.`
---------------------- (826) ----------------------
F1: `Aguadie a ɛtoɔ biara nni so yɛ akwanya a wode bɛtɔ neama a ɛtoɔ biara nna so no ne ɛtoɔ a wɔde to mmeaeɛ atitire bi so no.`
F2: `Duty free shopping yɛ hokwan a wode bɛtɔ nneɛma a ɛtoɔ nna so wɔ mmeae ahorow bi.`
---------------------- (827) ----------------------
F1: `Akwantufoɔ huri a wɔ huri si aman a wɔn toɔ tua wɔ soro mu no tumi kora sika dodoɔ a ɛtɔ asom so, ne titire no wɔ nneɛma bi te sɛ nsa a ano yɛ den ne tawa so.`
F2: `Akwantufo a wɔrekɔ aman ahorow a wɔgye tow akɛse so no betumi akora wɔn sika dodow bi so, ne titiriw wɔ nneɛma bi te sɛ anonne a nsa wom ne tawa.`
---------------------- (828) ----------------------
F1: `Ntwemu a ɛwɔ Marion ne Fairmont mfinfini no ma hyɛnka ho tebea yɛ den adi wɔ Buffalo-Pirtsburgh Kwantenpɔn no so, a ɛtae fa asase ntwemu a ɛso afuw a ate ne ho no mu.`
F2: `Ɛkwan a ɛda Point Marion ne Fairmont ntam no ma kaa ka yɛ den paa wɔ Buffalo-Pittsburgh Ɔkwantenpɔn no so, ɛtaa fa nwura a ate ne ho no mu.`
---------------------- (829) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wo ho nkokaa yɛ wɔ hyɛn a wɔka wɔ nkura ase akwanso a, kora wo nsɛnkwa a ɛfa wo ho no so: kuronkuron nsusui, ɔkwan teatea, ne kɔntɔn na ɛdɔɔ so wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Sɛ wontaa nka kaa wɔ kwan a wɔnyɛɛ so yiye so a, yɛ krado sɛ wobehyia :mmeae a esiane, akwan a esua ne beae a akoakoa a wobu no ntɛm pii.`
---------------------- (830) ----------------------
F1: `Akwantuo ahoɔhare ɔhyeɛ da adi sɛ ɛba fam sen kane no ne ɔfa a edidisoɔ no — sɛdeɛ obiara nim no sɛ ɛyɛ 35-40 mph (56-64km/h) — na osetie katee a wobɛyɛ ama wɔn ho hia koraa sen nea ɛnte saa.`
F2: `Mmirika ho anohyeto a wɔde abɔ hɔ no wɔ fam sen afa ahorow a ɛwɔ w’akyi ne nea edi w’anim no ̶ ɛtaa yɛ 35-40 mph (56 ̶ 64 km/h) ̶ na ehia paa sɛ wodi so pɛpɛɛpɛ sen sɛ wobebu so.`
---------------------- (831) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛyɛ mu mfeefeemu a, ɛmfa ho sɛ, ahomatorofoɔ dwumadie yɛ pintinn wɔ ha sen akwan foforɔ a aka no so, e.g. Pensylvania Wilds.`
F2: `Nea ɛyɛ nwonwa mmom ne sɛ, ahomatrofo no ahoɔden no ano yɛ den wɔ ha sen ɔkwan ne fa ahorow pii, e.g. wɔ Pennsylania Wild no mu.`
---------------------- (832) ----------------------
F1: `German nneԑma a wɔde esam ayԑ yԑ dԑ, Bavaria no, nneԑma wom ԑnna ԑsesa nso te sԑ wɔn mfԑfoɔ a wɔwɔ anaafoɔ no, Austria.`
F2: `German keeki ahorow no yɛ dɛ paa, na wɔ bavaria no, nneɛma wom na ɛwɔ mu ahorow pii, te sɛ nea ɛwɔ ɔman a ɛwɔ wɔn anaafo fam, Austria.`
---------------------- (833) ----------------------
F1: `‘Pastries’ a wɔde aduaba ayԑ no wɔ hɔ, a wɔanoa ‘aprԑ’ afe mu no nyinaa na ‘cherries’ ԑne ‘plums’ nso aba ɔpԑ berԑ no mu.`
F2: `Keeki ahorow a wɔde nnuaba ayɛ nyɛ nna, wɔnoa aprɛ de yɛ keeki ahorow afe mu no nyinaa, ne cherries ne plums a ɛba ɔhyew bere mu no.`
---------------------- (834) ----------------------
F1: `German nneԑma a wɔato sane wɔ ‘almonds’, ‘hazelnuts’, ԑnne nnua afoforɔ a ԑwɔ ‘nuts’. Wɔtaa ‘kɔfe’ a ano yԑ den na di ‘cake’ ahodoɔ a agye din no bi.`
F2: `Germanfo nnuane a wɔato no mu bebree wɔ almond, hazelnut ne nkate ahorow. Keeki a agye din taa ne kɔfe kuruwa baako a ano yɛ den kɔ paa.`
---------------------- (835) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wopԑ ‘pastries’ kakra bi nanso ԑyԑ dԑ a, sɔ deԑ ԑbinom frԑ no Berliner, Pfannkuchen anaa Krapfen wɔ wɔn mpɔtam no.`
F2: `Sɛ wopɛ keeki ahorow a esua nanso nneɛma wom a, sɔ nea wɔfrɛ no Berliner, Pfannkuɔhen anaa Krapfen a egyina mpɔtam biara so.`
---------------------- (836) ----------------------
F1: `‘Curry’ yԑ aduane a wɔde nhabamma ne aduhwam, na ԑnam anaa atosodeԑ ka ho.`
F2: `Curry yɛ aduane a wɔde nhabamma ne aduhuam ayɛ, a mogyanam anaa atosode ka ho.`
---------------------- (837) ----------------------
F1: `‘Curry’ bԑtumi ayԑ deԑ "awo" anaa deԑ "afɔ" a ԑgyina nsuo dodoɔ a akɔ mu.`
F2: `Curry betumi ayɛ nea “emu awo” anaa “nsu wom”, na ɛno gyina nsu dodow a wode begu mu no so.`
---------------------- (838) ----------------------
F1: `India Atifi ԑne Pakistan mpɔtam a nsuo atwa ho ahyia no, wɔde ‘yogurt’ yԑ ‘curries’; India Anaafoɔ fam ԑne mmeaeԑ bi a ԑwɔ po no ano no, wɔde kube na ԑyԑ.`
F2: `Wɔ Northern India ne Pakistan mpɔtam ahorow a ɛwɔ aman no mfinfini no mu no, wɔde yogurt yɛ curry; wɔ Southern India ne mpoano amantam ahorow a ɛka asasetam ketawa no ho no, wɔde kube nsu na ɛtaa yɛ.`
---------------------- (839) ----------------------
F1: `17,000 nsase a nsuo atwa ho ahyia no a wobԑyi bi afirim no, Indonesian aduane yԑ asԑmfua a wɔde gyina hɔ ma nnuane bebree a ahyeta wɔ ɔman no mu no.`
F2: `Wɔ supɔw 17,000 a wobetumi apaw mu bi no, Indonesiafo aduane yɛ din a wɔde gyina hɔ amantam ahorow no nnuane ahorow a wobenya wɔ ɔman no mu.`
---------------------- (840) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, sԑ wode di dwuma wɔ berԑ a womfa nkyerԑkyerԑmu mmata ho a, asԑmfua no yԑ aduane a ԑfiri Java mfimfini ԑne apueeԑ fam.`
F2: `Nanso, sɛ wɔde di dwuma a woamfa biribi foforo ankyerɛkyerɛ mu a, asɛmfua no taa gyina hɔ ma aduane a efi mfinfini ne apuei afa a ɛwɔ supɔw Java mu no,`
---------------------- (841) ----------------------
F1: `Seesei deԑ ԑwɔ hɔ pa ara wɔ archipelago no ne ‘Javanese cuisine’ a deԑ ԑwom ne nnuane a wɔakye ho a deԑ ԑdi mu ntintiman ne Javanese ‘favor’ a ԑyԑ ‘peanuts’, ‘chillies’, asikyire (ne titire ne Javanese kube asikyire) ԑne nneԑma a ԑyԑ hwam bebree.`
F2: `Javafo aduane yɛ nnuane ahorow a wɔde nneɛma agu mu ma ɛyɛ dɛ, na nea Javafo no taa de gu mu ma ɛyɛ dɛ no ne nkate, mɛko, asikyire (ne titiriw no asikyire a Javafo no nya fi kube mu) ne nneɛma ahorow a wɔde gu mu ma etu hua. Seesei a wobenya wɔ supɔw kuw no nyinaa so.`
---------------------- (842) ----------------------
F1: `‘Stirrups’ yԑ adeԑ a wɔde boa deԑ ɔte deԑ ԑbutu aboa no akyi no so no nan a ԑsensԑne hɔ no.`
F2: `Ntiamu yɛ ade a ɛboa nea ɔreka ɔpɔnkɔ no nan a ɛkonkon hɔ wɔ ɔpɔnkɔ atɛ no nkyɛnkyɛn no.`
---------------------- (843) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛboa deԑ ɔte aboa no akyi no ma ɔnhinhim nanso ԑbԑtumi aha adwene kakra ԑfiri sԑ ne nan bԑtumi aka mu.`
F2: `Ɛboa ma nea ɔka ɔpɔnkɔ no tena so pintinn nanso ebetumi de n’akwahosan ato asiane mu efisɛ ne nan betumi aka mu.`
---------------------- (844) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ ԑhuri deԑ ɔte pɔnkɔ akyi no firi pɔnkɔ no so na ne nan aka ‘stirrup’ no mu a, pɔnkɔ no bԑtumi atwe no ase sԑ ɔtoa so dwane a. Sԑ wobԑte saa haw yi so, wobԑtumi afa akwan bebree so.`
F2: `Sɛ wɔtow nea ɔreka ɔpɔnkɔ no fi ɔpɔnkɔ no so na ne nan ka ade a ne nan hyɛ mu no mu a, obetumi atwe wɔn wɔ fam sɛ ɔpɔnkɔ no dwane a. Nea ɛbɛboa ma saa ɔhaw yi aba fam no, wɔde nhyehyɛe ahorow bi ato akwan mu.`
---------------------- (845) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑdi kan, nnipa a wɔtwi pɔnkɔ no bebree hyԑ mpaboa a wɔde twi a ԑtoɔ apagya na ԑho yԑ toro, aseԑ no yԑ teaa kakra.`
F2: `Nea edi kan no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔka apɔnkɔ no hyɛ mpaboa a wɔde ka apɔnkɔ a ɛpɔ wɔ ase na n’ase no yɛ toro, na ɛyɛ teaa no.`
---------------------- (846) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑdi hɔ, adeԑ a ԑbutu aboa akyi no bi wɔ hɔ a, ne titire ne ‘English saddles’ wɔ biribi a ԑma ‘stirrup leather’ no yi gu fam wɔ berԑ a deԑ ɔretwi no rete ahwe no mu.`
F2: `Nea edi hɔ no, Englandfo apɔnkɔ atɛ titiriw, no wɔ nnade bi a ɛbɔ ban a ɛma nhoma a ɛwɔ nea wɔde wɔn nan hyɛ mu eyi fi atɛ no mu sɛ nea ɔreka ɔpɔnkɔ no twe kɔ n’akyi a.`
---------------------- (847) ----------------------
F1: `‘Cochamó Valley’ - Chile man mu baabi a wɔforo, a wɔfrԑ no ‘Yosemite of South America’ no, a ԑwɔ aboɔ fasuo akԑseԑ ԑne aboɔ a wɔaboa ano.`
F2: `Cochamó Ɛbɔn - Chile beae wɔforo abotan a edi kan, a wɔfrɛ no Yosemite of South Amerika, a ɛwɔ abo afasu ne ɔbotan a ni yɛ twitwiritwitwiri ahorow.`
---------------------- (848) ----------------------
F1: `‘Summits’ yԑ nneԑma fԑԑfԑ a wohu firi mmepɔ apampam. Wɔn a wɔforo wɔ wiase nyinaa gu so rehunu baabi foforɔ a wɔbԑfa wɔ ne fasuo no ho.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔforo abotan a wofi wiase afanan nyinaa no gu so renya akwan foforo ahorow wɔ afasu bebree a wobetumi aforo no ho,`
---------------------- (849) ----------------------
F1: `Mmepɔ ase kɔ a sukyerԑmma akansie a ‘skiing’ ԑne ‘snowboarding’ yԑ akansie a agye din a ԑne sԑ wobԑsane afa kwan a sukyerԑmma no akata so wɔ berԑ ‘skis anaa snowboard’ wɔ wo nan ase.`
F2: `Sukyerɛma so agorɔ a wodi no nsanee mu, yɛ agodi a agye din wɔde ski anaa duasini a wɔde fa sukyerɛma so hyɛ wɔn nan ase sane fa baabi a sukyerɛma akata so no.`
---------------------- (850) ----------------------
F1: `‘Skiing’ yԑ dwumadie baako a wɔde tu kwan, nti nnipa a wɔn ani gye ho a wɔfrԑ wɔn "ski bums," yԑ nhyehyԑeԑ de yԑ ‘skiing’ wɔ baabi.`
F2: `Ski a wɔde hyɛ nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so no yɛ dwumadi a nnipa bebree ani gye ho nawotu kwan kodi, etɔ da wɔfrɛ no “ski bums”, wɔn akwantu no nyinaa gyina baabi pɔtee a wɔbedi saa agodi no.`
---------------------- (851) ----------------------
F1: `Adwene a wɔde yԑ ‘skiing’ no akyԑre pa ara — abodan mu mfonin a ԑkyerԑ ‘skiers’ no firi 5000 BC!`
F2: `Ski a wɔde hyɛ wɔn nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so no yɛ biribi a akyɛ yiye paa ̶ abotan mu nkyerɛwee da no adi sɛ efii ase wɔ 5000 BC!`
---------------------- (852) ----------------------
F1: `‘Skiing’ a wɔtwi kɔ mmepɔ fam yԑ agodie a ԑhyԑԑ aseԑ bԑyԑ ‘17th century’, ԑnna afe 1861 mu no Norwegians buee ‘ski club’ a ԑdi kan wɔ Australia.`
F2: `Ski a wɔde hyɛ wɔn nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma so fii ase sɛ agodi anyɛ hwee koraa no wɔ afeha a ɛtɔ so 17 no mu, na wɔ 1861 mu no Norwayfo buee ski agodi beae a edi kan wɔ Australia.`
---------------------- (853) ----------------------
F1: `‘Backpacking’ a ski yԑ: Saa dwuma yi din sane de ‘backcountry ski’, ‘ski touring’ anaa ‘ski hiking’.`
F2: `Baage a wɔde bɔ akyi de ski sane fa sukyerɛma so: Wɔsan frɛ saa agodi yi ski a wɔyɛ wɔ nkuraase, ski nsrahwɛ anaa ski a wɔde nantew kɔ akyi.`
---------------------- (854) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛte sԑ nanso ԑyԑ a ‘alpine style’ nka ho ‘ski touring’ anaa mmepɔforo’ deԑ ԑtwa toɔ no kɔ so wɔ ‘terrain’ a ԑmu dɔ so na ԑhia ‘skis’ a ԑmu yԑ den ԑne mpaboa.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ no nanso ɛnte sɛ ski a wɔde hyɛ nan ase sane fa sukyerɛma anaa bepɔw so no, Nea edi akyire yi hia baabi a esiane na ɛsɛ sɛ ski ne mpaboa no kyekyere wo nan.`
---------------------- (855) ----------------------
F1: `Dwene ‘skiing’ kwan no sԑ ԑte sԑ ‘hiking’ kwan no.`
F2: `Fa no sɛ ɔkwan a wɔde ski sane fa sukyerɛma so no ne ɔkwan a wɔn a wɔnantew kɔ kwan tenten fa so no yɛ pɛ.`
---------------------- (856) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ nneԑma yԑ a, wobԑtumi atwa kwan tenten a ԑboro nanteԑ deԑ so – nanso ԑberԑ kakra bi na wobԑtumi anya ‘cross country skiing’ mmirika no bi wɔ berԑ a deԑ wɔde bɔ wɔn akyi no mu nyԑ duru wɔ kwan a wɔayԑ so.`
F2: `Sɛ tebea no yɛ a, wobetumi atwa kwan kɛse sen sɛ wobɛnantew ̶ nanso ɛntaa nsi sɛ wobɛkɔ ntɛm te sɛ nea wɔyɛ wɔ kurom, mmeae a esane bere a baage mbɔ w’akyi no.`
---------------------- (857) ----------------------
F1: `Europe yԑ beaeԑ a ԑsua nanso ԑwɔ aman a wɔade wɔn ho bebree. Sԑ worefa kwan pa no so a, anka woretu kwan akɔ aman bebree mu a anka wohia sԑ wogye visa na wokɔ ‘passport control’ mprԑ bebree.`
F2: `Europa yɛ asasetam a esua de nanso ɛwɔ aman bebree a ade wɔn ho.Sɛnea wɔyɛ no no, woretu kwan akɔ aman pii so no bɛkyerɛ sɛ wobɛfa visa abisade ahorow mu ne baabi a wɔhwɛ paspɔt nsɛmsɛm mu no.`
---------------------- (858) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso ‘Schengen zone’ no yԑ adwuma te sԑ ɔman baako wɔ saa kwan yi so.`
F2: `Nnanso, wɔ saa kwan yi so no,Schengen mpɔtam no yɛ adwuma te sɛ ɔman baako.`
---------------------- (859) ----------------------
F1: `Mmerԑ dodoɔ a wobԑwɔ saa beaeԑ yi mu no, wobԑtumi afri ɔman wei mu akɔ ɔman foforɔ mu wɔ berԑ a wonhia sԑ wokɔ paspɔt hwԑbea biom.`
F2: `Bere dodow a wote mpɔtam hɔ no, wobetumi atwa ɛhye no a womfa beae a wɔyɛ paspɔt nhwehwɛmu ahorow no bio.`
---------------------- (860) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ara nso na sԑ wowɔ ‘Schengen visa’ a, ԑho nhia sԑ wobԑpԑ visa a wode bԑkɔ aman a ‘Schengen’ aman no ho no mu, ԑno nti ԑma wonya mmerԑ, sie sika ԑne nkratasԑm.`
F2: `Saa pɛpɛɛpɛ nso na, sɛ wowɔ Schengen visa no a, ɛho renhia sɛ woyɛ visa ho nhyehyeɛ ahorow ma kurow biara a ɛwɔ Schengen mpɔtam no mu no, na ɛno boa ma wonya bere, sie sika, ne nkrataasɛm nso.`
---------------------- (861) ----------------------
F1: `Nkyerԑaseԑ biara nni hɔ a wɔagye atom ma nneԑma a wɔayԑ a ԑyԑ ‘antiques’. Nnwumakuo a wɔgye toɔ bi kyerԑ sԑ nneԑma a adi aboro mfeԑ 100 yԑ ‘antiques’.`
F2: `Nkyerɛase pɔtee biara nni hɔ ma nea enti a yɛbɛka sɛ biribi akyɛ yiye.Ɛtoɔ asoeɛ binom kyerɛ sɛ nneɛma a adi bɛboro mfe 100 sɛ biribi a akyɛ yiye.`
---------------------- (862) ----------------------
F1: `Nkyerԑaseԑ no gyina baabi korɔ so, mfeԑ no bԑtumi ayԑ ketewa wɔ mmeaeԑ bi te sԑ North America asene Europe.`
F2: `Nkyerɛase yi gyina beae biara so, a mfe a wɔde ato so no betumi aba fam wɔ mmeae bi te sɛ North Amerika sen Europa no.`
---------------------- (863) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔbԑtumi afrԑ nneԑma a wɔde wɔn nsa ayԑ ‘antiques’, ԑwom sԑ ne mfeԑ no wɔ fam sene nneԑma a ԑte saa a wɔyԑԑ no bebree.`
F2: `Wɔkyerɛ sɛ nneɛma a wɔde nsa na ayɛ betumi ayɛ nneɛma a akyɛ yiye, ɛmfa ho sɛ ne mfe nkɔɔ anim te sɛ nea wɔayɛ no pii retɔn no.`
---------------------- (864) ----------------------
F1: `‘Reindeer husbandry’ yԑ adeԑ a ԑho hia ma Sámi no nsa kɔ wɔn ano ԑnna amammerԑ a atwa dwadie no ho ahyia no nso ho hia ma nnipa a wɔyԑ biribi foforɔ.`
F2: `Reindeer yɛn yɛ adwuma a ɛma wonsa kɔ w’ano a ɛho hia paa wɔ Sámifo no mu na amammerɛ a ɛwɔ adwuma no ho no nso hia paa ma wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma foforo nso.`
---------------------- (865) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ ahyԑaseԑ no na ԑnyԑ Sámi no nyinaa na wɔyԑ ‘reindeer husbandry’ no kԑseԑ mu deԑ, nanso na wɔkye nsuomnam, ahayɔ ԑne deԑ ԑte saa, a na ‘reindeer’ no yԑ mmoa a wɔde wɔn yԑ adwuma.`
F2: `Sɛ yɛbɛka a, ɛnyɛ Sámifo no nyinaa na wɔde wɔn ho ahyɛ Reindeer yɛn mu, mmom no na woyi nam, kɔ ahayɔ ne nea ɛtete saa, na wɔde reindeer no twe nneɛma ma wɔn.`
---------------------- (866) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnnԑ yi Sámi bebree yԑ nnԑ dwadie yi bi. Akwasra ma Sápmi, beaeԑ a ԑwɔ Sámi mpɔtam nya sika pa ara.`
F2: `Nnɛ sámifo no mu dodow no ara yɛ abɛɛfo nnwuma. Nsrahwɛ yɛ ade a ehia a sika wom wɔ Sápmi, Sámi mpɔtam hɔ.`
---------------------- (867) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sԑ wɔtaa de di dwuma, ne titire ne ‘non-Romani’ no, asԑmfua "Gypsy" yԑ asԑmfua a wɔhu no sԑ ԑyԑ atԑnnidie ԑnam bata a ԑbata nneԑma a ԑnyԑ ho ԑne adwene a ԑnyԑ fa nnipa a wɔfiri Romani ho no nti.`
F2: `Ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔde di dwuma wɔ mmeae bebree, ne titiriw no wɔn a wɔnyɛ Romani no mu no, wobu asɛmfua “Gypsy” sɛ atɛnnidie esaine sɛ ɛbata adwen a ɛnyɛ papa na ɛnyɛ nokware a wɔwɔ wɔ Romani ho no nti.`
---------------------- (868) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ ɔman no a worekɔ mu no nya afotuo bi a, w’apomuden nsiakyibaa a wode retu kwan anaa nsiakyibaa a ԑwɔ sԑ wɔbԑtwa w’akwantuo no mu no ho ka.`
F2: `Sɛ ɛkɔba sɛ wɔde kɔkɔbɔ ma wɔ ɔman a worekɔ mu no ho a, w’akwantu apɔmuden nsiakyibaa anaa w’akwantu ntwamu nsiakyibaa no ho betumi aba asɛm.`
---------------------- (869) ----------------------
F1: `Wopԑ nso a wobԑgye afotuo afiri aban no hɔ sene sԑ ԑyԑ wo ara wo deԑ nanso wɔayԑ afotuo no ama wɔn manfoɔ.`
F2: `Wobɛpɛ nso sɛ wobɛgye afotu afi aban ahorow a ɛnyɛ wo de hɔ, nanso afotu a wɔde ma no kɔ ma wɔn man mufo.`
---------------------- (870) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛho nhwԑsoɔ baako, America manfoɔ a wɔwɔ Middle East bԑtumi ahyia no soronko afiri Europeans anaa Arabs hɔ.`
F2: `Sɛ nhwɛso baako no, Amerikafo a wɔte Middle East no behyia tebea soronko efi Europafo anaa Arabfo ho.`
---------------------- (871) ----------------------
F1: `Afotusԑm no yԑ sԑdeԑ amannyɔsԑm teԑ ho tɔfabɔ kakra wɔ ɔman bi mu.`
F2: `Kɔkɔbɔ a wɔde ma wɔ ɔman bi ho no yɛ amanyɔsɛm tebea a ɛrekɔ so wɔ ɔman bi so a wɔabɔ no mua.`
---------------------- (872) ----------------------
F1: `Adwenekyerԑ no taa yԑ ntԑm so, deԑ ԑkɔ ma obiara ԑne deԑ wɔayԑ no ketewese sԑ wode toto nsԑm a ԑfa ho wɔ baabi foforɔ ho a.`
F2: `Adwen a wɔkyerɛ no yɛ gyasogyaso de, ɛfa biribiara ho na ne nsɛm nhyɛda nnim koraa sɛ wode toto ɛho nsɛm a emu nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dɔ a wobenya wɔ baabi foforo no a.`
---------------------- (873) ----------------------
F1: `Ewiem tebea a ano yԑ den yԑ asԑmfua a wɔde ma ewiem nsakraeԑ a ԑyԑ hu a ԑbԑtumi asԑe adeԑ, asԑe ayɔnkofa dwumadie, anaa de owuo aba.`
F2: `Wim tebea a ano yɛ den yɛ din a wɔde ma wim tebea a ɛyɛ hu a ebetumi asɛe ade, anaa nnipa betumi ahwere wɔn nkwa.`
---------------------- (874) ----------------------
F1: `Ewiem tebea a ano yԑ den bԑtumi asi wɔ wiase yi mu baabiara, ԑnna ԑgu ahodoɔ bebree a ԑbԑgyina baabi a asi no so, baabi pɔtee ԑne ewiem nsakraeԑ so.`
F2: `Wim tebea a ano yɛ den betumi asi wɔ wiase fa baabiara, na egu ahorow, a agyina asase ho adesua, sɛnea asase no te, ne wim nsakrae ahorow so.`
---------------------- (875) ----------------------
F1: `Mframa a ano yԑ den, asukɔtwea, osutɔ denden, ԑne egyahyehyeԑ denden yԑ ewiem tebea a ano yԑ den ho nsunsuansoɔ, te sԑ agradaa, mframa denden, mframa a ԑsi wɔ nsuo so ԑne mmotia mframa.`
F2: `Mframa a ano yɛ den, asukɔtweaa, ne ogyatanaa, yɛ emu bi ne wim tebea a ano yɛ den nsonsuanso no, saa ara na osubrane, mframa gyanpantrudu, ahum a etu wɔ po so ne kyinhyiamframa ahorow ka ho.`
---------------------- (876) ----------------------
F1: `Ewiem tebea a ano yԑ den a ԑkɔ so wɔ mpɔtam ԑne berԑ bi mu bi ne ‘snowstorm’ a ano yԑ den, ‘snowstorm’, ‘ice storms’, ԑne ‘dust storms’.`
F2: `Wim tebea a ano yɛ den a ɛba wɔ mpɔtam bi anaa ne bere mu no bi n.`
---------------------- (877) ----------------------
F1: `Yԑtu akwantufoɔ fo sԑ wɔnhyԑ ɔhaw a ewiem tebea a ano yԑ den wɔ wɔ baabi so ԑfiri sԑ ԑbԑsԑe akwantuo nhyehyԑeԑ no.`
F2: `Wotu akwantufo fo dennennen sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ nsonsuanso a wim tebea a ano yɛ den betumi anya wɔ wɔn mpɔtam no nsow esaine sɛ ebetumi aka wɔn akwantu nhyehyɛe nti.`
---------------------- (878) ----------------------
F1: `Obiara a ɔpԑ sԑ ɔkɔ ɔman a ako wɔ so no nhwԑ sԑ ɔbԑgye nimdeԑ afiri wɔn a wɔnnim ho.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ obi biara a ɔreyɛ nhyehyɛe sɛ ɔbɛkɔ kurow bi a wosusuw sɛ ɛhɔ yɛ baabi a ɔko si so nsrahwɛ no nya ntetee papa.`
---------------------- (879) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wohwehwԑ intanԑte so pԑ 'Hostile environment course' a, ԑbԑtumi ama wo deԑ ԑwɔ wo mpɔtam hɔ no addrԑsse.`
F2: `Intanɛt so a wobɛhwehwɛ ‘baabi a ɔtan wɔ hɔ ho adesua’ betumi ama woanya adwumakuw bi a wɔwɔ wo man mu no akyirikwan.`
---------------------- (880) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ‘course’ no bԑkyerԑ wo nneԑma bebree a ԑkyԑne deԑ yԑaka wɔ ha no, a suahunu ka ho.`
F2: `Adesua no bɛkyerɛkyerɛ nsɛm a yeaka ho asɛm wɔ ha mu akɔ akyi, mpɛn pii no wɔde ɔyɛkyerɛ ka ho.`
---------------------- (881) ----------------------
F1: `Saa ‘course’ bԑtumi ayԑ nnafua 2-5 ԑnna ɔyԑkyerԑ bԑka ho, na ‘first aid’ ԑne akodeԑ ho nkyerԑkyerԑ bebree wom.`
F2: `Adesua no taa di nna 2-5 na wɔde ɔyɛkyerɛ,nneɛma a ɛbɛboa ma woate ase ntɛm na ɛtɔ mmere bi a wɔkyerɛ sɛnea wɔde akode bedi dwuma.`
---------------------- (882) ----------------------
F1: `Nwoma ne atwerԑ a ԑfa kwan a wobԑfa so atumi atena ԑserԑ so no dɔɔso, nanso atwerԑ a ԑfa baabi a ako wɔ sua.`
F2: `Nhoma ne nsɛmma nhoma a ɛfa sɛnea wobetumi atena ase wɔ nwuram abu so, nanso nhoma a efa mmeae a ako wɔ hɔ no yɛ kakraa bi.`
---------------------- (883) ----------------------
F1: `‘Voyagers’ a wɔrekɔyԑ bɔbea nsesaeԑ wɔ amannɔne nhwԑ sԑ wɔkuta nkrataa pa a wɔde bԑsane aba.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ akwantufo a wɔreyɛ nhyehɛe sɛ wɔbɛkɔ akɔyɛ bɔbeasu nsesae opirehɛn wɔ amanɔne kura nkrataa a ɛfata a wɔbɛ san de aba.`
---------------------- (884) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔpԑpa a aban wɔ sԑ ԑbԑma ‘akwantuo krataa’ a ԑnkyerԑ bɔbea (X) anaa nkrataasԑm a wɔayԑ ama ԑne din bi anaa bɔbea bi a wopԑ no sesa.`
F2: `Ɔpɛ a aban ahorow no wɔ sɛ wɔbɛyɛ paspɔt a wonsi onii no bɔbeasu so dua (X) anaa nkrataa a wɔasakra mu ma ɛne obi din a ɔpɛ ne ne bɔbeasu ahyia no gu ahorow.`
---------------------- (885) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔpԑpa a amannɔne aban no wɔ sԑ ɔgye saa nkrataa no tom nso sesa.`
F2: `Ɔpɛ a amanɔne aban ahorow no wɔ sɛ wobedi saa nkrataa yi so no nso gu ahorow saa ara.`
---------------------- (886) ----------------------
F1: `Nhwehwԑmu a wɔyԑ wɔ baabi a wofa no nso mu ayԑ den ԑfiri Ɛbɔ 11, 2001 no akyi reba no.`
F2: `Efi Ɛbɔ da a ɛtɔ so 11 mmere no reba no,nhwehwɛmu a wɔyɛ wɔ abammɔfo gyinabea ahorow abɛyɛ mfeefeemu a ɛboro so.`
---------------------- (887) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa a wɔyԑ ‘transgender’ no nkaeԑ nhunu sԑ wɔmfa baabi a wɔhwehwԑ wɔn no wɔn berԑ ne kokoam adeԑ no ntɔ dwa.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔsesa wɔn bɔbeasu a wonya nyɛɛ opirehyɛn no nnhwɛ kwan sɛ wɔbɛfa afidie a wɔde hwehwɛ nnipa ho no a wɔn kokoam nsɛm ne wɔn nidie ho mma asɛm.`
---------------------- (888) ----------------------
F1: `‘Rip currents’ yԑ asorɔkye no a abɔ na asane n’akyi na abu mpoano no, ԑtaa yԑ botan anaa deԑ ԑte saa.`
F2: `Rip current yɛ asorɔkye a efi mpoano resan aba nsu no mu, mpɛn pii no wɔ baabi a ɛpo mu botan no wɔ anaa nea ɛte saa.`
---------------------- (889) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnam sԑdeԑ nsuo no ase teԑ nti, nsuo no a ԑreba no taa gyina baabi a ԑdɔ kakra bi, ԑno nti ‘nsuo a aboa ano’ a ԑrekɔ ntԑm no bԑsi hɔ.`
F2: `Esaine sɛnea nsu ase te nti, nsu a asan n’akyi reba no ano yɛ den paa wɔ afa ahorow kakra bi a emu dɔ hɔ, na tumi a ɛyɛ nam betumi ahyehyɛ wɔ hɔ.`
---------------------- (890) ----------------------
F1: `Owuo bebree si ԑnam brԑ nti ԑfiri sԑ ԑyԑ na onipa no pԑ sԑ ɔdware hyia no, nanso ԑyԑ a ԑnyԑ yie.`
F2: `Owuo a ɛtaa si no ba bere a nkurɔfo bɔ mmɔden sɛ wɔbedware ahyia tumi a ɛwɔ asorɔkye a ɛresan n’akyi no, na ebetumi aba sɛ erennyɛ yiye.`
---------------------- (891) ----------------------
F1: `Wofiri ‘nsuo a aboa ano’ no mu pԑ a, sԑ woredware aba w’akyi no nyԑ den.`
F2: `Sɛ wonya pue fi asorɔkye no a ano yɛ den no mu a, sɛ wobɛsan aguare bio no nyɛ den te sɛ kan no.`
---------------------- (892) ----------------------
F1: `Hwԑ sԑ wode w’ani bԑhwԑ baabi a ԑnkye wo bio anaa ԑgyina wo nimdeԑ so ԑnna sԑ obi ahu wo so, wobԑpԑ sԑ wotwԑne ma obi bԑgye wo.`
F2: `Bɔ mmɔden sɛ wode w’ani bɛkyerɛ baabi a ɛnka wo nhyɛ bio anaa, sɛ wonim aguare anaa obi ahu wo no, wobɛpɛ sɛ wobɛtwɛn ma obi abɛgye wo.`
---------------------- (893) ----------------------
F1: `Ehu a ɛka wↄn berɛ a wↄsan ne wↄn manfoↄ bↄ no ba ntɛm sene ehu a ɛka wↄn berɛ a wↄsan abesua wↄn amammerɛ no, (ɛnyɛ anigyesɛm koraa) etumi kyɛ na ano tumi yɛ den.`
F2: `Ehu a ɛka wↄn bere a wↄsan ne wↄn manfo bↄ no ba ntɛm sen ehu a ɛka wↄn bere a wↄsan sua wↄn amammerɛ no, (ɛnyɛ anigyesɛm koraa) etumi kyɛ na ano tumi yɛ den paa.`
---------------------- (894) ----------------------
F1: `Akwantufoↄ a eyɛɛ mmerɛ maa wↄn sɛ wobesua afoforo amammrɛ no, eto mmerɛ bi a, ɛbɛyɛ den ma wↄn sɛ wobɛsan akↄfa wↄn deɛ no bio.`
F2: `Akwantufo a anyɛ den amma wↄn sɛ wobesua afoforo amammrɛ no, ɛtↄ da a,ɛbɛyɛ den sɛ wobɛsan akↄfa wↄn de no bio.`
---------------------- (895) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wofiri aburokyire ba fie a, amammerɛ foforo a woasua no ka wo hↄ na wo werɛ firi w’ankasa deɛ no bi.`
F2: `Sɛ wofi aburokyire ba fie a, amammerɛ foforo a woasua no ka wo hↄ na wo werɛ fi w’ankasa de no bi.`
---------------------- (896) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛberɛ a edi kan a wutuu kwan no, ebetumi aba sɛ nkurↄfoↄ nyaa abotarɛ ne ntiaseɛ maa wo, esiane sɛ na wonim sɛ ehia sɛ akwantufoↄ sua ↄman foforo mu amammerɛ na wode yɛ adwuma.`
F2: `Bere a edi kan a wutuu kwan no, ebetumi aba sɛ nkurↄfo nyaa abotare ne ntiase maa wo, efisɛ na wonim sɛ ehia sɛ akwantufo sua ↄman foforo mu amammerɛ na wↄde yɛ adwuma.`
---------------------- (897) ----------------------
F1: `Nnipa pii renhwɛ kwan da sɛ, wↄn a wofi akwantuo mu asan aba wↄn man mu no behia abotarɛ ne nteaseɛ.`
F2: `Nnipa pii nhwɛ kwan da sɛ wↄn a wofi akwantuo mu san ba wↄn man mu no behia abotare ne ntease.`
---------------------- (898) ----------------------
F1: `‘Pyramid’ nnyegyeeԑ no ԑne ‘light show’ no yԑ adeԑ a ԑma mmɔfra ani gye wɔ saa beaeԑ no.`
F2: `Pyramid no dede ne kanea dwumadi no yɛ ade a ɛyɛ anika paa ma mmofra wɔ mpɔtam hɔ.`
---------------------- (899) ----------------------
F1: `Wobԑtumi ahu ‘pyramids’ no wɔ esum no mu ԑnna wobԑhu wɔn wɔ dinnyԑ no mu ansa na ɔyԑkyerԑ no ahyԑ aseԑ.`
F2: `Wubetumi ahu ahinawotwe ahorow wɔ sum mu, ɛnna wubetumi ahu wɔn a wɔayɛ dinn ansa na agoru no ahyɛ ase.`
---------------------- (900) ----------------------
F1: `Mpԑn pii wotaa te akwansrafoɔ ne adetɔnfoɔ nne. Abasԑm a ԑfa ‘nnyegyeeԑ ne kanea’ ho no te sԑ abasԑm nwoma.`
F2: `Wutumi te nnyigyei bi fi nsrahwɛfo ne adetɔnfo no mpɛn pii no ara. Abasɛm a ɛfa nnyigyei ne kanea ho no te sɛ abasɛm nhoma ara pɛ.`
---------------------- (901) ----------------------
F1: `‘Sphinx’ no na wɔayԑ no ahyԑaseԑ ne deԑ ɔreka abasԑm tenten no.`
F2: `Wɔde abɔde a ne ti yɛ nipa na ne honam yɛ aboa ne ɔkasafo ma abasɛm no to akyi.`
---------------------- (902) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔyi sini no nkyekyԑmu no wɔ ‘pyramids’ no so na ‘pyramids’ ahodoɔ no nyinaa asɔ.`
F2: `Wɔda ahwɛe ahorow adi wɔ ahinawotwe ahorow no so nam so sosɔ ahinawotwe no.`
---------------------- (903) ----------------------
F1: `Shetland Islands Anaafoɔ a wɔhuu no wɔ afe 1819, aman bebree se yԑ wɔn dea na ԑno na ԑwɔ ‘bases’ dodoɔ pa ara a na ԑmu du-nsia yԑ adwuma wɔ afe 2020 mu.`
F2: `Aman pii no ara na wɔkyerɛ sɛ, “South Sheltland”, a wohuu no afe 1819 mu no wɔ adankora pii, a emu dunsia ɛna na wodi mu dwuma wɔ afe 2020 mu.`
---------------------- (904) ----------------------
F1: `Archipelago no da 120 km wɔ Peninsula atifi. Ɛmu kԑseԑ pa ara ne King George Island a Villa Las Estrellas atenaeԑ wɔ so.`
F2: `Ͻkwan a ɛda “archipelago” ne “Peninsula” soro fam no yɛ kilomita no 120. Nea ɛso wom ne “King George Island” a ɛwɔ “Villa Las Estrellas”.`
---------------------- (905) ----------------------
F1: `Afoforɔ bi nso ne Livingston Island, ԑne Deception a bepɔ mu gya a ԑtene no ma ԑhɔ yԑ gyinabea soronko.`
F2: `Ebinom nso ne “Livingston Island”, ne “Deception” a ɛhɔ na “caldera” ogya bepɔw no ma tenabea a edi mu yiye.`
---------------------- (906) ----------------------
F1: `Ellsworth Land yԑ mpɔtam a ԑwɔ Peninsula anaafoɔ, a Bellingshausen Ɛpo no atwa ho ahyia.`
F2: `“Ellsworth Land” da “Peninsula” no anaafo fam, a “Bellingshausen” po no atwa ho ahyia.`
---------------------- (907) ----------------------
F1: `Peninsula mmepɔ no ka bomm yԑԑ ‘plateau no’, ԑnna ԑsane nso dane yԑԑ 360 km mmepɔ a ԑyԑ Ellsworth Mmepɔ a Minnesota Glacier no atwa mu no.`
F2: `“Peninsula” mmepɔw no na ɛkeka bom yɛ asase yantam no, na asan nso akeka abom ayɛ “Ellsworth” mmepɔw a ɛyɛ kilomita no 360, a “Minnesota Glacier” no atware mu.`
---------------------- (908) ----------------------
F1: `Atifi fam anaa ‘Sentinel Range’ wɔ Antarctica mmepɔ atenten, Vinson Massif no, a ne tenten yԑ 4892 m Mount Vinson.`
F2: `Atifi fam anaa “Sentinel Range” no wɔ “Antarctica” mmepɔw a ɛwoware no, a wɔfrɛ no “Vinson Massif”, a ne tenten no yɛ mita no 4892 wɔ “Mount Vinson”.`
---------------------- (909) ----------------------
F1: `Akuraa bi ase, baabi a fon adwumakuo no dwumadie nnuru hɔ no, ‘satellite’ fon nko ara na wobԑtumi de adi dwuma.`
F2: `Mmea a ɛwɔ akyiri no de, sɛ wunni ahamatorofo a, ɛnde ahamatorofo a yɛasi abɛɛfo kwantempɔn dua ama no na wubetumi de adi dwuma.`
---------------------- (910) ----------------------
F1: `‘Satellite’ fon no nyԑ ‘mobile phone’ no nsiananmu, ԑfiri sԑ wohia sԑ wopue bԑhunu ‘satellite’ no ansa na woatumi afrԑ obi.`
F2: `Ahamatorofo a yɛasi abɛɛfo kwantempɔn dua ama noɔ no nhyɛ da ntumi nni dwuma te sɛ ahamatorofo a wutumi de kɔ baabiara, efisɛ ɛsɛ sɛ wobɛn abɛɛfo kwantempɔn dua no ansa na wɔatumi de ahamatorofo no adi nkɔmmɔ.`
---------------------- (911) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔn a wɔde saa adeԑ yi di dwuma ne ‘shipping’ a ‘pleasure craft’ ka ho, ԑne wɔn a wɔrekɔhwehwԑ biribi a wɔhia ‘data’ ԑne kasa.`
F2: `Wɔde eyi di dwuma mpɛn pii no ara wɔ nneɛma nneɛmafa a wɔde fa nsu so mu, a nsu so hyɛntwi a wɔde gyigye wɔn ani ka ho, na nsrahwɛfo a wɔwɔ deeta a ɛwɔ akyi no ka ho bi.`
---------------------- (912) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛsԑ sԑ fon ho dwumadie adwumakuo a wɔwɔ wo mpɔtam tumi kyerԑ wo kwan a wobԑfa so anya saa dwumadie yi.`
F2: `Ɛsɛ sɛ onipa a odi ahamatorofo ho dwuma no bɔ mmɔden ma wuhu biribiara a ɛfa saa abɛɛfo kwantempɔn yi ho.`
---------------------- (913) ----------------------
F1: `Kwan pa a ԑredɔɔso ne sԑ wobԑsusu ‘gap-afe’ bi ho sԑ wobԑtu akwan akɔsua adeԑ.`
F2: `Ͻkwan pa a wɔn a wɔama wɔn ho afe biako akyi bɛfa so akɔ no ne sɛ wobetu kwan na wɔakosua ade.`
---------------------- (914) ----------------------
F1: `Wei taa kɔ so wɔ asuafoɔ a wɔawie sukuu foforɔ no mu, ԑma wɔnya afe ansa na suapɔn adesua no ahyԑ aseԑ wɔ berԑ a ԑntwentwan wɔn adesua anan mu.`
F2: `Wɔn a wɔtaa yɛ eyi yɛ wɔn a wɔawie sukuu, wɔ bere a yɛregyae wɔn ama wɔatu saa anammɔn yi ansa na wɔakɔ suapɔn, na wɔnto wɔn adesua no nkyene.`
---------------------- (915) ----------------------
F1: `Mpԑn pii no, sԑ woresua adeԑ wɔ ‘gap-afe’ no mu wɔ amannɔne no bԑtumi ama wokɔ wo man mu a, wobԑnya akwannya wɔ sukuu a ԑwɔ anim no mu.`
F2: `Ͻkwan pii so no, sɛ wubetu kwan akɔ ɔman foforo so akosua ade afe biako no ma wo ho kwan ma sɛ woba wo man mu a, wutumi kɔ w’anim wɔ wo sukuukɔ no mu.`
---------------------- (916) ----------------------
F1: `Deԑ ԑwɔ hɔ ne sԑ, wobԑtua adekyerԑ no ho ka ansa na woatumi ayԑ saa adesuadeԑ no bi.`
F2: `Nea ɛwɔ ho ne sɛ, ehia sɛ wutua adekyerɛ sika wɔ saa adesua nhyehyɛe yi mu.`
---------------------- (917) ----------------------
F1: `Finland yɛ ɔman a wode subonto kɔ a ɛyɛ anika. "Asaase a ɛkura tadeɛ apem" no wɔ supɔ mpem nso wɔ tadeɛ ahodoɔ no mu ne nsaase a ɛwɔ nsuo mu nso.`
F2: `Finland yɛ beae soronko bi a, hyɛmma kɔ edi pa ara. Beae a “ Atadeɛ pii wowɔ” na ɛwowɔ anweatam pii nso, ɛwɔ atadeɛ no mu ɛwɔ archipelago mpoano.`
---------------------- (918) ----------------------
F1: `Nsaase a ɛwowɔ nsuo mu ne tadeɛ so deɛ worenhyɛda nhia suhyɛn.`
F2: `Wɔ archipelago ne atadeɛ mu no de nyɛ ketee sɛ wonya yacht.`
---------------------- (919) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛwom sɛ nsase a ɛwowɔ nsuo mu ne tadeɛ akɛseɛ no soso sɛ ɛbɛtumi akora suhyɛn, subonto nketewa anaa kodoɔ nanso ɛma yɛnya suahunu foforɔ.`
F2: `Ɛwom sɛ archipelago mpaono ne atare akɛse no kɛse yɛ ma yacht biara de, hyɛmma nketewa anaa mpo kayak ɛma suahunu soronko koraa.`
---------------------- (920) ----------------------
F1: `Adeɛ baako a Finlandfoɔ man ani gye ho pa ara ne Suhyɛntwie. Ɛrekame ayɛ sɛ yɛkyɛ ɔman no mu nnipa nyinaa a yɛbɛyɛ sɛ nnipakuo nson anaa nwɔtwe biara bɛwɔ suhyɛn baako.`
F2: `Hyɛmma mu tena yɛ anigyedeɛ a atwam wɔ Findland, na hyɛmma biara wɔ nnipa nson anaa nwɔtwe.`
---------------------- (921) ----------------------
F1: `Norway, Sweden ne New Zealand bɔ atipɛnko nanso ɛkwan bi so no ɛda nso (nhwɛsoɔ. wɔ Netherland man mu no ɛyɛ nnipa baako biara refa ɔha nkyɛmu aduanan).`
F2: `Yei ne Norway, Sweden ne New Zealand hyia, nanso kwan fofooro da nso koraa. (s.e. Wɔ Nethaland no, ɛfi biako kɔsi aduanan).`
---------------------- (922) ----------------------
F1: `Baltic Nsuhyɛn no a ԑda nso no tena St. Petersburg, Russia kyԑre.`
F2: `“Baltic Cruises” ahorow no pii no ara wɔ “St. Petersburg” a ɛwɔ Russia.`
---------------------- (923) ----------------------
F1: `Wei kyerԑ sԑ wobԑtumi akɔsra abakɔsԑm kuro yi nna kakra berԑ a woresane aba na woada wɔ suhyԑn no mu anadwo.`
F2: `Eyi kyerɛ sɛ wubetumi atu nna binom asi hɔ akɔ saa tete nkurow yi so wɔ bere a woreba wo nkyi na woreda suhyɛn no mu anadwo.`
---------------------- (924) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wode ‘shipboard’ nsrahwԑ so kɔ mpoano nko ara deԑ a, wonhia visa foforɔ (ԑfiri 2009).`
F2: `Sɛ wofa suhyɛn nketewa no bi na ɛkɔ hɔ nsrahwɛ a, ɛho nhia sɛ wubehia akwantu krataa foforo (sɛnea na wɔyɛ no afe 2009 mu no).`
---------------------- (925) ----------------------
F1: `‘Nsuhyɛn’ no binom de Berlin, Germany ka ho wɔ nwoma no mu. Sԑdeԑ ԑwɔ ‘map’ a wohu no soro hɔ no mu no, Berlin mmԑne ԑpo no baabiara ԑnna sika a wohia de akɔ hɔ no nka ‘suhyɛn’ no boɔ no ho.`
F2: `Suhyɛn a wotwi de gyigye wɔn ani no bi fi Berlin ne Germany a yehu no nhoma ahorow mu. Sɛnea wuhu wɔ maapo no so no, Berlin mmɛn po no wɔ baabiara, ɛnna nsrahwɛ biara a wobɛkɔ wɔ hɔ no nka sika a wubetua de atwiw suhyɛn a wotwi de gyigye wɔn ani no.`
---------------------- (926) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wode wiemhyԑn retu kwan no yԑ suahunu a ԑyԑ hu ma nnipa biara, ne titire ne sԑ wɔfaa bi ntuu kwan da anaa wɔahyia ɔhaw bi wɔ wiemhyԑn mu pԑn.`
F2: `Wimhyɛn akwantu yɛ ade a onipa biara suro, titiriw sɛ nnipa no mfaa winhyɛn ntuu kwan anaa wɔapira da a.`
---------------------- (927) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛnyԑ adeԑ a ԑsԑ sԑ wofԑre ho: nsonsonoeԑ biara nna ԑne nneԑma foforɔ a wosuro na wompԑ a nnipa bebree wɔ.`
F2: `Ɛnyɛ ade a ɛsɛ sɛ w’ani wu wɔ ho: ɛte sɛ ehu ne ɔpɛ a nkurɔfo wɔ ma nneɛma binom a wɔwɔ no.`
---------------------- (928) ----------------------
F1: `Ebinom wɔ hɔ a, sԑ wɔbԑte sԑdeԑ wiemhyԑn di dwuma ԑne deԑ ԑsi wɔ berԑ a atu no ase a, ԑbԑma wɔatumi ayi suro a ԑgyina deԑ wɔnnim so ԑne wɔnni so tumi no afiri wɔn mu.`
F2: `Ebinom no, sɛ yɛkyerɛ wɔn ɔkwan a wimhyɛn fa so yɛ adwuma ne sɛ wɔte mu a sɛnea ɛyɛ no a, ebeyi ehu a efi nim a wonnim anaa ɛnyɛ wɔn na wotwi mu no afi wɔn mu.`
---------------------- (929) ----------------------
F1: `‘Courier’ nnwumakuo no, wɔtua wɔn ka yie sԑ wɔde nneԑma kɔma wɔn a ԑyԑ wɔn dea ntԑm. Ɛberԑ ho hia pa ara ma adwuma nkrataa, nneԑma a wɔtɔn anaa wɔtɔ, anaa adeԑ ho biribi a wɔhia de asiesie no ntԑm.`
F2: `Nnwumakuw a wɔde nneɛma kɔmoma nkurɔfo no akatua ye pa ara. Mpɛn pii no, wuhia bere na wode adi w’aguadi krataa ho dwuma, wode adi gua anaa wode atɔ afiri no ho akade ahorow.`
---------------------- (930) ----------------------
F1: `Kwan no bi so no, nnwumakuo akԑseԑ binom wɔ wɔn ankasa wiemhyԑn, nanso kwan foforɔ bi so ԑne nnwumakuo nketewa no, ɔhaw wɔ hɔ.`
F2: `Akwan bi so no, nnwumakuw akɛse no wɔ wɔn ankasa wimhyɛn ahorow, nanso akwan binom a aka ne nnwumakuw nketewa no de, na ɔhaw wɔ ho.`
---------------------- (931) ----------------------
F1: `Sԑ wɔde nneԑma somaa wiemhyԑn a, kwan bi so no ԑbԑtumi aba sԑ ԑdii nna kakra ansa na wɔreyi na afa nhwehwԑmu mu.`
F2: `Sɛ wɔnam wimhyɛn so na wɔde nneɛma mane a, akwan bi so no, ebetumi adi nna ansa na wɔayi nneɛma no anaa afi beae a woyi nneɛma no.`
---------------------- (932) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔkwan baakopɛ a wobetumi afa so ama afa mu ntɛm ne sɛ wode bɛkɔ sɛ nnoɔma a wɔn ahwehwɛ mu. Ewiemuhyɛn akwantuo ho mmara remma kwan sɛ wɔde nnoɔma betu kwan a ɔkwantuni nka ho, na aha na woba mu no.`
F2: `Ͻkwan a wubetumi afa so na wo nneɛma no akɔ ntɛm ne sɛ wode nneɛma no bɛmane sɛ nneɛma a yɛahwɛ dedaw. Wimhyɛnfa nhyehyɛe no mma ho kwan sɛ wɔde nneɛma bi bɛfa wɔn so a nneɛma no wura nka ho, ɛno nti na wobehia wo no.`
---------------------- (933) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ wobenya adefoↄ afa anaa aguadifoↄ afa atena wↄ wiemhyɛn mu a, gye sɛ wotua sika pii, (anaase, wo ma w'adwumakuo tua ma woↄ).`
F2: `Sɛ wobenya adefo afa anaa aguadifo afa atena wↄ wiemhyɛn mu a, gye sɛ wotua sika pii, (anaasɛ, wo ma w'adwumakuo tua ma wo).`
---------------------- (934) ----------------------
F1: `Nanso, wei boↄ nna fam. Sɛdeɛ yenim no, ɛsɛ sɛ wo hwɛ kwan sɛ wobetua mmↄho nan ma aguadifoↄ boɔ na wotaa tua no, ɛna mmↄho du baako sɛ wopɛ adefoↄ afa.`
F2: `Nanso, ɛbo nna fam. Sɛnea yenim no ,ɛsɛ sɛ wo hwɛ kwan sɛ wobetua sika wↄtaa gye no ho mmↄho nan ma aguadifo afa , ɛna mmↄho du baako sɛ wopɛ adefoↄ afa hↄ nso a.`
---------------------- (935) ----------------------
F1: `Sɛ yɛbɛka a, ɛho renhia koraa sɛ wobesrɛ nyisoↄ berɛ a wopɛ sɛ wotena adefoↄ afa anaa aguadifoↄ afa wↄ wiemhyɛn a ennyina kwan so na ɛkↄ tee mu no.`
F2: `Sɛ yɛbɛka a, ɛho nhia koraa sɛ wobesrɛ nteso bere a wopɛ sɛ wotena adefo afa anaa aguadifo afa wↄ wiemhyɛn a ennyina kwan so na ɛkↄ tee mu no.`
---------------------- (936) ----------------------
F1: `Wiemhyɛn adwumakuo ahodoↄ no nim sɛ akwantufoↄ bi ayɛ krado sɛ wobetua dↄla sika a emuo duru sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ a, wobedu beaeɛ a wↄrekↄ no ntɛm wↄ ahodwoↄ mu, sɛ ɛboↄ no sɛ a.`
F2: `Wiemhyɛn adwumakuo ahorow no nim yie sɛ akwantufo bi ayɛ krado sɛ wobetua dↄla sika a emu yɛ duru sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a, wobedu baabi a wↄrekↄ no ntɛm wↄ ahodwo mu, sɛ ɛbo no fata a.`
---------------------- (937) ----------------------
F1: `Moldova ahenkuro yɛ Chişinău. Wɔn man kasa yɛ Romanian, nanso Russian na wɔ de di dwuma paa.`
F2: `Moldova ahenkurow ne Chişinău.Wɔn kasa ankasa ne Romanian, nanso Russia kasa na wɔde di dwuma kɛse.`
---------------------- (938) ----------------------
F1: `Moldova yɛ akwasafoɔman a mmusua kuo dodoɔ pii na ɛwɔ mu a aberɛ paa wɔ mmusua kuo ntam ako mu.`
F2: `Moldova yɛ ɔman a ekura mmusuakuw dodow no ara na mmusuakuw ntɔkwaw akɔ so wɔ hɔ pa ara.`
---------------------- (939) ----------------------
F1: `Wɔ 1994 no, ɔko no kɔ wieɛ sɛ wɔ tee akwasafoɔman a wɔn ankasaa ferɛɛ no Transnistria Akwasafoɔman wɔ Apueɛfam Moldova, a ɛwɔ ɛno ankasa aban ne sika a wɔ di nanso UN aman no mu biara nim saa ɔman no.`
F2: `Afe 1994 mu no, saa ntɔkwaw yi maa wɔtee ankonam man a wɔfrɛ no “Transnistria Republic” a ɛwɔ Moldova apuei fam, a wɔwɔ wɔn ankasa aban ne wɔn sika a wodi, nan so “UN” nnyee wɔn ntoo mu sɛ ɔman.`
---------------------- (940) ----------------------
F1: `Afa mmienu wei a ɛwɔ Moldova no asan ate sikasɛm mu ayɔnkofa wɔ wɔn ntam ɛmfa ho sɛ amanyɔsɛm ho nhyehyɛeɛ a wɔyɛ no gye gu no.`
F2: `Ewom sɛ Moldova aman abien yi nni nkitaho mfa amanyɔsɛm ho de, nanso wɔwɔ twaka soronko wɔ sikasɛm fam.`
---------------------- (941) ----------------------
F1: `Ɔsom titire a ɛwɔ Moldova yɛ Orthodox Christian.`
F2: `Ͻsom a ɛwɔ Moldova ne “Orthodox Christian”.`
---------------------- (942) ----------------------
F1: `İzmir yɛ nkuropɔn akɛseɛ no mu deɛ ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa wɔ Turkey ne emu nnipa dodoɔ bɛyɛ ɔpepem 3.7, nsuohyɛn gyinabeaɛ akɛseɛ no mu deɛ ɛtɔ so mmienu, nnosoatwe beaɛ a ɛyɛ papa paa.`
F2: `“Izmir” yɛ Turkey nkurow akɛse no mu biako a ɛto so abiɛsa na ekura nnipa ɔpepe 3.7, na ekura hyɛn gyinabea a ɛto so abien di “Istanbul” akyi, na akwantu ho nsɛm gyina ne nan so yiye.`
---------------------- (943) ----------------------
F1: `Na ɛyɛ Smyrna kan tete kuro, sesei ɛyɛ abɛɛfo beaɛ, a atu mpɔn, ne beaɛ a guadie kɔ so paa wɔ, a wɔn ayɛ wɔ mpoano na mmepɔ atwa ho ahyia.`
F2: `Esiane sɛ na ɛyɛ “Smyma” tete kurow no nti, abɛyɛ beae a egyina ne nan so ma aguadi, na wɔasi wɔ ɛpo faka ho na mmepɔw atwa ho ahyia.`
---------------------- (944) ----------------------
F1: `Ɛkwan kɛseɛ, adan a wɔde ahwehwɛ ayɛ anim na aguadibeaɛ a abasoɔ no wɔde ɛdan atifi a wɔ yɛɛ no amammerɛ kwan so na akata so, 18th mfeɛ ɔha gua so, ne nkramofoɔ adan ne asɔre adan a ayɛ dada, ɛmfa ho sɛ kuro no wɔ ahunum a ɛte sɛ Mediterranean Europe mmom sen amammerɛ kwan so Turkey.`
F2: `Wɔde nkyɛnsee a wɔde bɔ dan so kɔkɔɔ, mfe ɔha a ɛto so 18 gua, ne tete nkramodan ne asɔredan na ayɛ kwantempɔn akɛse a nnua wɔ nkyɛnkyɛn, adan a wɔde nhwehwɛ na ayɛ anim ne ɛnne mmere yi aguadibea ahorow no de, nanso saa kurowpɔn yi kura “Mediterranean Europe” atenka no bi sen tete “Turkey” no.`
---------------------- (945) ----------------------
F1: `Haldarsvík akura no kyerɛ Eysturoy nsuopɔ a ɛbɛn no ho adwene na ɛwɔ asɔre dan a wɔn asi no tesɛ octagon.`
F2: `“Haldarsvik” kurow ketewa no da “Eysturoy” supɔw no adi, san nso wɔ asɔredan a ekura afa awotwe nwanwaso bi.`
---------------------- (946) ----------------------
